description: A O is an infamous New World pirate and captain of the A O Pirates. He and his crew were subordinates to Whitebeard.
name: A O

description: Abdullah is a criminal and a former bounty hunter who joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi, along with his partner Jeet. He is an ally of Luffy during the Dressrosa Arc. After the battle with the Donquixote Pirates at Dressrosa, he joined the XXX Gym Martial Arts Alliance, which later converted to a pirate crew called the Ideo Pirates.
name: Abdullah

description: Absalom of the Graveyard was the leader of the Zombie Soldiers and Zombie Generals of Thriller Bark prior to its collapse. He was one of the Mysterious Four of the Thriller Bark Pirates and one of the major antagonists of the Thriller Bark Saga.
name: Absalom

description: Acilia is a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum who participated in a tournament for the Mera Mera no Mi.
name: Acilia

description: Adele is a mermaid and an employee at the Mermaid Caf.
name: Adele

description: Aggie 68 is a member of the Spade Pirates.
name: Aggie 68

description: Agotogi was the leader of a gang of bandits who tried to kidnap Vivi about 11 years before the princess's return to Arabasta.
name: Agotogi

description: Agsilly is a New World pirate who allied himself with the Whitebeard Pirates.
name: Agsilly

description: Agyo is a fighting lion (, Tjishi?) and a gladiator competing at the Corrida Colosseum for the Mera Mera no Mi.
name: Agyo

description: Ahho Desunen IX is a noble from the Goa Kingdom and the father of Ahho Zurako.
name: Ahho Desunen IX

description: Ahho Zurako is a noble from the Goa Kingdom and the daughter of Ahho Desunen IX.
name: Ahho Zurako

description: Ahiru is the  Deputy Commander (, Fuku taich?, VIZ Media: Vice Captain) of the East Army in the Revolutionary Army and the assistant of Belo Betty.
name: Ahiru

description: Aisa is a young Shandia girl who used to sneak onto the Upper Yard frequently to collect Vearth. She is Isa's daughter. After the timeskip, she works in the Wagomuland theme park and sells Cloud Balloons.
name: Aisa

description: Akehende is a Marine Rear Admiral.
name: Akehende

description: Akudai Kanzaburo is an arms dealer who lives in the Flower Capital of Wano Country.
name: Akudai Kanzaburo

description: Akumai was a Billions agent who followed Mr. 2 Bon Kurei everywhere before he was captured by Hina when Mr. 2 and his crew sacrificed themselves to save the Straw Hat Pirates. His current fate is unknown.
name: Akumai

description: Aladine is a goatsbeard brotula merman. He was originally a Ryugu Kingdom soldier who was then enslaved, but then became a pirate as the doctor and later first mate of the Sun Pirates. He is the husband of Charlotte Praline, serving as the bond between the Sun Pirates and the Charlotte Family.
name: Aladine

description: Gashed Albion is one of the rookie pirates who joined the Fake Straw Hat Crew. He has a bounty of 92,000,000.
name: Albion

description: Ally is a little girl who was being held captive in the Biscuit Room, on Punk Hazard. She was freed with the rest of the children by the Straw Hat Pirates.
name: Ally

description: Alpacaman is a Gifter in the Beasts Pirates who serves as a guard in the Prisoner Mines of the Udon Region of Wano Country.
name: Alpacaman

description: Iron Mace Alvida is the former captain of the Alvida Pirates and the first antagonist encountered by Luffy on his journey after going to sea. Due to her actions, she can be regarded as the secondary antagonist of the Romance Dawn Arc and the tertiary antagonist of the Loguetown Arc.
name: Alvida

description: Amadob is an infamous New World pirate who allied himself with Whitebeard.
name: Amadob

description: Amazon was the elderly gatekeeper of Skypiea and informer at the entrance to Skypiea known as Heaven's Gate. She let people in even if they could not pay her extol toll, but purposely failed to tell those who did not pay about the consequences for entering the city.
name: Amazon

description: An Zengaiina is a prisoner on Level 2 of Impel Down.
name: An Zengaiina

description: Three-Headed Baskerville is the Chief Justice of Enies Lobby, in service of the World Government. Ostensibly a three-headed man, he is actually three menBas, And, and Kervillewho are such close friends that they prefer acting as one body.
name: And

description: Andre is an infamous New World pirate captain who was once a member of the Whitebeard Pirates, before forming his own crew subordinate to Whitebeard. He is the twin brother of the Marine officer Candre.
name: Andre

description: Anjo is a pirate admirer. He witnessed Gol D. Roger's execution. He has a tattoo of a plain Jolly Roger on his right arm.
name: Anjo

description: Ankoro is a gigantic anglerfish formerly under the command of captain Vander Decken IX, residing in the Underworld of the Sea, seven thousand meters underneath the ocean surface. Wadatsumi seems to regard Ankoro as a pet, as apparently Ankoro was told not to eat ships before.
name: Ankoro

description: Antonio is the owner of Antonio's Graman in Sabaody Archipelago.
name: Antonio

description: Aphelandra is a member of the tribe of Kuja living on the island of Amazon Lily. During the timeskip, she became a member of the Kuja Pirates.
name: Aphelandra

description: Aramaki, better known by his alias Ryokugyu, is an admiral in the Marines. He attained his rank during the two-year timeskip, along with Fujitora, both filling the two admiral vacancies left by Aokiji and Akainu.
name: Aramaki

description: Aremo Ganmi is a spectator at the Corrida Colosseum. She lives in Primula, a town in the west of Dressrosa.
name: Aremo Ganmi

description: Arlong the Saw is a sawshark fish-man. He was the captain of the all fish-man crew (excluding Nami), the Arlong Pirates, a former member of the Sun Pirates, and the older half-brother of Madam Shyarly. He is also a major inspirational figure for the New Fish-Man Pirates.
name: Arlong

description: The Tsumegeri Guards were four men who drank the Hero Water and attempted to take down Crocodile, but failed and died from the water's side effects shortly after Crocodile refused to even fight them to give them an honorable death.
name: Arrow

description: Arthur is an infamous New World pirate captain who was subordinate to Whitebeard.
name: Arthur

description: Aruyutayan V was the king of Lvneel Kingdom roughly 400 years ago when Mont Blanc Noland discovered Shandora.
name: Aruyutayan V

description: Asahija is a Marine Chief Petty Officer whose shadow was once stolen by Gecko Moria.
name: Asahija

description: Asashichi is a resident of the Flower Capital who ran a soba shop with his wife.
name: Asashichi

description: Ashura Doji was a former bandit, a samurai from Wano Country and a retainer of the Kozuki Family, serving as one of Kozuki Oden's Nine Red Scabbards. After Oden's death, he returned to being a criminal under the name Shutenmaru, assuming leadership of the Mt. Atama Thieves. He initially severed his ties with the Kozuki Family in the present but rejoined after witnessing Yasuie's death.
name: Ashura Doji

description: Aswa is Koza's mother and Toto's wife.
name: Aswa

description: Atagoyama is a sumo wrestler in Wano Country's Bakura Town.
name: Atagoyama

description: Atlas, also designated as Punk-05 (PUNK-05, Panku-Faibu?), is one of the six satellites of Dr. Vegapunk, embodying his aspect of violence.
name: Atlas

description: Water Buffalo Atmos is the commander of the 13th division of the Whitebeard Pirates.
name: Atmos

description: Attach, commonly nicknamed Attachan, is a prolific photographer who once headed the Marines' Photography Department. Though he supplied images of many prominent outlaws - including most of the Straw Hat Pirates - for the Marines' wanted posters, his frequent blunders eventually led to his dismissal. Subsequently, he became a reporter for the World Economic Journal, under Big News Morgans.
name: Attach

description: Avalo Pizarro, also known as the Corrupt King, was one of the criminals who was given a life sentence in Level 6 of Impel Down, as his crimes were so atrocious he had to be effectively be erased from history. Prior to his life of crime, he was once a king of a North Blue kingdom that overthrew him for his despotic ways. He has since been freed by Marshall D. Teach and has become a member of the Blackbeard Pirates.
name: Avalo Pizarro

description: Azuki is an old woman who lives in Ebisu Town.
name: Azuki

description: Babanuki is a Shinuchi of the Beasts Pirates who serves as the warden of the Prisoner Mine in Udon, a region of Wano Country. After the prison takeover, Babanuki was tamed by Tama.
name: Babanuki

description: Catcher-Killing Babe, better known by his alias Mr. 4, is a former officer agent of the Baroque Works and partner of Miss Merry Christmas. He is also Lassoo's owner.
name: Babe

description: Baby 5 is a pirate and the wife of Sai, the Happo Navy's 13th leader. She is a former servant and assassin of the Donquixote Pirates, serving as an officer in the Pica Army. Her real name has not been revealed, as Baby 5 is a codename given to her upon joining the Donquixote Pirates.
name: Baby 5

description: Bacurais a black panther owned by the Kuja Pirates under Boa Hancock.
name: Bacura

description: Baggaley is an infamous New World pirate who allied himself with the Whitebeard Pirates.
name: Baggaley

description: Bakezo is a member of the G-5 branch of the Marines.
name: Bakezo

description: Miss Bakkin is a former pirate, the self-proclaimed lover of Edward Newgate, and the mother of Edward Weevil, a former Warlord of the Sea.
name: Bakkin

description: Ban Dedessine is the queen of Frauce Kingdom (, Furausu koku?) in the East Blue and one of fifty monarchs who took part in the Levely.
name: Ban Dedessine

description: Banchi is a giant turtle used by Miss All Sunday for transportation. It is unknown what happened to him after the Arabasta Saga. He is classified as a Type A creature, Big Friendly.
name: Banchi

description: Banchina was Usopp's mother and Yasopp's wife. She died of sickness when Usopp was still young.
name: Banchina

description: Bankuro was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.
name: Bankuro

description: Banshee was the only female member of the Spade Pirates.
name: Banshee

description: Banzaburo was a samurai of Wano Country who worked as a servant to the Kozuki Family until their fall 20 years ago.
name: Banzaburo

description: Gyoro, Nin, and Bao were a trio of oddly shaped Soldier Zombies that were first seen reporting to Moria about the Straw Hats' arrival.
name: Bao

description: Bao Huang is a Shinuchi in the Beasts Pirates, being part of the crew's surveillance division, the Marys. She appears to have the duty of keeping and presenting daily schedules for the crew and their captain Kaidou.
name: Bao Huang

description: Bariete is a monkey mink who is a member of the Recon Squad (, Teisatsu-tai?), and the one in charge of guarding the gates of the Mokomo Dukedom.
name: Bariete

description: The Tsumegeri Guards were four men who drank the Hero Water and attempted to take down Crocodile, but failed and died from the water's side effects shortly after Crocodile refused to even fight them to give them an honorable death.
name: Barrel

description: Barry is a member of the Spade Pirates.
name: Barry

description: Bartholomew Kuma is a former Warlord of the Sea, the former king of the Sorbet Kingdom, and an officer of the Revolutionary Army with a bounty of 296,000,000. He is the father of Jewelry Bonney, a member of the Worst Generation.
name: Bartholomew Kuma

description: Bartolomeo the Cannibal is a Super Rookie, the captain of the Barto Club and the captain of the second ship of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet. He joined as a gladiator to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi at the Corrida Colosseum, where he met Monkey D. Luffy and pledged his loyalty towards him after winning the B Block.
name: Bartolomeo

description: Three-Headed Baskerville is the Chief Justice of Enies Lobby, in service of the World Government. Ostensibly a three-headed man, he is actually three menBas, And, and Kervillewho are such close friends that they prefer acting as one body.
name: Bas

description: Basil Hawkins is an infamous pirate from North Blue known as the Magician and the captain of the Hawkins Pirates. He is one of twelve pirates who are referred to as the Worst Generation. His previous known bounty amounted to 249,000,000, but after the timeskip, it was raised to 320,000,000. After encountering Kaidou, he joined the Beasts Pirates and became one of the crew's Shinuchi.
name: Basil Hawkins

description: The Basilisk is the second-in-command of Impel Down's Level 2: Beast Hell, under the Sphinx.
name: Basilisk

description: Shark Cutter Bastille is a Marine Vice Admiral who took part in the Summit War of Marineford. He later appeared in Dressrosa under the command of Admiral Fujitora.
name: Bastille

description: Batchee is a fly that Fullbody put in his soup to try to humiliate Sanji.
name: Batchee

description: Batman is a Gifter in the Beasts Pirates.
name: Batman

description: Baxcon is a dwarf from Tontatta Kingdom who first appeared in the Riku Royal Army Headquarters beneath the Flower Field.
name: Baxcon

description: Beer VI is the king of the Roshwan Kingdom.
name: Beer VI

description: Belo Betty is the commander of the East Army in the Revolutionary Army.
name: Belo Betty

description: Belladonna is one of the Kuja of Amazon Lily, and the doctor of the island.
name: Belladonna

description: Bellamy the Hyena is the former captain of the Bellamy Pirates, and a former member of the Donquixote Pirates. After the Dressrosa Arc, he retired from piracy and became a dyer.
name: Bellamy

description: Bellett was the prince of an unnamed kingdom who became a pirate and was consequently imprisoned in Impel Down, and whose gender was unwillingly inverted.
name: Bellett

description: Bell-mre was a former Marine and the adoptive mother of Nami and Nojiko, introduced in a flashback during the Arlong Park Arc. She raised the two girls for approximately nine years until she was murdered by Arlong.
name: Bell-mre

description: Benn Beckman, is the first mate of the Red Hair Pirates.
name: Benn Beckman

description: Bentham of the Wild, alias Mr. 2 Bon Kurei, is a former officer agent of Baroque Works and an okama.
name: Bentham

description: Bepo is a polar bear mink and the navigator of the Heart Pirates. He is the younger brother of the late Nox Pirate Zepo.
name: Bepo

description: Bian is a dwarf from Tontatta Kingdom who serves as the leader of the Pink Bee Squad and a member of the Tontatta Pirates.
name: Bian

description: Big Pan is the largest member of the Foxy Pirates and a combatant of the Groggy Monsters. He is a wotan, a half fish-man (loach fish-man) half giant breed.
name: Big Pan

description: Bimine is the mayor of Pucci, The Gourmet Town. He was first mentioned when the town Pucci was brought up by Kalifa.
name: Bimine

description: Bingo is a former priest and cooper who currently lives in Ebisu Town in Wano Country. He formerly lived in the Flower Capital before losing all his money and being exiled.
name: Bingo

description: Bishamon is a ninja and a member of the Beasts Pirates. He previously was a member of the Orochi Oniwabanshu which served the shogun of Wano Country, Kurozumi Orochi.
name: Bishamon

description: Biyo is a child who was held captive on Punk Hazard by Caesar Clown. He was freed with the rest of the children by the Straw Hat Pirates.
name: Biyo

description: Bizarre is an infamous New World pirate captain who was allied with Whitebeard.
name: Bizarre

description: Black Maria is one of the Tobiroppo, the strongest six Shinuchi of the Beasts Pirates. She owns her own brothel on Onigashima near Kaidou's castle.
name: Black Maria

description: Blackback, also known by his initials BB, is a gorilla mink and a Guardian of the Whale Forest.
name: Blackback

description: Blamenco is the commander of the 6th division of the Whitebeard Pirates.
name: Blamenco

description: Blenheim is the commander of the 9th division of the Whitebeard Pirates.
name: Blenheim

description: Blondie is an infamous New World pirate who was allied with Whitebeard.
name: Blondie

description: Blue Fan is a member of the Kuja Pirates.
name: Blue Fan

description: Blue Gilly is a martial artist from the Longleg Tribe. He joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi. He is an ally of Luffy during the Dressrosa Arc. After the battle with the Donquixote Pirates at Dressrosa, he became part of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet when he joined the XXX Gym Martial Arts Alliance, which later converted to a pirate crew called the Ideo Pirates.
name: Blue Gilly

description: Bluejam was the captain of the Bluejam Pirates, and an infamous pirate of the East Blue. He was one of the main antagonists of the Post-War Arc.
name: Bluejam

description: Blueno is a member of CP0.
name: Blueno

description: Blumarine was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.
name: Blumarine

description: Pirate Empress Boa Hancock is the captain of the Kuja Pirates and was the only female Warlord of the Sea prior to the organization's disbandment. She is the current empress, known as the Snake Princess, of Amazon Lily and rules over the Kuja tribe with her two younger Gorgon sisters, Boa Sandersonia and Boa Marigold.
name: Boa Hancock

description: Boa Marigold is one of the three Gorgon Sisters that rule over Amazon Lily, and one of the second-in commands of the Kuja Pirates. She and her sisters are called the Gorgon sisters for supposedly heroically slaying a monster called the Gorgon. She is the younger sister of Boa Hancock and Boa Sandersonia.
name: Boa Marigold

description: Boa Sandersonia is one of the three Gorgon Sisters that rule over Amazon Lily, and one of the second-in commands of the Kuja Pirates. She and her sisters are called the Gorgon Sisters for supposedly heroically slaying a monster called the Gorgon. She is the younger sister of Boa Hancock and the elder sister of Boa Marigold.
name: Boa Sandersonia

description: Sweeper Bobbin is a bishop-ranked combatant of the Big Mom Pirates.
name: Bobbin

description: Bobby Funk is an assassin from the Mogaro Kingdom and Kelly Funk's younger brother. He joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi.
name: Bobby Funk

description: Bobomba is a dwarf from Tontatta Kingdom who first appeared on Green Bit. He is the younger brother of Bomba.
name: Bobomba

description: Bogard is a Marine Headquarters Marine and the right hand man of Vice Admiral Monkey D. Garp. His actual rank is currently unknown.
name: Bogard

description: Bomba is a dwarf from Tontatta Kingdom. He is one of the two vice chiefs of the Tontatta Kingdom along with Rampo, under Gancho and Leo, and serves under Leo in the Tontatta Pirates. He is the elder brother of Bobomba.
name: Bomba

description: Bomba is a dwarf from Tontatta Kingdom. He is one of the two vice chiefs of the Tontatta Kingdom along with Rampo, under Gancho and Leo, and serves under Leo in the Tontatta Pirates. He is the elder brother of Bobomba.
name: Bomba

description: Bongo is a former lumber dealer who currently lives in Ebisu Town in Wano Country. He formerly lived in the Flower Capital, but was exiled after being swindled by Komurasaki.
name: Bongo

description: Bonk Punch is one of the musicians and an officer of the Red Hair Pirates.
name: Bonk Punch

description: Boo is a member of the Chinjao Family and the vice-leader of the Happo Navy. He is a martial artist who joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi. He is an ally of Luffy during the Dressrosa Arc.
name: Boo

description: Boodle is the mayor of Orange Town. He is an ally of the Straw Hat Pirates during the Orange Town Arc.
name: Boodle

description: Boogie is a member of the Kid Pirates.
name: Boogie

description: Borsalino, more commonly known by his alias Kizaru, is an admiral in the Marines. After Aokiji resigned from the Marines and Akainu was promoted to fleet admiral, Kizaru is now the only remaining admiral from the previous trio.
name: Borsalino

description: The Super Spot-Billed Duck Troops are a family of seven Super Spot-Billed Ducks (and later one camel) who serve the kingdom of Arabasta. They are led by their captain Karoo, and are reputed to be the fastest troop in the kingdom of Arabasta. All of the ducks have the strange theme of wearing different types of hats and various other jewelry and clothing. Also strange was that the last member to join the squad, Matsuge, is a camel who helped the Straw Hats confront Baroque Works.
name: Bourbon Jr.

description: Braham is one of the Shandia warriors who fought to take back Upper Yard from Enel.
name: Braham

description: The Tsumegeri Guards were four men who drank the Hero Water and attempted to take down Crocodile, but failed and died from the water's side effects shortly after Crocodile refused to even fight them to give them an honorable death.
name: Brahm

description: Commodore Brannew is a Marine officer stationed at Marine Headquarters who assigns bounties to criminals. He was first introduced as a lieutenant commander during the Loguetown Arc, but was promoted to commodore during the timeskip.
name: Brannew

description: Brew is an infamous New World pirate captain who was subordinate to Whitebeard.
name: Brew

description: Briscola is a Shinuchi in the Beasts Pirates. During the raid on Onigashima, he was tamed by the power of the Kibi Kibi no Mi and joined the side of the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance.
name: Briscola

description: Brocca is an infamous New World pirate captain who was subordinate to Whitebeard.
name: Brocca

description: Brogy the Red Ogre is a giant from Elbaf and one of the two former captains of the Giant Warrior Pirates alongside Dorry. He was an ally of the Straw Hat Pirates during the Little Garden Arc.
name: Brogy

description: Brontosaurus was a dinosaur who lived on Little Garden.
name: Brontosaurus

description: Soul King Brook is the musician of the Straw Hat Pirates, one of their two swordsmen and one of the Senior Officers of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet. He is the ninth member of the crew and the eighth to join, doing so at the end of the Thriller Bark Arc.
name: Brook

description: Bubblegum is a member of the Kid Pirates.
name: Bubblegum

description: Buche is a member of the WCI 31, serving as the head chef of the first kitchen.
name: Buche

description: Buchi is an officer of the Black Cat Pirates. Along with his partner Sham, he is also the protector of the crew's ship, the Bezan Black, and together they are known as the Nyaban Brothers (, Nyban Burazzu?).
name: Buchi

description: Buffalo is a combatant of the Donquixote Pirates and an officer of the Pica Army. His real name is yet to be revealed, as Buffalo is a codename given to him upon joining the Donquixote Pirates.
name: Buffalo

description: Buggy the Star Clown is the captain of the Buggy Pirates as well as the co-leader of the Buggy and Alvida Alliance, and a former apprentice of the Roger Pirates alongside Shanks. Shortly after the Summit War of Marineford, he became a member of the Seven Warlords of the Sea and the leader of the pirate dispatch organization Buggy's Delivery. He later lost his Warlord title when the system was abolished but was then recognized as one of the Four Emperors following the downfalls of Kaidou and Big Mom and the creation of the Cross Guild, of which he is publicly recognized as the leader.
name: Buggy

description: Buhichuck was the boss of the Surprise Zombies in the dining room.
name: Buhichuck

description: Building Snake is the navigator and an officer of the Red Hair Pirates.
name: Building Snake

description: Bunbuku is a teapot owned by Tenguyama Hitetsu that was given life by eating the Inu Inu no Mi, Model: Tanuki.
name: Bunbuku

description: Bungo is an arsonist in Wano Country who currently lives in Ebisu Town. He formerly lived in the Flower Capital, but was exiled after being swindled by Komurasaki.
name: Bungo

description: Bunny Joe is a member of the Revolutionary Army and theleader of the group that rescued people of Tequila Wolf from slavery along with Nico Robin.
name: Bunny Joe

description: Bushon is one of the Sea Train organizers in Water 7, along with Stevie.
name: Bushon

description: Busshiri was one of the archaeologists of Ohara.
name: Busshiri

description: Byron is one of the slaves who was sold at the Human Auctioning House and was the first in the queue for sale. He is a pirate and musician.
name: Byron

description: Cabaji the Acrobat is the Buggy Pirates chief of staff, and a member of the Buggy and Alvida Alliance. He is an acrobat swordsman. He was a member of Buggy's Delivery, and is currently a member of Cross Guild.
name: Cabaji

description: Caesar Clown, who was referred to as Master by his subordinates, is a scientist, a former colleague of Vegapunk; both on the research team MADS and with the World Government. the primary antagonist of the Punk Hazard Arc, and the first main antagonist the Straw Hats face in the New World. He is the leading expert on chemical weapons of mass destruction and has a bounty of 300,000,000 on his head.
name: Caesar Clown

description: Caimanlady is a Gifter in the Beasts Pirates, being part of the surveillance division called the Marys.
name: Caimanlady

description: Camie is a kissing gourami mermaid that first appeared in Hatchan's Sea-Floor Stroll cover story. She first appeared in the main series after being spat out of a large sea boar that was saved by Hatchan, along with her starfish pet and master, Pappag. While dreaming of becoming a designer, she worked on Hatchan's Takoyaki 8 when she first met the Straw Hat Pirates. After the timeskip, she is a waitress at the Mermaid Cafe on Fish-Man Island.
name: Camie

description: Camel is Kuzan's super penguin.
name: Camel

description: Cancer is a Marine vice admiral.
name: Cancer

description: Candre is Andre's twin brother and an officer within the Marines.
name: Candre

description: Cands is an infamous New World pirate who allied himself with Whitebeard. He only appears in the manga.
name: Cands

description: Candy is the captain of the Candy Pirates.
name: Candy

description: Capone Gang Bege is a mafia don-turned-pirate and the captain of the Fire Tank Pirates. He is also one of twelve pirates who are referred to as the Worst Generation. He and his crew came from West Blue, where Bege was one of the heads of the Five Families of the West. During the timeskip, he became a subordinate of Charlotte Linlin and married Charlotte Chiffon. The two have a son named Capone Pez. While working under the Big Mom Pirates, he held a position of a rook-ranked combatant.
name: Capone Bege

description: Capone Gang Pez is the infant son of Capone Bege and Charlotte Chiffon, as well as the grandson of Charlotte Linlin and Pound.
name: Capone Pez

description: Capote is a billfish fish-man and a combatant of the Foxy Pirates.
name: Capote

description: Wet-Haired Caribou is an infamous rookie pirate who was at the Sabaody Archipelago around the time of the Straw Hat Pirates' reunion. He has earned a bounty of 210,000,000, making him part of the new generation of rookie pirates with bounties over 100,000,000.
name: Caribou

description: Mother Carmel was a child trafficker dealing in orphans, that operated in the Underworld several decades ago, under the code name of Mountain Witch. Running an orphanage known as the Sheep's House, her seemingly benevolent nature caused her to be known as the Holy Mother.
name: Carmel

description: Carne is one of the main cooks at the Baratie, currently serving as the restaurant's head charcutier.
name: Carne

description: Carrot is a rabbit mink of the Mokomo Dukedom, a Kingsbird, and a member of the Inuarashi Musketeer Squad. She was trained by Pedro, whose will she carries on.
name: Carrot

description: Rear Admiral Catacombo is the Base Commander of the GR 66 Marine Base on Sabaody Archipelago who led a team to capture the Straw Hat Pirates.
name: Catacombo

description: Catarina Devon, known as the Crescent Moon Hunter, was the most dangerous female pirate ever to be imprisoned in Impel Down within the entire age of pirates. She was freed by Marshall D. Teach.
name: Catarina Devon

description: Cavendish of the White Horse, also known as the Pirate Prince, is a famous Super Rookie and the captain of the Beautiful Pirates. He joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi. After the final battle against Donquixote Doflamingo, Cavendish decided to pledge his loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy and became the captain of the first ship of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet.
name: Cavendish

description: CB Gallant was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.
name: CB Gallant

description: Cerberus was a wild zombie who served under Gecko Moria.
name: Cerberus

description: Cezar is the recently-crowned king of Ilisia Kingdom and one of fifty monarchs who took part in the Levely.
name: Cezar

description: Chabo is a young boy from Gosa Village. He works for Nojiko on her tangerine farm.
name: Chabo

description: Chadros Higelyges, better known as Brownbeard, is a former New World pirate. After Whitebeard's death he went off and took control of Foodvalten, one of the New World islands formerly under Whitebeard's protection.
name: Chadros Higelyges

description: Chaka the Jackal is one of two head guards in the Arabasta kingdom who serves under Igaram, alongside Pell. Chaka was the acting captain of the royal guard in Igaram's absence.
name: Chaka

description: Chao is a dwarf from Tontatta Kingdom who first appeared in the SMILE Factory.
name: Chao

description: Chap is the king of Deul Kingdom (, Doiru koku?) in the North Blue and one of fifty monarchs who took part in the Levely.
name: Chap

description: Charlotte Linlin, better known as Big Mom, is the captain of the Big Mom Pirates and was formerly one of the Four Emperors ruling over the New World, as the only female member of that group. She is also the matriarch of the very large Charlotte Family, whose many children make up the infrastructure of her crew. She is also the creator of the unique race of creatures known as Homies, who mainly inhabit all of Totto Land, and happily serve her. Big Mom possesses three special homies, Napoleon, Prometheus, and Zeus, but unhappy with Zeus' continued failures, Big Mom decided to disown and replace him with a new Homie named Hera.
name: Charlotte Linlin

description: Charlotte Lolais the captain of the Rolling Pirates and the 23rd daughter and 53rd child of the Charlotte Family. Her mother is Emperor Charlotte Linlin and her father is Linlin's 25th husband, Pound. She is the younger twin sister of Chiffon and Gotti's wife.

name: Chinjao

description: Chihaya is a child who lives in the Flower Capital and attends Sarahebi's classes.

name: Choi

description: Chuchun is a Super Sparrow ridden by Itomimizu. He and Itomimizu witnessed all the Davy Back Fight games between the Foxy Pirates and the Straw Hat Pirates.

name: Chuji

name: Clione

description: Professor Clover was the director of the Ohara Library, and a leading authority on archeology. He was a professor and scholar who studied poneglyphs with his fellow colleagues in the Tree of Knowledge.
name: Clover

name: Coburn

description: Cocoa was a member of the Fake Straw Hat Crew who impersonated Nico Robin.
name: Cocoa

description: Cocox is an animal who lives on the Island of Rare Animals. Like all the animals onthe island, he is protected by Gaimon. He is classified as a Type B creature, Small Friendly.
name: Cocox

description: Colscon is an infamous New World pirate captain who allied himself with Whitebeard.
name: Colscon

description: Columbus is a member of the Yonta Maria Grand Fleet.
name: Columbus

description: Vice Admiral Comil is the commander of Marine Base G-2. He first appeared in Portgas D. Ace's cover story, and later took part in the Summit War of Marineford.
name: Comil

description: Compo is a member of the Kid Pirates.
name: Compo

description: Concelot is a fox mink and one of the Three Inuarashi Musketeers leading the squad.
name: Concelot

description: Conis is a citizen of Skypiea who befriended Monkey D. Luffy and his crew after their arrival. She is Pagaya's daughter and owner of a cloud fox named Su.
name: Conis

name: Corgi

description: Blood-Splatterer Coribou is a captain of the Caribou Pirates, along with his big brother Caribou.
name: Coribou

description: Cornelia is a member of the Spade Pirates.
name: Cornelia

description: Cosette is the head chef employed in the Germa Kingdom's royal household.
name: Cosette

description: Sergeant Cosmo is one of the automata created on Karakuri Island by Dr. Tsukimi. Sergeant Cosmo was first introduced in cover story of Enel's Great Space Operations.
name: Cosmo

description: Cosmos is a member of the Kuja Pirates.
name: Cosmos

description: Cotton is a dwarf from Tontatta Kingdom who first appeared in the Riku Royal Army Headquarters beneath the Flower Field.
name: Cotton

description: Couran is the king of Cameron Kingdom (, Kyameron koku?) and one of fifty monarchs who took part in the Levely.
name: Couran

description: The Super Spot-Billed Duck Troops are a family of seven Super Spot-Billed Ducks (and later one camel) who serve the kingdom of Arabasta. They are led by their captain Karoo, and are reputed to be the fastest troop in the kingdom of Arabasta. All of the ducks have the strange theme of wearing different types of hats and various other jewelry and clothing. Also strange was that the last member to join the squad, Matsuge, is a camel who helped the Straw Hats confront Baroque Works.
name: Cowboy

description: Desert King Sir Crocodile is the former president of the mysterious crime syndicate Baroque Works, formerly operating under the codename Mr. 0, with Nico Robin, formerly known as Miss All Sunday, operating as his Vice-President and partner. He is the primary antagonist of the Arabasta Arc and the Arabasta Saga, and a supporting character in the Impel Down Arc and the Marineford Arc.
name: Crocodile

description: Crocus is a doctor and the caretaker of the whale Laboon as well as the overseer of the Twin Cape Lighthouse that guides ships coming down from Reverse Mountain into the Grand Line.
name: Crocus

description: Curiel is the 10th division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates.
name: Curiel

description: Curly Dadan is a friend of Monkey D. Garp and the foster mother of Portgas D. Ace and Monkey D. Luffy. Garp entrusted her to take care of Ace shortly after the boy's birth. Later, Garp also left Luffy in Dadan's care. She took care of Sabo too when he moved in.
name: Curly Dadan

description: Dachoman is a Gifter in the Beasts Pirates.
name: Dachoman

description: Daddy Dee is one of the houseparents, alongside Mummy Mee, of a World Government-affiliated orphanage situated on the Conomi Islands.
name: Daddy Dee

description: Dagama is the tactician of the Prodence Kingdom. He joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi. He is an ally of Luffy during the Dressrosa Arc.
name: Dagama

description: Daidalos was a giant squid that was close friends with Ikaros Much. He was first shown when Ikaros was thinking of him.
name: Daidalos

description: Daifugo is a Shinuchi of the Beasts Pirates who served as a vice warden of the Prisoner Mine in the Udon region of Wano Country until his defeat during the prison uprising. After being tamed by Tama, he became an ally of the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance.
name: Daifugo

description: Daigin is a Marine Commodore who led the team that went to Impel Down to capture the intruder, Monkey D. Luffy.
name: Daigin

description: Daikoku is a ninja and a member of the Beasts Pirates. He previously was a member of the Orochi Oniwabanshu which served the shogun of Wano Country, Kurozumi Orochi.
name: Daikoku

description: Daikon is a dwarf from Tontatta Kingdom who first appeared on Green Bit.
name: Daikon

description: Daisy is a member of the Kuja Pirates.
name: Daisy

description: Vice Admiral Dalmatian is one of the many Marine vice admirals to have participated in the Summit War of Marineford.
name: Dalmatian

description: Dalton is the elected king of the Sakura Kingdom (formerly called the Drum Kingdom). He is a former Royal Guard who once served under Wapol.
name: Dalton

description: Damask is a pyromaniac who joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi.
name: Damask

description: Daruma is a cookie-cutter shark fish-man and an officer of the New Fish-Man Pirates before their downfall and disbandment.
name: Daruma

description: The Killer Daz Bonez is a former bounty hunter who joined Baroque Works and was the highest ranked male Officer Agent and the strongest under Crocodile himself. His codename was Mr. 1 and his partner was Miss Doublefinger.
name: Daz Bonez

description: The Decalvan Brothers are two infamous New World pirates who allied with Whitebeard.
name: Decalvan Brothers

description: Delacuaji is an infamous New World pirate captain who allied with Whitebeard.
name: Delacuaji

description: Dellinger is a combatant and an officer of the Donquixote Pirates' Diamante Army who is a hybrid between a human and a fighting fish fish-man.
name: Dellinger

description: Three-Tongued Demaro Black was the captain of the Fake Straw Hat Crew. He impersonated Monkey D. Luffy to benefit from his reputation, but was later arrested by Sentomaru.
name: Demaro Black

description: Den is Tom's younger brother. He is a bering wolffish merman. He is also a shipwright and a Sea Forest researcher.
name: Den

description: Denjiro is a samurai from Wano Country and one of the Nine Red Scabbards who served as Kozuki Oden's retainers.
name: Denjiro

description: Devil Dias is a pirate and the former captain of the Acumate Pirates, but was captured and sold as a slave to the family of World Noble Saint Rosward.
name: Devil Dias

description: Diamante is one of the top three officers of the Donquixote Pirates. He occupies the Diamond seat of the Donquixote Family and is the leader of the crew's Diamante Army subdivision.
name: Diamante

description: Didit is a noble living in the Goa Kingdom on Dawn Island. She is the wife of Outlook III, the biological mother of Sabo, and the adoptive mother of Sterry.
name: Didit

description: Diesel is a Longarm and a member of the Big Mom Pirates.
name: Diesel

description: Diez Barrelswasa Marine officer who defected to become a pirate. Thirteen years ago, he was the captain of the Barrels Pirates while operating in the North Blue until he was killed by Donquixote Doflamingo during an attempt to sell the Ope Ope no Mi to the Marines. He was also the father of X Drake.
name: Diez Barrels

description: The Dirt Boss is a giant mole awoken by Gedatsu during his work for Goro in his cover story.
name: Dirt Boss

description: Disc J is a member of the Kid Pirates.
name: Disc J

description: Disco is the owner of the now-bankrupt Human Auctioning House at Grove 1 in Sabaody Archipelago.
name: Disco

description: Dive is a member of the Kid Pirates.
name: Dive

description: Dobby Ibadonbo is a man imprisoned in Level 6 of Impel Down.
name: Dobby Ibadonbo

description: Vice Admiral Doberman is a Marine officer and one of the five vice admirals who led the Buster Call against Enies Lobby.
name: Doberman

description: Dobon is a Shinuchi of the Beasts Pirates who serves as a vice warden of the Prisoner Mine in the Udon region of Wano Country.
name: Dobon

description: Doc Q, known as Death God, is the Doctor of the Blackbeard Pirates. Ironically, he has a sick body and needs his horse, Stronger (who is just as sick as he is), to get around.
name: Doc Q

description: Dogra is a member of Dadan's bandits that are active on Mt. Colubo on Dawn Island. He helped take care of Ace and Luffy for Garp.
name: Dogra

description: Dogya is a member of the Spade Pirates.
name: Dogya

description: Doha Ittanka II is a prisoner from Level 6 of Impel Down.
name: Doha Ittanka II

description: Doll is a Marine Vice Admiral and Commander of the G-14 Marine Base.
name: Doll

description: Bohemian Knight Doma is an infamous New World pirate who worked for Whitebeard.
name: Doma

description: Domino is the Head Jailer of Impel Down serving under Warden Hannyabal.
name: Domino

description: Domo-kun and Nnke-kun are aliens planning to conquer the Earth. They are the first joke characters created by Oda. They first appeared in Oda's short story God's Gift for the Future. Later Domo-kun makes an appearance among the Buggy Pirates. Oda answered a question in an SBS and drew both of them. Nnke-kun appeared again alongside Pandaman on the cover of Volume 52.
name: Domo-kun

description: Donannoyo is a Waiter of the Beasts Pirates who serves as a guard in the Prisoner Mine of the Udon region of Wano Country.
name: Donannoyo

description: Donovan is one of the fifty mechanics of the Foxy Pirates. Luffy chose their flag instead of one of their shipwrights.
name: Donovan

description: Donquino was a member of the Roger Pirates.
name: Donquino

description: Donquixote Doflamingo, nicknamed Heavenly Yaksha, is the captain of the Donquixote Pirates. Prior to his imprisonment, he was a member of the Seven Warlords of the Sea with a frozen bounty of 340,000,000, as well as the most influential underworld broker under the codename Joker. He is also a former World Noble, descended from the Donquixote Family.
name: Donquixote Doflamingo

description: Saint Donquixote Homing was the father of Doflamingo and Rosinante. A former World Noble of the Donquixote Family, he withdrew from his position and left Mary Geoise in order to live a normal life with his family. After suffering two years of abuse from prejudiced civilians, Homing was killed by his then ten-year-old son, Doflamingo.
name: Donquixote Homing

description: Saint DonquixoteMjosgard is a World Noble and member of the Donquixote Family.
name: Donquixote Mjosgard

description: Donquixote Rosinante was formerly a World Noble of the Donquixote Family descent, as the second son of Donquixote Homing and the younger brother of Donquixote Doflamingo. After his family lost their status as Celestial Dragons and became pariahs, Rosinante became an Elite Officer of the Donquixote Pirates, serving Doflamingo under the codename Corazon.
name: Donquixote Rosinante

description: Doran is a child who was captured and kept in the Biscuits Room on Punk Hazard. He was freed with the rest of the children by the Straw Hat Pirates.
name: Doran

description: Doringo was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.
name: Doringo

description: Dorry the Blue Ogre is a giant from Elbaf and one of the two former captains of the Giant Warrior Pirates alongside Brogy. He was an ally of the Straw Hat Pirates during the Little Garden Arc.
name: Dorry

description: Dosun is a hammerhead shark fish-man and was one of the officers of the New Fish-Man Pirates.
name: Dosun

description: Dotaku is a samurai who resides in Wano Country.
name: Dotaku

description: Dracule Hawk Eyes Mihawk is a world-famous pirate who holds the title of Strongest Swordsman in the World. He was one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea, the first revealed and formally introduced, until the group's dissolution.
name: Dracule Mihawk

description: Dragon Number Thirteen was a dragon created by Vegapunk to guard Punk Hazard. He carried out this duty even after Vegapunk and the World Government's departure until he was killed by Roronoa Zoro four years later. He was named by one of the World Nobles.
name: Dragon Number Thirteen

description: Draw is a Marine Vice Admiral and the main antagonist of One Piece novel A Volume 1.
name: Draw

description: Drip was a member of the Fake Straw Hat Crew who was posing as the real Sanji.
name: Drip

description: Town-Collapser Drophy, better known by her alias Miss Merry Christmas, is a former officer agent partnered with Mr. 4.
name: Drophy

description: Drug Peclo, also known as the Major Undertaker (, te Sgi-ya?), is an emperor of the Underworld.
name: Drug Peclo

description: Du Feld, known as the God of Fortune, is the Loan Shark King (, Yamikin-?). He is a member of the Du Feld Conglomerate and an emperor of the Underworld.
name: Du Feld

description: Ducky Bree is a member of the Spade Pirates.
name: Ducky Bree

description: Duval is the leader of the Rosy Life Riders, who were initially the Flying Fish Riders kidnapping gang in the neighborhood of Fish-Man Island and Sabaody Archipelago. He was initially an enemy of the Straw Hats; however, he has since become their ally.
name: Duval

description: Eddy was the navigator of the Bellamy Pirates.
name: Eddy

description: Edison, also designated as Punk-03 (PUNK-03, Panku-Sur?), is one of the six satellites of Dr. Vegapunk, embodying his aspect of thinking.
name: Edison

description: Edward Newgate, more commonly known as Whitebeard, was the captain of the Whitebeard Pirates and was widely known as the Strongest Man in the World and, after Gol D. Roger's death, the Man Closest to One Piece.
name: Edward Newgate

description: Edward Weevil, or Whitebeard Jr., is a pirate claiming to be the son of Edward Whitebeard Newgate. He is the son of Miss Bakkin, the self-proclaimed lover of Newgate. He served as one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea, whom he joined sometime during the two-year timeskip, and did so until the Warlords' dissolution.
name: Edward Weevil

description: Eiri is a giant who resided on Elbaf 63 years ago. He was once severely injured by a young Charlotte Linlin.
name: Eiri

description: Egana is Margarita's employer.
name: Egana

description: Eggplant Soldier is a soldier of the Big Mom Pirates, serving as a guard at the Whole Cake Chateau. He was Sanji's helper during his stay at the castle before his planned wedding to Charlotte Pudding.
name: Eggplant Soldier

description: The Fighting King Elizabello II is the king of Prodence Kingdom. He is also a fighter who joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi. He is an ally of Luffy during the Dressrosa Arc.
name: Elizabello II

description: Elmy is an infamous New World pirate captain who allied with the Whitebeard Pirates.
name: Elmy

description: Emma is a member of the Kid Pirates.
name: Emma

description: Emporio Ivankov, or Iva for short, is the Queen of the Kamabakka Kingdom, known as Okama King and a Miracle Person, and is a commander of the Revolutionary Army, commanding the G Army which covers the Grand Line.
name: Emporio Ivankov

description: Enel is the former tyrannical God of Skypiea.
name: Enel

description: Enishida is a member of the Kuja and one of Boa Hancock's attendants in her castle. She is a lady's maid.
name: Enishida

description: Epoida is an infamous New World pirate captain who was once a member of the Whitebeard Pirates, before forming his own crew subordinate to Whitebeard.
name: Epoida

description: poni is a nurse in service to the royal household of the Germa Kingdom. She was primarily charged with caring for the late queen, Vinsmoke Sora.
name: poni

description: Erik is a member of the Rebel Army in Arabasta led by Koza. He is from Suiren, a town that had been completely dried out.
name: Erik

description: Erio was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.
name: Erio

description: Esta is a citizen of Dressrosa.
name: Esta

description: Eustass Captain Kid is a notorious pirate from South Blue and the captain of the Kid Pirates. He is one of twelve pirates who are referred to as the Worst Generation.
name: Eustass Kid

description: Farafra was a member of the Rebel Army led by Koza along with Erik. He lost his right arm and right shoulder while protecting Koza during an enemy attack.
name: Farafra

description: Farul is Cavendish's pet horse and a member of the Beautiful Pirates.
name: Farul

description: Faust is a cat mink from North Blue and a member of the Hawkins Pirates, serving as the crew's magician.
name: Faust

description: Fen Bock of the Gourd is an ex-prisoner. During the Punk Hazard Arc, he worked as a satyr henchman for Caesar Clown.
name: Fen Bock

description: Finamore is a member of the Spade Pirates.
name: Finamore

description: Fillonce is a mermaid and an employee at Mermaid Caf.
name: Fillonce

description: Dr. Fishbonen is a Marine naval surgeon ( Gun'i) stationed at Marineford.
name: Fishbonen

description: Fisher Tiger, known as the Adventurer, was a sea bream Fish-Man and the founder and original captain of the Sun Pirates.
name: Fisher Tiger

description: Flapper is a dwarf from Tontatta Kingdom who first appeared on Green Bit, when he stopped Leo from taking Robin's clothes and belongings. He participated in Operation SOP and became a temporary victim of Sugar's Hobi Hobi no Mi.
name: Flapper

description: The Forest Boss is a large baboon that was first introduced in Gedatsu's cover story.
name: Forest Boss

description: Forliewbs is an infamous New World pirate captain who was subordinate to the Whitebeard Pirates.
name: Forliewbs

description: Fossa is the commander of the 15th division of the Whitebeard Pirates.
name: Fossa

description: Fourtricks is a Shinuchi in the Beasts Pirates.
name: Fourtricks

description: Foxy the Silver Fox is the captain of the Foxy Pirates, and the main antagonist of the Long Ring Long Land Arc.
name: Foxy

description: Francois is a former prisoner of Impel Down and resident of Newkama Land in Level 5.5.
name: Francois

description: Iron Man Franky is the shipwright of the Straw Hat Pirates and one of the Senior Officers of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet. He is the crew's eighth member and the seventh to join, doing so at the end of the Post-Enies Lobby Arc.
name: Franky

description: Fuga is a member of the Numbers in the Beasts Pirates, representing the number two.
name: Fuga

description: Fugetsu Omusubi was a samurai who, as a member of the Fugetsu Family, served as the most recent daimyo of the Kibi region until he was imprisoned and killed by Kaidou 20 years ago.
name: Fugetsu Omusubi

description: Fujin is a ninja and a member of the Beasts Pirates. He previously was a member of the Orochi Oniwabanshu which served the shogun of Wano Country, Kurozumi Orochi.
name: Fujin

description: Fukaboshi is a shark merman and the eldest son of the royal Neptune Family on Fish-Man Island. After he, his father and his brothers were liberated by the Straw Hat Pirates, he allied himself with them against Hody Jones and his crew.
name: Fukaboshi

description: Fukurokuju is a ninja and the previous captain of the Orochi Oniwabanshu before they joined the Beasts Pirates following Orochi's deposition. Though he pledged his team's support to Kaidou, Fukurokuju remained loyal to the surviving Orochi and helped him attempt to get revenge. However, Fukurokuju was ultimately bested in combat by his rival Raizo as his and Orochi's plot failed.
name: Fukurokuju

description: Fukurou the Silent is a former member of CP9 and one of the last to be introduced.
name: Fukurou

description: Double Ironfist Fullbody is a Marine lieutenant commander serving under Rear Admiral Hina. He was a Marine Headquarters lieutenant at the start of the series, but was demoted to seaman recruit as a condition when he helped the former Black Cat pirate, Jango, get acquitted for his past crimes (in the anime, it was after getting into a fight with Sanji on the Baratie). During the timeskip, however, he rose back through the ranks to become a commissioned officer once again, being one rank higher than he was to begin with in the series.
name: Fullbody

description: Funkfreed is Spandam's sword, a unique weapon that ate the Zou Zou no Mi and became an Elephant Sword (, Zken?). As such, he also serves as a pet and unofficial bodyguard for Spandam, compensating his master's physical slightness.
name: Funkfreed

description: Furrari is the king of Nagagutsu Kingdom (, Nagagutsu koku?) and one of fifty monarchs who took part in the Levely. He is also the father of Tritobu.
name: Furrari

description: Fuza is the name of the giant Sanjocho (, Sanjch?, literally meaning Three Length Bird) of the Skypiean Priest, Shura, who rode on it to get around to the different places at Skypiea.
name: Fuza

description: Gaimon is a former pirate who currently lives as a hermit on the Island of Rare Animals.
name: Gaimon

description: Gal is a member of the G-5 branch of the Marines.
name: Gal

description: General Galaxy is one of the automata created on Karakuri Island by Dr. Tsukimi. General Galaxy was first introduced in cover story of Enel's Great Space Operations.
name: Galaxy

description: Loan Shark Galdino, alias Mr. 3, is a former officer agent of Baroque Works, alongside his partner Miss Goldenweek.
name: Galdino

description: Crescent-Moon Gally is the captain of the Gally Pirates, and the main antagonist of the very first version of Romance Dawn, which was later reimagined for Romance Dawn Story with a slightly different design. Another version of him also appeared briefly in the filler portions of the Loguetown Arc, likewise with a different design. In Chapter 902, he officially made his manga debut in a cameo appearance at the Baratie upon the conclusion of the Whole Cake Island Arc.
name: Gally

description: Gama Pyonnosuke is a toad that sat atop Usopp's head during his stay in Wano Country.
name: Gama Pyonnosuke

description: The Missionary Gambia is the staff officer of the Barto Club. He was also a gladiator competing at the Corrida Colosseum for the Mera Mera no Mi.
name: Gambia

description: Gan Fall is the current, two-time God of Skypiea, having been usurped once by Enel. During Enel's reign as God, Gan Fall worked as a mercenary and called himself the Knight of the Sky.
name: Gan Fall

description: Gancho is the king, also called Tonta-Chief (, Tonta-Ch?), of the Tontatta Kingdom.
name: Gancho

description: Ganryu is a member of the Spade Pirates and a member of the Longarm Tribe.
name: Ganryu

description: Ganryu is a member of the Spade Pirates and a member of the Longarm Tribe.
name: Ganryu

description: Gatherine is a cafeteria worker at Enies Lobby.
name: Gatherine

description: Gatz is the announcer at the Corrida Colosseum.
name: Gatz

description: Gazelleman is a Gifter in the Beasts Pirates. After being tamed by Tama, he became an ally of the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance.
name: Gazelleman

description: Gecko Moria is the captain of the Thriller Bark Pirates and a former member of the Seven Warlords of the Sea who resides on Thriller Bark, the largest ship in the world. His bounty is 320,000,000, which was frozen until he lost his Warlord position.
name: Gecko Moria

description: Sky Boss Gedatsu was one of Enel's priests who punished criminals with the Ordeal of Swamp during Enel's reign.
name: Gedatsu

description: Gem of the Border, better known by his alias Mr. 5, was formerly the lowest-ranked officer agent in Baroque Works along with his partner, Miss Valentine. He now works as a fireman at the new Spiders Cafe alongside most of his former colleagues.
name: Gem

description: Genbo is one of the Shandia warriors that fought to take back the Upper Yard from Enel.
name: Genbo

description: Genrin is an old man who lives in Ebisu Town.
name: Genrin

description: Genzo is the sheriff of Cocoyasi Village. He is an ally of the Straw Hat Pirates during the Arlong Park Arc.
name: Genzo

description: Impel Down, also known as the Underwater Prison (, Kaitei Kangoku?) or the Great Prison (, Dai Kangoku?), is a government-controlled stronghold in Paradise together with Marine Headquarters and Enies Lobby. It is the World Government's maximum-security prison for the most dangerous criminals and pirates. It is located underwater in the middle of the Calm Belt and part of the Tarai Current.
name: George Black

description: George Mach is a member of the Foxy Pirates. He fought Mountain Ricky before the third round of the Davy Back Fight.
name: George Mach

description: Gerd is a giant from Elbaf and the doctor of the New Giant Warrior Pirates. She was formerly an S-Class ranked mercenary for Buggy's Delivery.
name: Gerd

description: Giberson, known as The Concealer, is a veteran warehouseman and one of the emperors of the Underworld.
name: Giberson

description: Gig is a member of the Kid Pirates.
name: Gig

description: Gimletwasthe infant son of Senor Pink and Russian.
name: Gimlet

description: Gin the Man-Demon is a pirate and the Combat Commander (, Sent staich?) of the Krieg Pirates. He is initially introduced as a mere combatant of Krieg before his actual rank and abilities are made clear.
name: Gin

description: Gina is the female carpenter of the Foxy Pirates.
name: Gina

description: Ginko is a little girl who lived on Punk Hazard. She was one of the children Momonosuke met when he came to the island. She is only named in the anime.
name: Ginko

description: Ginnosuke is a child who lives in the Flower Capital and attends Sarahebi's classes.
name: Ginnosuke

description: Ginrummy is a Shinuchi of the Beasts Pirates.
name: Ginrummy

description: Giro Chintaro is a samurai from Wano Country who was appointed as the kaishakunin for Zorojuro's seppuku ritual.
name: Giro Chintaro

description: Giolla is an officer of the Donquixote Pirates' Trebol Army.
name: Giolla

description: Gion, better known by her alias Momousagi, is a Marine vice admiral.
name: Gion

description: Giovanni is a zebra mink and one of the Three Inuarashi Musketeers leading the squad.
name: Giovanni

description: Gladius is an officer of the Donquixote Pirates' Pica Army.
name: Gladius

description: Gloriosa is a former empress of the Kuja tribe from one generation before Shakuyaku, two generation before an unkown Kuja, and three generations before Boa Hancock took over. She is more commonly referred to as Elder Nyon.
name: Gloriosa

description: Commander Glove is one of the Marine commanders that helped in the Buster Call on Enies Lobby. He was quickly defeated by Franky during the Buster Call at Enies Lobby.
name: Glove

description: Sage Gode is one of the three Birkan clergymen who lived on Skypiea and served Enel.
name: Gode

description: The Going Merry was the first full-sized ship owned by the Straw Hat Pirates, a caravel that served as their main transportation through the East Blue, and the Grand Line up until Water 7. It was often affectionally referred to as simply Merry (, Mer?) by the crew.
name: Going Merry

description: Goki is a member of the Numbers in the Beasts Pirates, representing the number five.
name: Goki

description: Gol D. Roger, more commonly known as Gold Roger, was a legendary pirate who, as captain of the Roger Pirates, held the title of Pirate King and owned the legendary treasure known as One Piece. He was also the lover of Portgas D. Rouge and the biological father of Portgas D. Ace.
name: Gol D. Roger

description: Goldberg is a giant from Elbaf who is the cook of the New Giant Warrior Pirates and was formerly an S-Class ranked mercenary for Buggy's Delivery.
name: Goldberg

description: The Goldfish Princess is a character in the Hatchan's Sea-Floor Stroll cover story.
name: Goldfish Princess

description: Gomorrah is one of the two gigantic King Bulls (sea horses in the most literal sense) owned by the Franky Family, the other being Sodom.
name: Gomorrah

description: Gonbe is known as Chimney's pet cat, although he is actually a rabbit.
name: Gonbe

description: Captain Goo is a pirate captain who, along with his crew, had their shadows stolen by Gecko Moria.
name: Goo

description: Captain Gorilla is a Marine officer who was sent to investigate the Nightmare of Baldimore accidentally caused by Franky.
name: Gorilla

description: Gorishiro is a gorilla that is attached to Mizerka's body due to her consumption of a gorilla SMILE.
name: Gorishiro

description: Goro is Toto's younger brother and Koza'spaternal uncle. He appeared in Gedatsu's cover story.
name: Goro

description: Gorobe is a citizen of Okobore Town in the Kuri region of Wano Country.
name: Gorobe

description: Hit Man Gotti is an assassin, a combatant in the Fire Tank Pirates, and the husband of Charlotte Lola.
name: Gotti

description: Grabar is a dwarf from Tontatta Kingdom who first appeared on Green Bit. She is Leo's grandmother.
name: Grabar

description: Gram was one of the archaeologists of Ohara.
name: Gram

description: Great Michael is an infamous New World pirate who allied himself with Whitebeard.
name: Great Michael

description: Guernica is a member of the intelligence agency CP0 and a Longarm tribesman.
name: Guernica

description: Gyaro is a member of the Macro Pirates. He is a pop-eyed goldfish fish-man. He was also once a member of the Sun Pirates, before its disbandment.
name: Gyaro

description: Gyoro, Nin, and Bao were a trio of oddly shaped Soldier Zombies that were first seen reporting to Moria about the Straw Hats' arrival.
name: Gyoro

description: Gyoru is a fishmonger in Foosha Village and the husband of Chicken. Luffy bought fish from him when he was a kid.
name: Gyoru

description: Crab-Hand Gyro is the captain of the Gyro Pirates from South Blue that was on its way to the New World before an unfortunate meeting with the New Fish-Man Pirates.
name: Gyro

description: Hundredth Dan Hack is a Japanese soldierfish fish-man and a member of the Revolutionary Army. He went to Dressrosa to investigate the arms trafficking there and competed at the Corrida Colosseum for the Mera Mera no Mi.
name: Hack

description: Hundredth Dan Hack is a Japanese soldierfish fish-man and a member of the Revolutionary Army. He went to Dressrosa to investigate the arms trafficking there and competed at the Corrida Colosseum for the Mera Mera no Mi.
name: Hack

description: Hajrudin is a giant warrior described as the new generation from Elbaf. He joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi, where he met Monkey D. Luffy and eventually pledged his loyalty towards him.
name: Hajrudin

description: Hakowan is Wapol's pet dog, acquired after Wapol was permanently deposed from Drum Island.
name: Hakowan

description: Ham Burger is the king of the Ballywood Kingdom, acting as chairman of the present Levely.
name: Ham Burger

description: Hamburg is a combatant of the Foxy Pirates and also the leader of the Groggy Monsters. Along with Porche, he was one of Foxy's first crewmates.
name: Hamburg

description: Hamlet is a Shinuchi in the Beasts Pirates. During the raid on Onigashima, he was tamed by the power of the Kibi Kibi no Mi and joined the side of the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance.
name: Hamlet

description: Hammond is a member of the New Fish-Man Pirates. He is a Daggertooth pike conger Fish-Man.
name: Hammond

description: Han-ko is a child from Ebisu Town.
name: Han

description: O-Hana is a citizen of Wano Country, residing in the Flower Capital.
name: Hana

description: Hangan is an infamous New World pirate who allied himself with Whitebeard.
name: Hangan

description: Hanger is an employee at Robecca Hanberg, a clothing store in Loguetown. Nami tried on all of his best clothes, but did not buy any.
name: Hanger

description: Hanji is a former prisoner of Udon's Prisoner Mine.
name: Hanji

description: Hannyabal is the warden of Impel Down. He was introduced in the Impel Down Arc as the Vice Warden and secondary antagonist, but during the two year timeskip, was promoted to Magellan's former position and is now in charge of Impel Down.
name: Hannyabal

description: Hanzo is a ninja and a member of the Beasts Pirates. He previously was a member of the Orochi Oniwabanshu which served the shogun of Wano Country, Kurozumi Orochi.
name: Hanzo

description: Happa Yamao is a civilian of Water 7 whom Usopp bought wood and supplies from in order to repair the Going Merry. Happa also gave Usopp some rice balls. He is an old bandit turned carpenter who moved to Water 7 from the Gourmet City, Pucci.
name: Happa Yamao

description: Happygun is an infamous New World pirate who was subordinate to Whitebeard.
name: Happygun

description: Hara is a resident who lives in the Flower Capital of Wano Country.
name: Hara

description: Haredas is an old man who lives in Weatheria. He was Nami's tutor in weather-manipulation during the timeskip.
name: Haredas

description: Harisenbon is a porcupinefish fish-man and a member of the now disbanded New Fish-Man Pirates. He was the commander of the Sea Urchin Armor Spine Squad.
name: Harisenbon

description: Haritsu Kendiyo is a pirate captain whose crew was captured by the Kid Pirates as they tried to escape back to Paradise from the New World.
name: Haritsu Kendiyo

description: Haruta is the commander of the 12th division of the Whitebeard Pirates.
name: Haruta

description: Hasami is a giant desert crab who aided Vivi and the Straw Hat Pirates in escaping from Rainbase and Crocodile. He is a friend of Matsuge, and according to Matsuge's and Chopper's translations, he is a pervert.
name: Hasami

description: Hatcha is a member of the Numbers in the Beasts Pirates, representing the number eight.
name: Hatcha

description: Hatchan, nicknamed Hachi (, Hachi?), is an octopus fish-man who was an officer of the Arlong Pirates before their defeat, and a member of the Sun Pirates before that.
name: Hatchan

description: Hattori is Rob Lucci's pet pigeon.
name: Hattori

description: Heat is a member of the Kid Pirates.
name: Heat

description: Lieutenant Commander Helmeppo is a Marine officer and the son of ex-Marine Captain Axe-Hand Morgan. Once a civilian who shamelessly exploited his father's status, he (together with Koby) underwent extensive training under Vice-Admiral Garp to become a full-fledged serviceman, currently holding the rank of lieutenant commander. He is also a member of the secret group known as SWORD.
name: Helmeppo

description: Heppoko is a member of the Alvida Pirates and the triplet brother of Peppoko and Poppoko.
name: Heppoko

description: Hera is a thundercloud homie created by Big Mom at Wano Country as a replacement for Zeus. She is a special kind of homie, having received a soul fragment from Big Mom herself, and serves as one of her personal weapons alongside Prometheus and Napoleon.
name: Hera

description: Hera is a thundercloud homie created by Big Mom at Wano Country as a replacement for Zeus. She is a special kind of homie, having received a soul fragment from Big Mom herself, and serves as one of her personal weapons alongside Prometheus and Napoleon.
name: Hera

description: Heracles is a strange warrior that used to reside in the Greenstone forest in the Boin Archipelago. He trained Usopp in the use of Pop Greens for two years.
name: Heracles

description: Herb was a Shandia from 400 years ago. She was Kalgara's wife and Mousse's mother.
name: Herb

description: Hewitt was the chef of the Bellamy Pirates.
name: Hewitt

description: Hibari is a Marine Commander. She is also a member of SWORD.
name: Hibari

description: Hidayu is a samurai who allied with the Kozuki Family. After waiting 20 years for the return of the Nine Red Scabbards, he affiliated with the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance to raid Onigashima.
name: Hidayu

description: Higuma was a mountain bandit and the leader of the Higuma Bandits. He was the first antagonist to be introduced in the series, and the first of three in the Romance Dawn Arc (third of three in the anime).
name: Higuma

description: Hihimaru is a baboon that was formerly a guard for the Beasts Pirates before being tamed by Tama.
name: Hihimaru

description: The Super Spot-Billed Duck Troops are a family of seven Super Spot-Billed Ducks (and later one camel) who serve the kingdom of Arabasta. They are led by their captain Karoo, and are reputed to be the fastest troop in the kingdom of Arabasta. All of the ducks have the strange theme of wearing different types of hats and various other jewelry and clothing. Also strange was that the last member to join the squad, Matsuge, is a camel who helped the Straw Hats confront Baroque Works.
name: Hikoichi

description: Hildon was a Wild Zombie that resembled a stitched-up vampire. He appeared to act as a messenger in-between the members of Thriller Bark's Mysterious Four, reporting to them noteworthy events that were happening throughout the island ship before it fell.
name: Hildon

description: Black Cage Hina is a Marine officer and a former classmate of Vice Admiral Smoker. Jango and Fullbody are currently her subordinates. She was originally introduced as a captain. During the timeskip, she was promoted to the rank of rear admiral.
name: Hina

description: Hip is a member of the Kid Pirates.
name: Hip

description: Hippo Gentleman was a Wild Zombie who worked under Perona. He was the vice commander of the Wild Zombies.
name: Hippo Gentleman

description: Hiramera is an olive flounder mermaid and a dancer in the Mermaid Caf.
name: Hiramera

description: Dr. Hiriluk was a quack doctor from Drum Island, as well as Tony Tony Chopper's father figure. He was also a former thief.
name: Hiriluk

description: Hiroshi is a resident of Bakura Town in Wano Country who runs a restaurant alongside Wakasa; the two of them own a tanuki named Saikoro which the sumo wrestler Urashima forced to be cooked and served to him.
name: Hiroshi

description: Duke Hitsugisukan is a sheep mink and the former ruler of the Mokomo Dukedom before Inuarashi and Nekomamushi.
name: Hitsugisukan

description: Dr. Ho is the palace medic of Arabasta's royal family. He seems to hold Drum medicine in high regard.
name: Ho

description: Hocha was one of the archaeologists of Ohara.
name: Hocha

description: Hocker was the owner of the Pet Food Shop in Orange Town and theowner of Chouchou.
name: Hocker

description: Hody Jones is a great white shark fish-man, the captain of the New Fish-Man Pirates before their downfall, and a former soldier of the Neptune Army.
name: Hody Jones

description: Hoe is the pet whale of King Neptune who uses him as a means of transportation. The only word he can say is his own name.
name: Hoe

description: Dr. Hogback is a world-renowned surgeon who joined the Thriller Bark Pirates under the employment of Gecko Moria and assisted him in creating his undead army. He was one of the Mysterious Four and one of the major antagonists of the Thriller Bark Saga. He also acts as the de facto main antagonist in the anime only Great Mikoshi Race Arc.
name: Hogback

description: Michael and Hoichael are two kids who are troublemakers in the backstreets of Water 7. They idolize Franky, and even dress like him and use his motto as their own: Mm, super!! They also idolize Paulie. However, their backstreet delinquency has earned them ire from at least Tilestone and Peepley Lulu.
name: Hoichael

description: Holed'em is a Shinuchi of the Beasts Pirates, who resides in Bakura Town.
name: Holed'em

description: Holy is a large, pale yellow dog that Ohm tends to ride around while traveling and fighting. Holy is very loyal to Ohm, and is a powerful fighter who knows martial arts.
name: Holy

description: Home is a bull that acts as a steed for Ashura Doji.
name: Home

description: Hongo is the doctor and an officer of the Red Hair Pirates.
name: Hongo

description: Dr. Honner was the doctor aboard Mont Blanc Noland's expedition fleet 400 years ago.
name: Honner

description: Hop is a member of the Kid Pirates.
name: Hop

description: Hotei is the former captain of the Mimawarigumi, a samurai police force in Wano Country that served the shogun Kurozumi Orochi until he was deposed by Kaidou.
name: Hotei

description: Hotori and Kotori are the younger brothers of Satori. They are lieutenants of the Divine Soldiers, an army of 50 warriors under the command of Yama, their leader, and Enel. They are minor antagonists during the Skypiea Arc.
name: Hotori

description: House is a member of the Kid Pirates.
name: House

description: Howling Gab is an officer of the Red Hair Pirates.
name: Howling Gab

description: Hublot is a member of the Spade Pirates.
name: Hublot

description: Humphrey is a bartender at Sabaody Archipelago.
name: Humphrey

description: Hustle is a member of Krieg Pirates. He is a combat instructor and is only mentioned in the One Piece Blue Data book. He only appeared in the manga.
name: Hustle

description: Hyogoro of the Flower is the former yakuza boss of the Flower Capital and the most famous yakuza in Wano Country during the Kozuki Family's reign. During Kurozumi Orochi's reign, he was imprisoned in Udon's prisoner mines until he was freed by Monkey D. Luffy. As a prisoner, he was known as Grandpa Hyo (, Hy-jii?).
name: Hyogoro

description: The Tsumegeri Guards were four men who drank the Hero Water and attempted to take down Crocodile, but failed and died from the water's side effects shortly after Crocodile refused to even fight them to give them an honorable death.
name: Hyota

description: Hyoutauros is a jaguar centaur and member of the Centaur Patrol Unit on Punk Hazard.
name: Hyoutauros

description: Hyouzou is a poisonous blue-ringed octopus merman. Prior to his imprisonment, he was a mercenary and working as the New Fish-Man Pirates' assassin, and later became one of the officers. Hyouzou was also known as the best swordsman on Fish-Man Island.
name: Hyouzou

description: Ibiributsu is a Waiter of the Beasts Pirates who serves as a guard in the Prisoner Mine of the Udon region of Wano Country. He is in charge of exchanging meal tickets for kibi dango.
name: Ibiributsu

description: Ibusu is a supposed pirate captain who affiliates and trades with the Donquixote Pirates. As his ship is later discovered to be a trading vessel for the Doerena Kingdom, it is unknown if he is truly a pirate captain.
name: Ibusu

description: Iceburg is the president of the Galley-La company and the mayor of Water 7.
name: Iceburg

description: The Medaka Mermaid Quintuplets (, Medaka no Ningyo no Itsutsugo?, VIZ Media: Guppy Mermaid Quintuplets) are five young Japanese rice fish mermaids who are friends with Camie. Their names are Ichika, Nika, Sanka, Yonka, and Yonka Two.
name: Ichika

description: Ideaman is a member of Krieg Pirates. He is the Staff Officer of Planning.
name: Ideaman

description: Destruction Cannon Ideo is a XXX rank boxer and member of the Longarm Tribe who is the captain of the Ideo Pirates and the captain of the fourth ship of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet. He joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi, where he met three other gladiators who he would form the then-XXX Gym Martial Arts Alliance with, as well as Monkey D. Luffy, whom he eventually pledged his loyalty towards.
name: Ideo

description: Igaram is the captain of the Arabasta royal guard (captain of Arabasta security in the English dub). He aided Nefertari Vivi in infiltrating Baroque Works as a Frontier Agent and took on the codename Mr. 8. He was partnered with Miss Monday. He is also Terracotta's husband.
name: Igaram

description: Ikaros Much is a giant squid fish-man and an officer of the New Fish-Man Pirates before their downfall and disbandment.
name: Ikaros Much

description: Ikkaku is the only female member of the Heart Pirates.
name: Ikkaku

description: Ikkaku is the only female member of the Heart Pirates.
name: Ikkaku

description: Im is the ruler of the world and holder of the Empty Throne, bearing the highest sovereignty within the World Government that even the Five Elders bow down to. However, Im's existence is kept a secret within the government and from the rest of the world.
name: Im

description: Inazuma is a newkama and the deputy commander of the G Army in the Revolutionary Army who serves under Emporio Ivankov.
name: Inazuma

description: Inbi is a member of the Numbers in the Beasts Pirates, representing the number one.
name: Inbi

description: Dr. Indigo is the scientist of the Golden Lion Pirates and the secondary antagonist of the tenth One Piece Movie. He is the one who created Boss and the other monstrous animals under Shiki's dominion.
name: Indigo

description: Inhel is a dwarf from the Tontatta Kingdom who first appeared in the Riku Royal Army Headquarters beneath the Flower Field.
name: Inhel

description: Inoichibannosuke is a firefighter who works for the fire department Igumi (, Igumi?), which he claims is the best in Wano Country.
name: Inoichibannosuke

description: Duke Inuarashi is a canine mink and was one of the two rulers of the Mokomo Dukedom, dubbed the Ruler of Day as he formerly ruled over the Mokomo Dukedom from 6:00 AM to 6:00 PM. He and Nekomamushi serve as retainers for the Kozuki Family of Wano Country, as members of the Nine Red Scabbards.
name: Inuarashi

description: Inukai is a Wano Country official.
name: Inukai

description: Inuppe was a Wild Zombie on Thriller Bark in the service of Gecko Moria who was eventually assigned to guard Hogback.
name: Inuppe

description: Ipponmatsu is the owner of an arms shop in Loguetown and Ipponume's husband. He was the former owner of both Sandai Kitetsu and Yubashiri.
name: Ipponmatsu

description: Ipponume is Ipponmatsu's wife.
name: Ipponume

description: Isa is a Shandia woman and Aisa's mother.
name: Isa

description: Ishigo Shitemanna is an appraiser in Water 7.
name: Ishigo Shitemanna

description: Ishilly is a striped beakfish mermaid who lives on Fish-Man Island and was first seen in Mermaid Cove. She is an employee at Mermaid Caf.
name: Ishilly

description: Island Eater was a giant goldfish that inhabited the sea near Little Garden. He was said to be the main reason ships leaving the island never reached their destination. He was classified as a Type C creature, Big Savage.
name: Island Eater

description: Islewan is an infamous New World pirate captain who was once a member of the Whitebeard Pirates, before forming his own crew subordinate to Whitebeard.
name: Islewan

description: Issho, better known by his alias Fujitora, is an admiral in the Marines. He was conscripted through a World Military Draft during the two-year timeskip, being appointed to his rank (next to Ryokugyu) to fill the two admiral vacancies caused by Aokiji's resignation and Sakazuki's promotion. A proponent of Humane Justice, Fujitora notably spearheaded a campaign for the abolishment of the Seven Warlords of the Sea system, which came to pass during the most recent Levely.
name: Issho

description: Nailing Isuka is a Marine Ensign that confronted the Spade Pirates during their time of activity.
name: Isuka

description: Itomimizu is the Foxy Pirates' game official and serves as the announcer and commentator of the Davy Back Fight events. He rides on a very large bird named Chuchun.
name: Itomimizu

description: The Super Spot-Billed Duck Troops are a family of seven Super Spot-Billed Ducks (and later one camel) who serve the kingdom of Arabasta. They are led by their captain Karoo, and are reputed to be the fastest troop in the kingdom of Arabasta.
