All of the ducks have the strange theme of wearing different types of hats and various other jewelry and clothing. Also strange was that the last member to join the squad, Matsuge, is a camel who helped the Straw Hats confront Baroque Works.
name: Ivan X

description: Izou was the former commander of the 16th division of the Whitebeard Pirates and prior to this, a retainer of the Wano Country daimyo Kozuki Oden. He was the older brother of fellow retainer Kikunojo.
name: Izou

description: Iwatobi is the king of Whiteland Kingdom (, Howaitorando koku?) in the North Blue and one of fifty monarchs who took part in the Levely.
name: Iwatobi

description: Jabra is a former member of CP9 and one of the last to be introduced. He was the third strongest in the organization.
name: Jabra

description: Jack the Drought is an All-Star of the Beasts Pirates as one of Kaidou's three closest confidants, and the captain of the Mammoth. He was formerly considered to be the ruler of the region of Kuri in Wano Country. He is also a giant grouper fish-man.
name: Jack

description: Jacksonbanner was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.
name: Jacksonbanner

description: Jaguar is a member of the Kid Pirates.
name: Jaguar

description: Jaguar D. Saul was a giant and a former Vice Admiral who first appeared as a castaway on the island of Ohara. He was introduced in Nico Robin's flashback during the Enies Lobby Arc, and by then he had already defected from the Marines.
name: Jaguar D. Saul

description: Jaki is a member of the Numbers in the Beasts Pirates, representing the number four.
name: Jaki

description: Saint Jalmack is a World Noble who was introduced ten years prior to the start of the series.
name: Jalmack

description: Jango the Turncoat is a hypnotist and Marine lieutenant commander serving under Rear Admiral Hina. He was formerly the captain of the Black Cat Pirates and Captain Kuro's first mate.
name: Jango

description: Mountain Beard Jarul is a giant and former co-captain of the Giant Warrior Pirates, alongside Jorul. Along with Jorul, he is known as a hero of the giants and one of the world's oldest warriors.
name: Jarul

description: Jean Ango, also known as Jean the Bandit, is a bounty hunter. He joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi.
name: Jean Ango

description: Jean Bart is a pirate who was originally introduced as Saint Rosward's slave, being part of his Pirate Captain Collection. He currently serves under Trafalgar Law as a member of the Heart Pirates after being freed from the World Noble.
name: Jean Bart

description: Jean Goen is a prisoner on Level 1 of Impel Down.
name: Jean Goen

description: Jeep is the king of South Fire Kingdom (, Minami Fai koku?)  and one of fifty monarchs who took part in the Levely. He is also the father of Wheel.
name: Jeep

description: Jeet is a criminal and a former bounty hunter who joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi, along with his partner, Abdullah. He is an ally of Luffy during the Dressrosa Arc. After the battle with the Donquixote Pirates at Dressrosa, he joined the XXX Gym Martial Arts Alliance, which later converted to a pirate crew called the Ideo Pirates.
name: Jeet

description: Jerry is a secret intelligence member of CP6. He was found in the seventh car of the Puffing Tom when Sanji invaded the Puffing Tom. He comes from Karate Island in the South Blue, and claims to be a boxing champion.
name: Jerry

description: Jero is a member of the G-5 branch of the Marines.
name: Jero

description: Jesus Burgess, better known as the Champion, is the helmsman and one of the Ten Titanic Captains of the Blackbeard Pirates, being captain of the First Ship.
name: Jesus Burgess

description: Mock Town is a port town of Jaya. It is inhabited mostly by pirates, despite it looking like a resort.
name: Jew Wall

description: Jewelry Bonney, also known as the Big Eater,  is one of twelve pirates who are referred to as the Worst Generation, being the captain of the Bonney Pirates, a pirate crew from the South Blue. She is the daughter of Bartholomew Kuma.
name: Jewelry Bonney

description: Jibuemon is a former retainer from Kibi serving under the Kozuki Shogunate. As a hatamoto, he directly served under the former shogun, Kozuki Sukiyaki.
name: Jibuemon

description: Jigoku Benten is a kunoichi and a member of the Beasts Pirates. She previously was a member of the Orochi Oniwabanshu which served the shogun of Wano Country, Kurozumi Orochi.
name: Jigoku Benten

description: Jigoro of the Wind was a General Zombie on Thriller Bark in the service of Gecko Moria who was eventually assigned to guard Hogback. As he had Zoro's shadow, he was a user of Three Sword Style.
name: Jigoro

description: Jigra was an organ trader and a member of the Underworld who attempted to attack the Big Mom Pirates. In the anime, he is also part of the Organ Dealing Assassination Group
name: Jigra

description: Knight of the Sea Jinbe is the helmsman of the Straw Hat Pirates and one of the Senior Officers of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet. He is the tenth member of the crew and the ninth to join, doing so during the Wano Country Arc.
name: Jinbe

description: Jizo is a samurai and a member of the Beasts Pirates. He was previously a member of the Mimawarigumi, which served as the police force of the shogun of Wano Country, Kurozumi Orochi.
name: Jizo

description: Jo is a former prisoner of Udon's prisoner mines.
name: Jo

description: Jobo is a citizen of Mock Town.
name: Jobo

description: Captain John was a famous pirate captain who was once a memberof theinfamous Rocks Pirates prior to forming his own crew. He was notable for collecting one of the most significant treasures in the world; his fabled treasure cave and the riches within are notably long sought after by Buggy.
name: John

description: John Giant is a Vice Admiral in the Marine Headquarters, and the first giant to ever enlist in the Marines.
name: John Giant

description: Johnny along with Yosaku are old friends and former bounty hunting partners of Roronoa Zoro.
name: Johnny

description: Jorge was the head of the Judicial Ship that sailed to Water 7. He was the one who judged Tom for his support of the Pirate King Gol D. Roger.
name: Jorge

description: Waterfall Beard Jorul was a giant and former co-captain of the Giant Warrior Pirates, along with Jarul. He was known as a hero of the giants and one of the world's oldest warriors.
name: Jorul

description: Joy Boy is a name held by two known people, being a highly significant historical term. The first and most well-known one was an extremely relevant figure in the Void Century who played an important role in the history of Fish-Man Island and left behind a certain item of unimaginable value on the last island of the Grand Line. He was first mentioned on the Ryugu Poneglyph read by Nico Robin while at the Sea Forest. Based on the historical recordings of this Joy Boy left on the Poneglyphs, it was believed that Joy Boy would return around 800 years after the Void Century. After Monkey D. Luffy awakened his Devil Fruit, the Hito Hito no Mi, Model: Nika, and his heartbeat took on the sound of the Drums of Liberation, Zunesha stated that Joy Boy had returned.
name: Joy Boy

description: Diamond Jozu is the former 3rd division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates, serving as one of the crew's most prominent members.
name: Jozu

description: Judy is Marie's fianc. He was shot by Charlos when he tried to rescue her.
name: Judy

description: Jujiro is a samurai who allied with the Kozuki Family. After waiting 20 years for the return of the Nine Red Scabbards, he affiliated with the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance to raid Onigashima.
name: Jujiro

description: Juki is a member of the Numbers in the Beasts Pirates, representing the number ten.
name: Juki

description: Julius is an infamous New World pirate who allied himself with Whitebeard.
name: Julius

description: Junan is a fish-man and a cashier atPappag's Criminal Brand store.
name: Junan

description: Kabu is a dwarf from Tontatta Kingdom who is the leader of the Yellow Kabu Squad and a member of the Tontatta Pirates.
name: Kabu

description: Rear Admiral Kadar is a Marine rear admiral at the G-2 Marine base from fifteen years ago. His current location and rank are unknown.
name: Kadar

description: Kagero is a priest and samurai who allied with the Kozuki Family. After waiting 20 years for the return of the Nine Red Scabbards, he affiliated with the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance to raid Onigashima.
name: Kagero

description: Kagikko is a member of theKrieg Pirates and a locksmith. He only appeared in the manga.
name: Kagikko

description: Kaidou of the Beasts, renowned as the world's Strongest Creature, is the Governor-General of the Beasts Pirates and formerly one of the Four Emperors that ruled over the New World. He is also the father of Yamato.
name: Kaidou

description: Kairen is a righteye flounder mermaid and an employee of the Mermaid Cafe.
name: Kairen

description: Kairiken is a bounty hunter at Sabaody Archipelago.
name: Kairiken

description: Kairo Kureyo is a prisoner on Level 5 of Impel Down.
name: Kairo Kureyo

description: Kaku is a member of CP0.
name: Kaku

description: Kaku is a member of CP0.
name: Kaku

description: Kakukaku is a resident of Water 7 who was among the townspeople as they discussed the attempted murder of Iceburg.
name: Kakukaku

description: Kakunoshin is a samurai who allied with the Kozuki Family. After waiting 20 years for the return of the Nine Red Scabbards, he affiliated with the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance to raid Onigashima.
name: Kakunoshin

description: Kalgara was a hero of the Shandia who lived while Upper Yard was still a part of Jaya (some 400 years ago), and who befriended the explorer Mont Blanc Noland (the ancestor of Mont Blanc Cricket). A statue of him was erected after his death as an eternal reminder to the Shandia of his strength and courage. He had a daughter named Mousse. Wyper is his descendant.
name: Kalgara

description: Kalifa is a member of CP0.
name: Kalifa

description: Kamakiri is one of the Shandia warriors that fought to take Upper Yard from Enel. After the timeskip, he joined the God's Guards under Wyper.
name: Kamakiri

description: Kamekichi is a newspaper deliveryman in the Flower Capital who announced reports of Kamazo the Manslayer and Ushimitsu Kozo.
name: Kamekichi

description: Kamijiro is a lion's head, legs, and tail that are attached to Holed'em's body due to his consumption of a lion SMILE.
name: Kamijiro

description: Kaneshiro is the shipwright of the Arlong Pirates and a goldfish fish-man. He was previously a member of the Sun Pirates.
name: Kaneshiro

description: Kanezenny is an elderly farm woman from Nico Robin's past.
name: Kanezenny

description: Kappa is a young shoeshine-boy in Nanohana.
name: Kappa

description: Karasu is the commander of the North Army in the Revolutionary Army.
name: Karasu

description: Karma is an octopus fish-man and the captain of the Takotopus Pirates, an infamous New World pirate crew subordinate to the Whitebeard Pirates.
name: Karma

description: Karoo is Nefertari Vivi's pet super spot-billed duck, a fleet riding bird (one of the fastest modes of transportation available in Arabasta). Alongside his owner Vivi, Karoo infiltrated the organization known as Baroque Works. With her, he ended up traveling with the Straw Hat Pirates for most of the Arabasta Saga after their cover was blown. He is the leader of the Super Spot-Billed Duck Troops in Arabasta.
name: Karoo

description: Kasa is an elderly woman from Raijin Island.
name: Kasa

description: Kasagoba is a marbled rockfish fish-man and was a member of the now disbanded New Fish-Man Pirates prior to their downfall. In the anime, he is named Kasagon (, Kasagon?).
name: Kasagoba

description: Kashii, together with Oimo, was one of the two giants who guarded the front gate of Enies Lobby  for over fifty years. He was originally a member of the Giant Warrior Pirates.
name: Kashii

description: Kashigami was a giant snake that lived on Jaya four centuries ago. It was worshiped by the Shandia as a god until it was slain by Mont Blanc Noland. It is the grandparent of Nola, who lives on the land in the present day.
name: Kashigami

description: Katsuzo was a citizen of Wano Country. He died 41 years before the present day, and his cremated body was used by Kozuki Oden to cook a pot of oden.
name: Katsuzo

description: Kawamatsu the Kappa is a Japanese puffer fish-man who is a yokozuna-ranked sumo wrestler. As a child, he was shipwrecked in Wano and orphaned soon afterwards. After Kozuki Oden rescued him from an attempted lynching, he went on to serve as one of Oden's Nine Red Scabbards until Oden's death 20 years ago.
name: Kawamatsu

description: Kaya is a young woman who lives in the largest mansion in Syrup Village on the Gecko Islands. She is a close friend of Usopp and is currently studying to become a doctor.
name: Kaya

description: Kazekage is a ninja and a member of the Beasts Pirates. He previously was a member of the Orochi Oniwabanshu which served the shogun of Wano Country, Kurozumi Orochi.
name: Kazekage

description: Kazenbo was a flaming ghost-like entity created by Kurozumi Kanjuro, with the power of the Fude Fude no Mi, for the purpose of destroying Onigashima. It was created to symbolize the burning hatred (, moeru onnen?) of the Kurozumi Family against those who wronged them.
name: Kazenbo

description: Kebi was a member of the Suna Suna Clan along with Vivi, Koza and Okame.
name: Kebi

description: Kechatch is an infamous New World pirate captain who was subordinate to the Whitebeard Pirates.
name: Kechatch

description: Keith is a monkey mink and a member of the Guardians who protect the Mokomo Dukedom at night.
name: Keith

description: The Super Spot-Billed Duck Troops are a family of seven Super Spot-Billed Ducks (and later one camel) who serve the kingdom of Arabasta. They are led by their captain Karoo, and are reputed to be the fastest troop in the kingdom of Arabasta. All of the ducks have the strange theme of wearing different types of hats and various other jewelry and clothing. Also strange was that the last member to join the squad, Matsuge, is a camel who helped the Straw Hats confront Baroque Works.
name: Kentauros

description: Kelly Funk is an assassin from the Mogaro Kingdom and Bobby Funk's older brother. He joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi.
name: Kelly Funk

description: Three-Headed Baskerville is the Chief Justice of Enies Lobby, in service of the World Government. Ostensibly a three-headed man, he is actually three menBas, And, and Kervillewho are such close friends that they prefer acting as one body.
name: Kerville

description: Kibagaeru was the captain of the Fanged Toad Pirates until he lost to Foxy at the Davy Back Fight and joined his crew. Due to his anime-exclusive actions, he can be considered one of the main antagonists of the Foxy's Return Arc.
name: Kibagaeru

description: Commodore Kibin is a Marine officer that debuted during the Marineford Arc. His canon name and rank are unknown. However, in the anime, he was given the name Kibin and the rank of Commodore.
name: Kibin

description: Kiev is a member of the Franky Family.
name: Kiev

description: Kikipatsu is a member of the Blackbeard Pirates.
name: Kikipatsu

description: Kikunojo of the Lingering Snow, more commonly referred to as Kiku, is a samurai from Wano Country and a retainer for the Kozuki Family, serving as one of Kozuki Oden's Nine Red Scabbards. She is also the younger sister of Izou and the daughter of the dancing school head of the Hanayanagi School (, Hanayanagi-ry?) in Ringo. She was born 42 years ago, but traveled 20 years forward in time at the age of 22.
name: Kiku

description: Kikunojo of the Lingering Snow, more commonly referred to as Kiku, is a samurai from Wano Country and a retainer for the Kozuki Family, serving as one of Kozuki Oden's Nine Red Scabbards. She is also the younger sister of Izou and the daughter of the dancing school head of the Hanayanagi School (, Hanayanagi-ry?) in Ringo. She was born 42 years ago, but traveled 20 years forward in time at the age of 22.
name: Kikunojo

description: Kikyo is a Kuja warrior from Amazon Lily.
name: Kikyo

description: Massacre Soldier Killer is a pirate from the South Blue and a combatant of the Kid Pirates. He is one of twelve pirates who are referred to as the Worst Generation. After the timeskip, his bounty has been raised from 162,000,000 to 200,000,000.
name: Killer

description: Kimel is a member of the Spade Pirates.
name: Kimel

description: Foxfire Kin'emon is a samurai from the region of Kuri in Wano Country, a retainer of the Kozuki Family, the leader of the Nine Red Scabbards, the husband of Tsuru, and a former thug. He was born 56 years before the present day, but traveled 20 years forward in time when he was 36 years old.
name: Kin'emon

description: Kinbo is a boy who lives in Okobore Town of Kuri with his mother Yame and his little brother.
name: Kinbo

description: Kinderella, also known as Miss Universe, is a woman who married Wapol after he became the head of his own corporation. Two years after that, she became the queen of Black Drum Kingdom when Wapol became its king.
name: Kinderella

description: King the Conflagration is one of the three All-Stars of the Beasts Pirates and Kaidou's right-hand man. Born as Alber, he is a member of the near-extinct lunarian race from the Red Line, noted for their ability to create fire.
name: King

description: Kingbaum is a tree homie, a member of the Big Mom Pirates and the master of the Seducing Woods on Whole Cake Island. However, he was forced to serve the Straw Hat Pirates due to them possessing Charlotte Linlin's Vivre Card.
name: Kingbaum

description: Kinga is an infamous New World pirate who was once a member of the Whitebeard Pirates before forming his own crew subordinate to Whitebeard.
name: Kinga

description: Kingdew is the commander of the 11th division of the Whitebeard Pirates.
name: Kingdew

description: Kinoko is a former prisoner on Level 5 of Impel Down and is currently a member of the Buggy Pirates, joining after his escape from Impel Down and the Summit War of Marineford.
name: Kinoko

description: Kirinkodanuki is an animal who lives on the Island of Rare Animals. Like all the animals on the island, he is protected by Gaimon.
name: Kirinkodanuki

description: Kirintauros is a giraffe centaur and member of the Centaur Patrol Unit on Punk Hazard.
name: Kirintauros

description: Kisegawa is a geisha from the Flower Capital of Wano Country. She once possessed the blueprints of Kaidou's fortress on Onigashima.
name: Kisegawa

description: Kitton is a boy who lives in Karakuri Island. He has a grandfather who takes care of him, as well as a cyborg dog named Taroimo.
name: Kitton

description: Mozu and Kiwi, also known as the Square Sisters due to their square-like hairstyle, are two girls very loyal to Franky, who went with him everywhere and tended to mimic every pose he did.
name: Kiwi

description: Koala is a former slave who was set free by Fisher Tiger's rampage on Mary Geoise. She sailed along with the Sun Pirates to reach her home town.
name: Koala

description: Kobe is a resident of the Flower Capital in Wano Country and the landlord for the Longhouses. He once possessed the blueprints of Kaidou's fortress on Onigashima.
name: Kobe

description: Koby the Hero is a Marine Captain who trained together with Helmeppo under Vice Admiral Garp's supervision. He is currently a member of the Marine special forces unit SWORD.
name: Koby

description: Koda is a Marine Chef, Kyuji's wife and mother of Moda.
name: Koda

description: Koito is a young girl residing in Ebisu Town of the Wano Country.
name: Koito

description: Kojuro is a samurai who allied with the Kozuki Family. After waiting 20 years for the return of the Nine Red Scabbards, he affiliated with the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance to raid Onigashima.
name: Kojuro

description: Kokoro is an icefish mermaid and the stationmaster for Shift Station, a Sea Train station near Water 7. She was also Tom's secretary during the days of Tom's Workers.
name: Kokoro

description: Komachiyo is a komainu that resides in the Kuri region of Wano Country. It has been Tama's best friend since their childhood.
name: Komachiyo

description: Komane is the deposed princess of the Lulusia Kingdom, being the daughter of the former king Seki.
name: Komane

description: Konbu is a child who lived in Punk Hazard's Biscuits Room. He was freed with the rest of the children by the Straw Hat Pirates.
name: Konbu

description: Kong is the World Government Commander-in-Chief. He was the previousFleet Admiral of the Marines at the time of the Battle in Edd War twenty-seven years ago. Sometime afterGol D. Roger's execution twenty-four years ago Sengoku succeeded him as Fleet Admiral.
name: Kong

description: Kop is a member of the Franky Family.
name: Kop

description: Kotatsu is a member of the Spade Pirates.
name: Kotatsu

description: Kotetsu was a swordsmith who crafted the cursed Great Grade sword Nidai Kitetsu. He is an ancestor of the present-day Kozuki Family in Wano Country, namely Sukiyaki, Oden, Momonosuke, and Hiyori.
name: Kotetsu

description: Hotori and Kotori are the younger brothers of Satori. They are lieutenants of the Divine Soldiers, an army of 50 warriors under the command of Yama, their leader, and Enel. They are minor antagonists during the Skypiea Arc.
name: Kotori

description: Koushirou is a master swordsman and was the teacher of Roronoa Zoro. He is also the father of the late Kuina and son of Shimotsuki Kozaburo. He is the master of Isshin Dojo in Shimotsuki Village.
name: Koushirou

description: Koyama, as named by Kozuki Oden and his retainers, is a white boar and the child of the Mountain God that lived in the forests of Wano Country as late as thirty years ago. In what became known as the Mountain God Incident, it was kidnapped from its parent and later stolen by Kin'emon.
name: Koyama

description: Koza is Princess Nefertari Vivi's childhood friend. As a child, he was the leader of the Suna Suna Clan. As an adult, he became the leader of the Arabasta Rebellion. He later became the environmental minister of the Arabasta Kingdom.
name: Koza

description: Koze and Packy were members of the Yes Pirates.
name: Koze

description: Kozuki Hiyori is the daughter of Kozuki Oden and Kozuki Toki. She is Kozuki Momonosuke's younger sister.
name: Kozuki Hiyori

description: Kozuki Momonosuke is the current shogun of Wano Country.
name: Kozuki Momonosuke

description: Kozuki Oden was the daimyo of Kuri in Wano Country and the son of the former shogun Kozuki Sukiyaki, being a member of the Kozuki Family. He was the husband of Kozuki Toki and the father of Momonosuke and Hiyori. Additionally, he was the leader of a group of legendary and powerful samurai known as the Nine Red Scabbards, with all of them serving as his retainers and most trusted allies.
name: Kozuki Oden

description: Kozuki Sukiyaki is the former shogun of Wano Country. He is the father of the late daimyo of Kuri Kozuki Oden, as well as the grandfather of current shogun Kozuki Momonosuke and Hiyori. The descendant of the legendary swordsmith Kotetsu, he is a swordsmith by hobby and crafted one of Roronoa Zoro's swords, Sandai Kitetsu.
name: Kozuki Sukiyaki

description: Kozuki Toki, born Amatsuki, was the wife of the daimyo of Kuri, Kozuki Oden, and the mother of Momonosuke and Hiyori.
name: Kozuki Toki

description: Don Krieg is the admiral of the Krieg Pirates and an infamous pirate of East Blue. Because of his underhanded methods and domination over a fleet of 50 pirate ships, he is infamously known as Foul-Play Krieg and Pirate Fleet Admiral.
name: Krieg

description: Kuina was a childhood friend and rival of Roronoa Zoro. She was the daughter of Koushirou and a descendant of the Shimotsuki Family, and was the reason why Zoro developed the Three Sword Style technique. She died at the age of eleven.
name: Kuina

description: Kukai is a member of the Spade Pirates.
name: Kukai

description: Kumadori is a former member of CP9 and one of the last agents to be introduced. He is the son of Kumadori Yamanbako and one of the few characters without a known first name.
name: Kumadori

description: Kumadori Yamanbako is the mother of Kumadori who was an assassin like him which means Kumadori followed her footsteps. Kumadori made lots of poetry about his mother in heaven, but in reality she is still alive.
name: Kumadori Yamanbako

description: Kumae was a bear introduced in SBS Volume 66. It was shown to be Perona's pet when she was young.
name: Kumae

description: Kumagoro is a resident of the Flower Capital in Wano Country. He once possessed the blueprints of Kaidou's fortress on Onigashima.
name: Kumagoro

description: Kumashi was a stuffed bear zombie of the Thriller Bark Pirates who acted as Perona's servant and the commander-in-chief of the Wild Zombies prior to being purified by Usopp.
name: Kumashi

description: Kuni is a gangster and a member of the Kyoshiro Family in Wano Country.
name: Kuni

description: Kunyun is a member of the Numbers in the Beasts Pirates, representing the number nine.
name: Kunyun

description: Dr. Kureha is an extremely elderly doctor who works on Drum Island. She is referred to as witch by some people.
name: Kureha

description: Kuro of a Hundred Plans, also known by his alias Klahadore, is the main antagonist of the Syrup Village Arc.
name: Kuro

description: Kurokoma was a yakuza of the Flower Capital in Wano Country. Forty-one years before the present day, he was the head of his family.
name: Kurokoma

description: Kuromarimo was the magistrate during Wapol's rule on Drum Island, and was the highest-ranking law officer below Wapol. After fleeing Drum Island to escape Blackbeard's attack, Kuromarimo became part of the Bliking Pirates.
name: Kuromarimo

description: Kuroobi is a ray fish-man and an officer of the Arlong Pirates, who was once a member of the Sun Pirates. He is one of the major antagonists of the Arlong Park Arc.
name: Kuroobi

description: Kurosawa is a samurai who allied with the Kozuki Family. After waiting 20 years for the return of the Nine Red Scabbards, he affiliated with the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance to raid Onigashima.
name: Kurosawa

description: Dr. Kurotsuru, also named Dr. Black Beard based on the same name on the lapel of his coat, is a doctor who appeared in Ace's cover story.
name: Kurotsuru

description: Kurozumi Higurashi was a member of the Kurozumi Family and a major supporter of Kurozumi Orochi. She was killed by Kaidou for her interruption in his fight with Kozuki Oden.
name: Kurozumi Higurashi

description: Kurozumi Kanjuro, nicknamed Evening Shower Kanjuro, was a samurai from Wano Country and a member of the Kurozumi Family. After losing his parents, he was instructed by Kurozumi Orochi to operate undercover within the Kozuki Family. Kanjuro became Kozuki Oden's retainer and one of the Nine Red Scabbards while secretly aiding Orochi in his rise to power and efforts to eliminate the Kozuki bloodline, by feeding him information. He would continue to do so until he revealed himself as Orochi's spy just before the Raid on Onigashima, leading to his former comrades engaging in battle with him until he was lethally wounded by Kine'mon during a final skirmish, dubbing it his final act.
name: Kurozumi Kanjuro

description: Kurozumi Orochi was the former shogun of Wano Country and one of the last members of the Kurozumi Family.
name: Kurozumi Orochi

description: Kurozumi Semimaru was a member of the Kurozumi Family and a major supporter of Kurozumi Orochi.
name: Kurozumi Semimaru

description: Kuzan, better known by his former epithet Aokiji, is a former Marine admiral and the first one to be revealed. He was nominated by Sengoku for the position of fleet admiral. However, after losing the position to Sakazuki, he resigned from the Marines. He has currently affiliated himself with the Blackbeard Pirates for unknown reasons.
name: Kuzan

description: Kyros is a legendary gladiator who fought in the Corrida Colosseum until he left to become captain of the royal army of Dressrosa. He was later turned into a toy, causing everyone to forget his existence, becoming a One-Legged Soldier (, Kata-ashi no Heitai?), also known as the Thunder Soldier of Rage. He is the former captain of the Riku Royal Army (, Riku  Gun?), the father of Rebecca, the husband of Scarlett and the son-in-law of Riku Doldo III.
name: Kyros

description: Kyuin was a member of the Donquixote Pirates, and the boss of the SMILE Factory on Dressrosa.
name: Kyuin

description: Kyuji is a Marine chef, Koda's husband, and Moda's father.
name: Kyuji

description: Dr. Kyukyu is a doctor in Water 7. He examined Iceburg after he was shot by the CP9.
name: Kyukyu

description: Laboon is a whalethe Straw Hat Pirates encounter immediately after entering the Grand Line. He is native to the West Blue andis classified as a Type A creature, Big Friendly, and at the top of both the size and friendliness scale.
name: Laboon

description: Vice Admiral Lacroix is a Marine vice admiral anda member of the Giant Squad.
name: Lacroix

description: Lacuba is a pirate famed as a devious tactician, with a bounty of 17,000,000.
name: Lacuba

description: Lady Tree is a tree homie living in the Seducing Woods on Whole Cake Island. She's also Kingbaum's fiance.
name: Lady Tree

description: Laffitte, nicknamed Demon Sheriff, is the navigator, chief of staff, one of the Ten Titanic Captains, and captain of the Fifth Ship of the Blackbeard Pirates. He is also a former West Blue policeman known for countless acts of police brutality, which resulted in his exile from that sea.
name: Laffitte

description: Lao G is an officer of the Donquixote Pirates' Diamante Army.
name: Lao G

description: Laskey is a former CP9 agent and is Kalifa's father.
name: Laskey

description: Lassoo is Mr. 4's gun that consumed a Devil Fruit through some unknown method which allows it to become a living dog. He is classified as a Type D creature, Small Savage.
name: Lassoo

description: Lemoncheese is the queen of Bestland Kingdom (, Besutorando koku?) and one of fifty monarchs who took part in the Levely.
name: Lemoncheese

description: Warrior Leo is a dwarf from the Tontatta Kingdom and the leader of the Tonta Corps  (, Tonta-heich?), which was later reformed as a pirate crew now known as the Tontatta Pirates, with Leo now acting as the captain. He is the captain of the fifth ship of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet.
name: Leo

description: Leonero is a member of the Spade Pirates.
name: Leonero

description: Lilith, also designated as Punk-02 (PUNK-02, Panku-Ts?), is one of six satellites of Dr. Vegapunk, embodying his aspect of evil.
name: Lilith

description: Lily was a member of the Bellamy Pirates. She was first seen with Sarquiss on Jaya Island. She was the only member of the minor crew members in Bellamy's crew that was openly named. Lily appeared in most of the events the crew were involved with during the Jaya Arc. She was last seen when Doflamingo came to punish Bellamy.
name: Lily

description: Limejuice is an officer of the Red Hair Pirates.
name: Limejuice

description: Lindbergh, or Lind for short, is a cat mink and the commander of the South Army in the Revolutionary Army.
name: Lindbergh

description: Seaman First Class Lines was one of Fullbody's subordinates from his time as a lieutenant. His name and rank were revealed in One Piece Blue: Grand Data File.
name: Lines

description: Lionbuta is an animal who lives on the Island of Rare Animals. Like all the animals on the island, he is protected by Gaimon.
name: Lionbuta

description: Lip Service Doughty was one of the rookies who had joined the ranks of the Fake Straw Hat Crew. He had a bounty of 88,000,000.
name: Lip Doughty

description: Little Oars Jr. (also referred to as Oars III on his flag) is the captain of the Little Pirates, a descendant of Oars, and a subordinate of the Whitebeard Pirates. He is among the several New World pirates aiding the Whitebeard Pirates in saving Ace from execution by the World Government.
name: Little Oars Jr.

description: Loki is the prince of Elbaf, who was once Lola's arranged fiance before she ran away.
name: Loki

description: Charlotte Lolais the captain of the Rolling Pirates and the 23rd daughter and 53rd child of the Charlotte Family. Her mother is Emperor Charlotte Linlin and her father is Linlin's 25th husband, Pound. She is the younger twin sister of Chiffon and Gotti's wife.
name: Lola

description: Vice Admiral Lonz is a Marine vice admiral who is also part of the Giant Squad.
name: Lonz

description: The Lord of the Coast is a Sea King that inhabits the waters of Dawn Island, typically near Foosha Village. He is classified as a Type C creature, Big Savage.
name: Lord of the Coast

description: Brag Men is a famous book which contains many stories from the Grand Line. Due to the nature of these stories, many people mock them, and so the book was named to discredit their authors as liars (, usotsuki-tachi?). The book is labeled as fiction romance.
name: Louis Arnote

description: Lucky Roux is an executive, combatant, and cook of the Red Hair Pirates. He is also the one who found the Gomu Gomu no Mi which was eaten by Monkey D. Luffy.
name: Lucky Roux

description: Lulis is a mermaid and is an employee at Mermaid Cafe.
name: Lulis

description: Machvise is an officer of the Donquixote Pirates' Diamante Army.
name: Machvise

description: Macro is a Fish-Man pirate and the captain of the Macro Pirates. He first appeared in Hatchan's Sea-Floor Stroll cover story. He was also a member of the Sun Pirates.
name: Macro

description: Macro is a Fish-Man pirate and the captain of the Macro Pirates. He first appeared in Hatchan's Sea-Floor Stroll cover story. He was also a member of the Sun Pirates.
name: Macro

description: Madilloman is a Gifter in the Beasts Pirates.
name: Madilloman

description: Magellan is the vice warden of Impel Down. He was formerly the chief warden, but after his failure to stop the jail's one and only mass-breakout, he was replaced by Hannyabal and demoted to vice warden.
name: Magellan

description: Magra is a member of the Dadan Family that are active on Mt. Colubo on Dawn Island. He helped take care of Ace and Luffy for Garp.
name: Magra

description: Maha is a member of the intelligence agency CP0.
name: Maha

description: Maidy is a servant of the Nefertari Family, working as a lady's maid in Alubarna Palace.
name: Maidy

description: Maki is a member of the Blackbeard Pirates.
name: Maki

description: Makino is a bartender from Monkey D. Luffy's home town, Foosha Village. She is the owner of Partys Bar and the mother of an unknown child.
name: Makino

description: Ensign Makko is a senior member of Hina's death squad who was on one of the ships that attacked the Straw Hat Pirates as they fled Arabasta.
name: Makko

description: Mani was a combatant of the Bellamy Pirates.
name: Mani

description: Manjaro was a member of the Fake Straw Hat Crew who impersonated Roronoa Zoro.
name: Manjaro

description: Mansherry is a dwarf and the princess of the Tontatta Kingdom. She is the daughter of Gancho, the king of the Tontatta Kingdom.
name: Mansherry

description: Marco the Phoenix is the former 1st division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates. Once starting out as an apprentice on the crew, he had come to be Whitebeard's closest confidant and right-hand man. After his captain's death, Marco assumed leadership of the Whitebeard Pirates until the crew's disbandment following the Payback War. Following the Raid on Onigashima during the Wano Country Arc, Marco retired from piracy, settling down on Sphinx Island and returning to his duties as a doctor.
name: Marco

description: Margarita is the owner of the shadow that was inserted into Victoria Cindry's corpse twelve years ago.
name: Margarita

description: Marguerite is a member of the Kuja tribe living on the island of Amazon Lily. She, along with Aphelandra and Sweet Pea, saved Luffy after he ate mushrooms that completely covered his body. During the timeskip, she became a member of the Kuja Pirates.
name: Marguerite

description: Mari is the king of Chaco Kingdom (, Chako koku?) and one of fifty monarchs who took part in the Levely.
name: Mari

description: Maria Napole is a singer and is considered the pride of Fish-Man Island.
name: Maria Napole

description: Marianne, also known as the Flag-Bearer of Freedom and more commonly by her alias Miss Goldenweek, was an officer agent of Baroque Works and the partner of Mr. 3. She is currently working as a painter at the new Spider's Cafe alongside many of her former colleagues.
name: Marianne

description: Marie is the thirteenth wife of Saint Charlos. Before being enslaved by Charlos, she worked as a nurse in the Sabaody Archipelago, and was the fiance of Judy.
name: Marie

description: Marilyn is an old lady that lives in Skypiea. She was Miss Skypiea forty-two years ago.
name: Marilyn

description: Marin is a male slave who was forced to dress as a mermaid by his owner.
name: Marin

description: Mario is a dog that tore off the arm of a toy citizen of Dressrosa.
name: Mario

description: Marshall D. Teach, most commonly referred to by his epithet Blackbeard, is the captain-turned-admiral of the Blackbeard Pirates, and one of the Four Emperors. He is also the only known person in history to wield the powers of two Devil Fruits.
name: Marshall D. Teach

description: Marumieta is the daughter of Bimine, the mayor of Pucci.
name: Marumieta

description: Mash is a giant octopus that appeared in Hatchan's Sea-Floor Stroll.
name: Mash

description: Chief Petty Officer Mashikaku is a subordinate of Smoker and Tashigi. However, it is unknown if he remained with the two after they transferred to G-5 as he is not seen with the G-5 Marines.
name: Mashikaku

description: Salvage King Masira is the captain of the Masira Pirates and the head of a simian ship salvage operation near Jaya Island. His sworn brother is Shoujou and both of them are members of the Saruyama Alliance, headed by Mont Blanc Cricket. He and Shoujou are both fans of Mont Blanc Noland's exploits and the fairy tale book based on them.
name: Masira

description: Masked Deuce is an alias used by the first member of Ace's pirate crew, the Spade Pirates. He abandoned his real name, which remains unknown.
name: Masked Deuce

description: Massui is a Waiter in the Beasts Pirates.
name: Massui

description: The Master is a digger who works in an unnamed island in the Grand Line.
name: Master

description: The Master of the Waters is a large Sea King that inhabits the waters around Long Ring Long Land.
name: Master of the Waters

description: The Matryo Princesses are the princesses of the Roshwan Kingdom. Their names, in order from largest to smallest, are Matryosaka, Matryosuka, Matryoseka, and Matryosoka.
name: Matryosaka

description: The Matryo Princesses are the princesses of the Roshwan Kingdom. Their names, in order from largest to smallest, are Matryosaka, Matryosuka, Matryoseka, and Matryosoka.
name: Matryoseka

description: The Matryo Princesses are the princesses of the Roshwan Kingdom. Their names, in order from largest to smallest, are Matryosaka, Matryosuka, Matryoseka, and Matryosoka.
name: Matryosoka

description: The Matryo Princesses are the princesses of the Roshwan Kingdom. Their names, in order from largest to smallest, are Matryosaka, Matryosuka, Matryoseka, and Matryosoka.
name: Matryosuka

description: Matsuge is a camel who accompanied the Straw Hat Pirates during the Arabasta Arc. He is classified as a Type-A creature, Big Friendly.
name: Matsuge

description: Maujii is a dwarf from Tontatta Kingdom who first appeared in the SMILE Factory during the dwarves' rebellion.
name: Maujii

description: Maynard the Pursuer is a vice admiral who appears in the Dressrosa Arc. He was registered as a gladiator to compete at the Corrida Colosseum for the Mera Mera no Mi, but was defeated before he could participate.
name: Maynard

description: MAX Marx was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.
name: MAX Marx

description: Mayushika is one of the Shandia warriors who fought against Enel.
name: Mayushika

description: Thunder Lord McGuy is an infamous New World pirate who allied with Whitebeard.
name: McGuy

description: McKinley is the captain of the White Berets, who tried to arrest the Straw Hat Pirates when they first arrived in Skypiea.
name: McKinley

description: Meadows participated in a competition at the Corrida Colosseum as a gladiator to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi.
name: Meadows

description: The Mecha-Shark is a cyborg shark created by Vegapunk alongside the Sea Beast Weapons.
name: Mecha-Shark

description: Megalo is a shark that lives on Fish-Man Island. He is the beloved pet of Princess Shirahoshi and former pet of the Neptune Army.
name: Megalo

description: Mero is a smelt-whiting mermaid and an employee of the Mermaid Cafe.
name: Mero

description: Merry is Kaya's butler, and the original designer of the Going Merry.
name: Merry

description: Michael and Hoichael are two kids who are troublemakers in the backstreets of Water 7. They idolize Franky, and even dress like him and use his motto as their own: Mm, super!! They also idolize Paulie. However, their backstreet delinquency has earned them ire from at least Tilestone and Peepley Lulu.
name: Michael

description: Indoor Mihar is a member of the Spade Pirates and, subsequently, the Whitebeard Pirates.
name: Mihar

description: Mikazuki is the captain and only named member of the Big Helmet Pirates. He has a bounty of 36,000,000.
name: Mikazuki

description: Mikio Itoo is a background joke character created by Eiichiro Oda, and arguably the first Easter Egg featured in One Piece.
name: Mikio Itoo

description: Courier Mikita, more commonly known by her alias Miss Valentine, is a former officer agent who was partnered with Mr. 5. As of now, she is currently working as a chocolate lady alongside most of the other Baroque Works members at the new Spiders Cafe.
name: Mikita

description: Milky is a reindeer mink and a member of the Guardians.
name: Milky

description: Millet Pine was a member of the Roger Pirates.
name: Millet Pine

description: Milo is a citizen of Dressrosa. While he was a toy, he was known as Onepoco.
name: Milo

description: The Minister of the Left is a catfish merman in service of King Neptune. While it is not clear what his job entails, it appears to involve some sort of administrative and military duties. His actual name is currently unknown.
name: Minister of the Left

description: The Minister of the Right is a seahorse merman in service to King Neptune. While it is not clear exactly what his job entails, he appears to have some administrative and military duties. He also appears to be a guard or commander as he and the other guards hurried to the princess when she needed help. His actual name is unknown.
name: Minister of the Right

description: Minochihuahua is the newest Jailer Beast in Impel Down. He is a Zoan Devil Fruit user who ate a fruit that allows him to turn into a chihuahua.
name: Minochihuahua

description: Minokoala is one of the five Jailer Beasts of Impel Down. He is an awakened Zoan Devil Fruit user that ate a fruit that allows him to turn into a koala.
name: Minokoala

description: Minorhinoceros is one of the five Jailer Beasts of Impel Down. He is an awakened Zoan Devil Fruit user, having eaten a Devil Fruit that allows him to turn into a rhino.
name: Minorhinoceros

description: Minoruba is a bounty hunter onSabaody Archipelago.
name: Minoruba

description: Minotaurus is one of the five Jailer Beasts in Impel Down and the first one to appear. He is an awakened Zoan Devil Fruit user who ate a fruit that allows him to turn into a Holstein cow.
name: Minotaurus

description: Minozebra is one of the five Jailer Beasts of Impel Down. He is an awakened Zoan Devil Fruit user that ate a fruit that allows him to turn into a zebra.
name: Minozebra

description: Misery is a homie created by Big Mom as an attack during the Raid on Onigashima. She is formed from the Maser Saber combination of Prometheus, Hera, and Napoleon.
name: Misery

description: Miss Catherina was a Baroque Works Millions agent stationed at Whisky Peak alongside her partner, Mr. Beans. She worked under the Frontier Agents Mr. 8, Miss Monday, Mr. 9 and Miss Wednesday.
name: Miss Catherina

description: Miss Father's Day was a Frontier Agent, who along with Mr. 7, was part of the sniping pair who apparently are deployed for jobs by the Baroque Works where sniping is necessary. Due to her actions, she is a minor antagonist in the Arabasta Arc.
name: Miss Father's Day

description: Miss Friday is a vulture and a member of the criminal organization Baroque Works, being a part of The Unluckies (13, Anrakkzu?) along with Mr. 13. They were a team that served as messengers for Mr. 0 and were also responsible for executing any Baroque Works agents that fail their missions. She is classified as Type D creatures, Small Savage.
name: Miss Friday

description: Miss Monday is the code name of a former frontier agent of Baroque Works and partner to Igaram (Mr. 8 at the time) during his infiltration of Baroque Works. Due to her actions, she is a supporting antagonist in the Whisky Peak Arc. After the fall of Baroque Works, she stayed at Whisky Peak, and had a child with Mr. 9.
name: Miss Monday

description: Miss Mother's Day is the partner of Mr. 6 and a Frontier Agent in the Baroque Works rankings. She was first mentioned by Nefertari Vivi, who explained how Baroque Works was organized to the Straw Hat Pirates.
name: Miss Mother's Day

description: Miss Saturday is the partner of Mr. 12 and a Frontier Agent in the Baroque Works rankings. She was first mentioned by Nefertari Vivi, who explained how Baroque Works was organized to the Straw Hat Pirates.
name: Miss Saturday

description: Miss Thursday was the partner of Mr. 11 and a Frontier Agent of Baroque Works. She was first mentioned by Nefertari Vivi during her explanation to the Straw Hat Pirates on the organization of Baroque Works.
name: Miss Thursday

description: Miss Tuesday is the partner of Mr. 10 and a Frontier Agent in the Baroque Works rankings.
name: Miss Tuesday

description: Miyagi is a goat mink and one of Inuarashi's subjects.
name: Miyagi

description: Mizerka is a Shinuchi in the Beasts Pirates. During the raid on Onigashima, she was tamed by the power of the Kibi Kibi no Mi and joined the side of the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance.
name: Mizerka

description: Mizuira was a little girl from Ohara. She was the daughter of Oran and Roji, the niece of Nico Olvia, and the cousin of Nico Robin.
name: Mizuira

description: Mizuta Madaisuki was the older of the two Mizuta Twins, identical twin brothers of the Rumbar Pirates. He and his brother, Mawaritosuki, were identified by Oda in a SBS question. A fan asked why one of the Rumbar Pirates that died singing had a sword in his skull. Oda explained that this was because they were two identical pirates who died two separate ways.
name: Mizuta Madaisuki

description: Mizuta Mawaritosukiwas the younger of the two Mizuta Twins, identical twin brothers of the Rumbar Pirates. He and his brother, Madaisuki, were identified by Oda in a SBS question. A fan asked why one of the Rumbar Pirates that died singing had a sword in his skull. Oda explained that this was because they were two identical pirates who died two separate ways.
name: Mizuta Mawaritosuki

description: Moai is a member of the Kid Pirates.
name: Moai

description: MocDonald was a Wild Zombie who lived on Thriller Bark.
name: MocDonald

description: Mocha is a little girl who was held captive on Punk Hazard. She was freed with the rest of the children by the Straw Hat Pirates.
name: Mocha

description: Mochi is a Skypiean on Angel Island and Moyle's son.
name: Mochi

description: Moda is a milk maiden that Ace met during his cover story. She is the daughter of Koda and Kyuji.
name: Moda

description: Mohji the Beast Tamer is a pirate and the first mate of the Buggy Pirates and a member of the Buggy and Alvida Alliance. He is a pet tamer, usually accompanied by his pet lion Richie. He was a member of Buggy's Delivery, and now currently a member of Cross Guild.
name: Mohji

description: Vice Admiral Momonga is a Marine officer and the Base Commander of the G-1 Marine Base. He was one of the five vice admirals who had led the Buster Call on Enies Lobby.
name: Momonga

description: Momoo is a giant sea cow from the Grand Line, and the first Sea Beast seen in the series. He is classified as a Type A creature, Big Friendly.
name: Momoo

description: Monda is a star shark and is one of the pet animals of the Foxy Pirates.
name: Monda

description: Monet was a scout and assistant for Caesar Clown and his underlings in the research facility on Punk Hazard. She had her original human arms and legs replaced with bird limbs, giving her an appearance resembling a harpy. She was, in truth, a member and officer of the Donquixote Pirates and was sent as a deep cover agent by Doflamingo.
name: Monet

description: Monjii is a monkey mink.
name: Monjii

description: Monjiro is a samurai who allied with the Kozuki Family. After waiting 20 years for the return of the Nine Red Scabbards, he affiliated with the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance to raid Onigashima.
name: Monjiro

description: Monkey D. Dragon, also known as the Rebellious Dragon, is the infamous Supreme Commander (, Sshireikan?) of the Revolutionary Army. He has been attempting to overthrow the World Government and is labelled the World's Worst Criminal. He is the father of Monkey D. Luffy and the son of Monkey D. Garp, having been born in the Goa Kingdom just like them. He was also responsible for saving Sabo's life after the latter almost drowned from a World Noble attack, eventually turning the boy into his second-in-command.
name: Monkey D. Dragon

description: Monkey D. Garp is an extremely famous and powerful Marine vice admiral. He is the father of Monkey D. Dragon, the paternal grandfather of Monkey D. Luffy, and the adoptive grandfather of Portgas D. Ace. He was responsible for overseeing Ace's birth and raising a young Luffy, before entrusting them both to the Dadan Family.
name: Monkey D. Garp

description: anime, One Piece. He is the founder and captain of the increasingly infamous and powerful Straw Hat Pirates, as well as one of its top fighters. He desires to find the legendary treasure left behind by the late Gol D. Roger and thereby become the Pirate King, which would help facilitate an unknown dream of his that he has told only to his brothers and crew. He believes that being the Pirate King means having the most freedom in the world.
name: Monkey D. Luffy

description: Monster is one of the musicians and an officer of the Red Hair Pirates. He first appeared playing with his crew at the Partys Bar.
name: Monster

description: Mont Blanc Cricket is an inhabitant of Jaya, living in a small home behind the facade of a castle. He is the distant descendant of Mont Blanc Noland and the Last Boss (, Rasuto Bosu?) of the Saruyama Alliance.
name: Mont Blanc Cricket

description: Mont Blanc Noland was an admiral (, Teitoku?) in the Lvneel Kingdom who made multiple trips into the Grand Line. He discovered a city of gold on Jaya, but found upon returning there with Lvneel's king that it had disappeared, causing him to be executed. He was then memorialized in a fairy tale as a liar and trickster.
name: Mont Blanc Noland

description: Moodie is a woman who Fullbody took to the Baratie.
name: Moodie

description: Moon Isaac Jr. was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.
name: Moon Isaac Jr.

description: Moqueca is the king of Samba Kingdom (, Sanba koku?) in the South Blue and one of fifty monarchs who took part in the Levely.
name: Moqueca

description: Axe-Hand Morgan is a former Marine captain, the father of Helmeppo and the first significant Marine officer to appear in the storyline. After his defeat by Monkey D. Luffy and Roronoa Zoro, he was stripped of his rank for his many abuses of power.
name: Morgan

description: Big News Morgans is the president of the World Economy News Paper and one of the emperors of the Underworld.
name: Morgans

description: Morley of Fur is a giant and anewkama, as well asthe commander of the West Army in the Revolutionary Army.
name: Morley

description: Mornin is the mayor of Syrup Village, and one of several villagers who used Usopp's antics as a makeshift alarm clock.
name: Mornin

description: Mororon is the queen of the Tajine Kingdom.
name: Mororon

description: Mosh is a member of the Kid Pirates.
name: Mosh

description: Motobaro is the pet bison of Duval. He is used by Duval as a steed, and can also swim on water.
name: Motobaro

description: Mr. Motzel is a gourmand and one of the known customers of the Baratie.
name: Motzel

description: Mounblutain was a member of the Fake Straw Hat Crew who masqueraded as Sogeking.
name: Mounblutain

description: The Mountain God, respectfully called Yama-san (, Yama-san?, VIZ Media: Yama) by Kozuki Oden and his retainers,is a giant boar that lived in the forests of Wano Country as late as thirty years ago. In what became known as the Mountain God Incident, it was cut down by Kozuki Oden during its attack on Flower Capital, but it ultimately survived the ordeal.
name: Mountain God

description: Mountain Ricky is a member of the Foxy Pirates. He fought George Mach before the third round of the Davy Back Fight.
name: Mountain Ricky

description: Mouseman is a Gifter in the Beasts Pirates. He resides in Bakura Town.
name: Mouseman

description: Mousse was the daughter of Kalgara and Herb and was considered the most beautiful of the Shandia women on the island of Jaya four hundred years ago.
name: Mousse

description: Moyle is a Skypiean and the father of Mochi. He originally worked for Gan Fall in the Divine Squad, but after Enel took over, he and the other members were forced to work in God's Army until they were betrayed and almost killed.
name: Moyle

description: Vice Admiral Mozambia is a high ranking Marine Officer who attended the meeting with the Seven Warlords of the Sea to discuss the issue with Crocodile's replacement.
name: Mozambia

description: Mozu and Kiwi, also known as the Square Sisters due to their square-like hairstyle, are two girls very loyal to Franky, who went with him everywhere and tended to mimic every pose he did.
name: Mozu

description: Mr. 6 is the partner of Miss Mother's Day and the topFrontier Agent in the Baroque Works rankings. He was first mentioned by Nefertari Vivi, who explained how Baroque Works was organized to the Straw Hat Pirates.
name: Mr. 6

description: Mr. 7 is a former Frontier Agent of Baroque Works, being half of a sniper duo along with his partner, Miss Father's Day. He replaced the previous agent of the same codename when the latter died in the line of duty. Due to his actions, he is a minor antagonist in the Arabasta Arc.
name: Mr. 7

description: Mr. 7 is a former Frontier Agent of Baroque Works, being half of a sniper duo along with his partner, Miss Father's Day. He replaced the previous agent of the same codename when the latter died in the line of duty. Due to his actions, he is a minor antagonist in the Arabasta Arc.
name: Mr. 7

description: Mr. 9 is the code name of a former Frontier Agent and bounty hunter of Baroque Works, and Miss Wednesday's former assigned partner during her infiltration. Due to his actions, he is one of the main antagonists of the Reverse Mountain Arc, and a supporting antihero in the Whisky Peak Arc. He is currently married to Miss Monday.
name: Mr. 9

description: Mr. 10is the partner to Miss Tuesday and a Frontier Agent in the Baroque Works rankings.
name: Mr. 10

description: Mr. 11 was a Frontier Agent for Baroque Works and the partner of Miss Thursday.
name: Mr. 11

description: Mr. 12 is the partner of Miss Saturday and a Frontier Agent in the Baroque Works rankings. He was first mentioned by Nefertari Vivi, who explained how Baroque Works was organized to the Straw Hat Pirates.
name: Mr. 12

description: Mr. 13 is an otter and a member of the criminal organization Baroque Works, being a part of The Unluckies (13, Anrakkzu?) along with Miss Friday. They were a team that served as messengers for Mr. 0 and were also responsible for executing any Baroque Works agents that fail their missions. He is classified as Type D creatures, Small Savage.
name: Mr. 13

description: Mr. Beans was a Baroque Works Millions agent stationed at Whisky Peak alongside his partner, Miss Catherina. He worked under the Frontier Agents Mr. 8, Miss Monday, Mr. 9 and Miss Wednesday.
name: Mr. Beans

description: Mr. Love was a Baroque Works Billions agent who posed as a member of the Rebel Army.
name: Mr. Love

description: Mr. Mellow is one of the only identified members of the Baroque Works Billions.
name: Mr. Mellow

description: Mr. Momora was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.
name: Mr. Momora

description: Mr. Shimizu was a Baroque Works Millions agent stationed at Whisky Peak. He worked under the Frontier Agents Mr. 8, Miss Monday, Mr. 9 and Miss Wednesday.
name: Mr. Shimizu

description: Muchana is a doctor who currently works at Impel Down's medical room.
name: Muchana

description: Colonel Mugren was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.
name: Mugren

description: Mukkashimi Tower is a spectator at the Corrida Colosseum.
name: Mukkashimi Tower

description: Mummy is a sorcerer who joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi.
name: Mummy

description: Mummy Mee is one of the houseparents, alongside Daddy Dee, of a World Government-affiliated orphanage situated on the Conomi Islands.
name: Mummy Mee

description: Muret was the doctor of the Bellamy Pirates.
name: Muret

description: Dr. Nako is a doctor from Cocoyasi Village.
name: Nako

description: Cat Burglar Nami is the navigator of the Straw Hat Pirates and one of the Senior Officers of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet. She is the third member of the crew and the second to join, doing so during the Orange Town Arc. She is the adoptive sister of Nojiko after the two were orphaned and taken in by Bell-mre.
name: Nami

description: Namur is a fish-man and the commander of the 8th division of the Whitebeard Pirates.
name: Namur

description: Nangi is a member of the Numbers in the Beasts Pirates, representing the number seven.
name: Nangi

description: Napoleon the Bicorne is a homie taking the form of a bicorne hat that is worn by Big Mom. He can also become a sword that Big Mom uses in combat. He is a special kind of homie, as he received a soul fragment from Big Mom herself, and serves as one of her personal weapons alongside Prometheus and Hera, and formerly Zeus.
name: Napoleon

description: Nashi is the king of Ringo Kingdom (, Ringo koku?) and one of fifty monarchs who took part in the Levely.
name: Nashi

description: Natto was a member of the Suna Suna Clan along with Vivi, Koza, Okame, and Kebi.
name: Natto

description: Nazu Ketagari is a Vice Admiral and the head of a Marine Headquarters division in charge of assigning epithets to Marines, including the Admiral aliases.
name: Nazu Ketagari

description: Nefertari Cobra was the 12th king of the Arabasta Kingdom, the former patriarch of Nefertari Family, husband of the late Nefertari Titi and father of Nefertari Vivi. He is a major character throughout the Arabasta Arc and a two-time participant of the Levely, having played a key role in the vote that led to the dissolution of the Seven Warlords of the Sea in the latest one.
name: Nefertari Cobra

description: Nefertari Titi was the queen of Arabasta, Nefertari Cobra's wife, and Nefertari Vivi's mother.
name: Nefertari Titi

description: Nefertari Vivi is the princess of the Arabasta Kingdom. She is the daughter of Nefertari Cobra and Titi. During her childhood, Vivi was part of the Suna Suna Clan, being the vice-leader of the group led by her friend Koza.
name: Nefertari Vivi

description: Neggy is the queen of Gingaball Kingdom (, Gingabru koku?) and one of fifty monarchs who took part in the Levely.
name: Neggy

description: Negikuma Maria is the big woman who spoke to Dalton while the Straw Hat Pirates were in Bighorn.
name: Negikuma Maria

description: Master Nekomamushi is a feline mink and the guardian of the Whale Forest on Zou, dubbed the Ruler of Night as he formerly ruled over the Mokomo Dukedom from 6:00 PM to 6:00 AM. He and Inuarashi serve as retainers for the Kozuki Family of Wano Country, as members of the Nine Red Scabbards.
name: Nekomamushi

description: King Neptune is a coelacanth merman and the king of the Ryugu Kingdom on Fish-Man Island. He is also the current patriarch of the Neptune Family, father of Fukaboshi, Ryuboshi, Manboshi, and Shirahoshi, and the husband of the late Queen Otohime.
name: Neptune

description: Nerine is a member of the Kuja from Amazon Lily.
name: Nerine

description: Nero the Sea Weasel was the newest member of CP9. He was first introduced on the Puffing Tom, where he helped to escort Nico Robin to Enies Lobby.
name: Nero

description: Captain Nezumi is a Marine captain of the 16th Branch in the East Blue. Highly corrupt, he covered up the vast majority of Arlong's actions in the Conomi Islands in exchange for bribe money.
name: Nezumi

description: Nico Olvia was the mother of Nico Robin and an archaeologist from Ohara who studied the Poneglyphs two decades ago.
name: Nico Olvia

description: Nico Robin, also known by her epithet Devil Child and the Light of the Revolution, is the archaeologist of the Straw Hat Pirates and one of the Senior Officers of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet. She is the seventh member of the crew and the sixth to join, doing so at the end of the Arabasta Arc. She temporarily left the crew during the Water 7 Arc but rejoined during the Enies Lobby Arc.
name: Nico Robin

description: Nigeratta is a man in Nico Robin's past.
name: Nigeratta

description: Nika is the name of a mythical warrior that was once revered as the Sun God by slaves from ancient times. He was first mentioned by Who's-Who, who heard about the legend from a prison guard during his imprisonment by the World Government. There is no record of whether this figure is a myth or existed in ancient times.
name: Nika

description: Nika is the name of a mythical warrior that was once revered as the Sun God by slaves from ancient times. He was first mentioned by Who's-Who, who heard about the legend from a prison guard during his imprisonment by the World Government. There is no record of whether this figure is a myth or existed in ancient times.
name: Nika

description: Gyoro, Nin, and Bao were a trio of oddly shaped Soldier Zombies that were first seen reporting to Moria about the Straw Hats' arrival.
name: Nin

description: Ninjin is a former member of the Usopp Pirates, along with Piiman and Tamanegi, before Usopp joined the Straw Hat Pirates.
name: Ninjin

description: Ninth is a New World pirate who allied himself with Whitebeard.
name: Ninth

description: Nitro is a jelly homie that is often seen with Charlotte Pudding.
name: Nitro

description: Domo-kun and Nnke-kun are aliens planning to conquer the Earth. They are the first joke characters created by Oda. They first appeared in Oda's short story God's Gift for the Future. Later Domo-kun makes an appearance among the Buggy Pirates. Oda answered a question in an SBS and drew both of them. Nnke-kun appeared again alongside Pandaman on the cover of Volume 52.
name: Nnke-kun

description: The Noble Croc is a crocodile homie that lives in the Seducing Woods on Whole Cake Island.
name: Noble Croc

description: Nokotti is a Waiter of the Beasts Pirates who serves as a guard in the Prisoner Mine of the Udon region. She acted as the gyji during the Sumo Inferno held by Queen.
name: Nokotti

description: Nojiko is the owner of a tangerine farm in Cocoyasi Village and is the adoptive older sister of Nami. They were raised together by their adoptive mother, Bell-mre.
name: Nojiko

description: Nola, known to many as the Master of the Sky, is a giant snake who lives on Upper Yard in Skypiea. Having lived for over four centuries, the snake was once the companion of Kalgara and Mont Blanc Noland back when Upper Yard was still part of Jaya. It is the grandchild of the snake Kashigami, whom the Shandia once worshiped as a god.
name: Nola

description: Nora Gitsune is a fox who filled the role of the pet for the Fake Straw Hat Crew, who did not know that the real Chopper is the crew's doctor and is given human-traits by the Hito Hito no Mi.
name: Nora Gitsune

description: Noriko is a nori maker who lives in Ebisu Town.
name: Noriko

description: Nosgarl is an infamous New World pirate who allied himself with Whitebeard.
name: Nosgarl

description: Nubon is a dwarf from Tontatta Kingdom who first appeared on Green Bit.
name: Nubon

description: Nugire Yainu was the shipwright of the Black Cat Pirates and the crew member who was killed three years prior to Luffy's visit to Syrup Village by the Marines.
name: Nugire Yainu

description: Nure-Onna is a Gifter in the Beasts Pirates who works under Black Maria.
name: Nure-Onna

description: Nyasha is a giant cat owned by the Vinsmoke Family that pulls their royal carriage.
name: Nyasha

description: Oarsthe Continent-Puller was an infamous ancient giantwhowas born over 500 years prior to the current storyline.
name: Oars

description: Octopako is an octopus fish-woman whom Hatchan tried to win over during his cover story, Hatchan's Sea-Floor Stroll.
name: Octopako

description: Ochoku is a former member of the Rocks Pirates and one of the participants of the Rocky Port Incident. They were also the previous ruler of Hachinosu, before Blackbeard took over and became the island's current ruler.
name: Ochoku

description: Mash is a giant octopus that appeared in Hatchan's Sea-Floor Stroll.
name: Octopus Mash

description: Skybreeder Ohm is one of four priests of the former God Enel and a high-ranking member of God's Army. Together with his giant dog steed Holy, he subjected God's enemies to the Ordeal of Iron on Upper Yard. Due to his affiliation and actions, he is a major antagonist in the Skypiea Arc.
name: Ohm

description: Oide is a little girl who lives in Sphinx. She is the owner of Tama.
name: Oide

description: Oimo is a giant from Elbaf and a former member of the Giant Warrior Pirates under Dorry and Brogy.
name: Oimo

description: Okame was a member of the Suna Suna Clan along with Vivi and Koza.
name: Okame

description: Okome is the first mate and the only known member of the Hokahoka Pirates.
name: Okome

description: Blood Letter Omasa is a yakuza boss who was in charge of the Udon region in Wano Country. He was imprisoned in Udon by the Beasts Pirates, but was freed when Luffy took over the prison.
name: Omasa

description: Vice Admiral Onigumo is a Marine officer, and one of the five vice admirals who led the Buster Call on Enies Lobby. His name was revealed in the third databook.
name: Onigumo

description: Onimaru is a komagitsune who was once the companion of the late daimyo of Ringo, Shimotsuki Ushimaru.
name: Onimaru

description: Oran was the husband of Roji, the father of Mizuira, the older brother of Nico Olvia and the maternal uncle of Nico Robin.
name: Oran

description: Massacre Ruler Orlumbus is a former adventurer who is theadmiral of the Yonta Maria Grand Fleet from the Standing Kingdom and the captain of the seventh ship of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet. He joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi. After the final battle against Donquixote Doflamingo, Orlumbus pledged his loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy and became a pirate.
name: Orlumbus

description: Ossamondo is a member of the Spade Pirates.
name: Ossamondo

description: Queen Otohime was a goldfish mermaid, the queen of the Ryugu Kingdom, the wife of king Neptune, and the mother of Fukaboshi, Ryuboshi, Manboshi, and Shirahoshi.
name: Otohime

description: Outlook III is a noble living in the Goa Kingdom on Dawn Island and is the husband of Didit, Sabo's biological father, and Sterrys adoptive father.
name: Outlook III

description: Koze and Packy were members of the Yes Pirates.
name: Packy

description: Pagaya is Conis'father and a native to Skypiea who fixed the waver that Nami rides.
name: Pagaya

description: Page One is one of the Tobiroppo, the strongest Shinuchi of the Beasts Pirates. He is the younger brother of fellow Tobiroppo Ulti.
name: Page One

description: Palms is an infamous New World pirate who worked under the Whitebeard Pirates.
name: Palms

description: Pandaman is a joke character created by Eiichiro Oda, and one of the most prominent easter eggs in One Piece.
name: Pandaman

description: Pandawoman is the female version of Pandaman. She first appeared in the Amazon Lily Arc where Pandaman would not be allowed (as men are forbidden on Amazon Lily).
name: Pandawoman

description: Pandora is a sun homie that was created by Carmel, who placed a portion of her soul into a fire on Elbaf with the power of the Soru Soru no Mi.
name: Pandora

description: Pankuta Dakeyan is a prisoner in Impel Down.
name: Pankuta Dakeyan

description: Pansy is a member of the Kuja tribe.
name: Pansy

description: Pantri is the priest of the Shandia. As the only known pantri lived was Chiya, who lived 400 years ago. It is unknown if the position still exists among the modern day Shandia.
name: Pantri

description: Papaneel is a Fish-Man who lived on Fish-Man Island at the same time as Otohime.
name: Papaneel

description: Papas is a member of the Kid Pirates.
name: Papas

description: Pappag is a starfish who is Camie's pet and teacher. He is the creator of the Criminal fashion line and is mentoring Camie to be a fashion designer.
name: Pappag

description: Pasciais a female dancer, who was to be sold at the Auction House.
name: Pascia

description: Patty is one of the main cooks at the Baratie, currently serving as the restaurant's head ptissier.
name: Patty

description: Paulie is the current vice president of the Galley-La Company in Water 7. Before being promoted, he was one of the five Dock One foremen, specializing in rigging, knots, and masts.
name: Paulie

description: Pavlik is an infamous New World pirate captain who was subordinate to Whitebeard.
name: Pavlik

description: Peachbeard is the epithet of the captain of the Peachbeard Pirates, who are subordinates of the Emperor Blackbeard.
name: Peachbeard

description: Pearl the Iron Wall is the commander of the Krieg Pirates' second unit. Due to his actions, he can be considered the tertiary antagonist of the Baratie Arc.
name: Pearl

description: Peepley Lulu is one of the five foremen of Dock One of the Galley-La Company in Water 7. His specialties as shipwright are pitch, block and tackle, and blacksmithing.
name: Peepley Lulu

description: Pedro of the Treetops was a jaguar mink and captain of the Guardians.
name: Pedro

description: Pekkori is the leader of Harahettania, the Land of Poverty, situated on Namakura Island in the Grand Line. He directed the ritual in which he and his people summoned Brook, though they were trying to summon the devil.
name: Pekkori

description: Pekoms is a combatant of the Big Mom Pirates and a lion mink. He is partnered with Tamago, and both are responsible for collecting the monthly payment of sweets from Fish-Man Island in exchange for Big Mom's protection.
name: Pekoms

description: Pell the Falcon is one of the two head guards in the Arabasta kingdom that serve under Igaram, the other being Chaka. He is said to be the strongest fighter in all of Arabasta.
name: Pell

description: Pellini is a dwarf from Tontatta Kingdom who first appeared on Green Bit.
name: Pellini

description: Penguin is a member of the Heart Pirates.
name: Penguin

description: Peppoko is a member of the Alvida Pirates and the triplet brother of Heppoko and Poppoko.
name: Peppoko

description: Ghost Princess Perona is the former commander of the Wild Zombies and Surprise Zombies of Thriller Bark prior to its collapse. She was one of the Mysterious Four and one of the major antagonists of the Thriller Bark Saga.
name: Perona

description: Peterman is the head of a kidnapping gang called the Hound Pets, located in Sabaody Archipelago, and a minor antagonist of the Sabaody Archipelago Arc.
name: Peterman

description: Petermoo was a member of the Roger Pirates.
name: Petermoo

description: Pica is one of the top three officers of the Donquixote Pirates. He occupies the Spade seat of the Donquixote Family and is the leader of the crew's Pica Army subdivision. Due to his actions and role, he is one of the major antagonists in the Dressrosa Arc.
name: Pica

description: Pickles, also known as the Tackle Machine, is a combatant of the Groggy Monsters of the Foxy Pirates.
name: Pickles

description: Pierre is a sky dot bird belonging to Gan Fall.
name: Pierre

description: Piiman is a former member of the Usopp Pirates, along with Ninjin and Tamanegi, from before Usopp joined the Straw Hat Pirates.
name: Piiman

description: Pike is a member of the G-5 branch of the Marines.
name: Pike

description: Monstrous Bird Pinky is a giant bird that appeared in the Orange Town Arc. He is classified as a Type C creature, Big Savage.
name: Pinky

description: Pisaro is the musician of the Arlong Pirates. He is an ocean sunfish fish-man. He was previously a member of the Sun Pirates.
name: Pisaro

description: Poker is a Shinuchi in the Beasts Pirates. During the raid on Onigashima, he was tamed by the power of the Kibi Kibi no Mi and joined the side of the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance.
name: Poker

description: Pomp is a member of the Kid Pirates.
name: Pomp

description: Poppoko is a member of the Alvida Pirates and the triplet brother of Heppoko and Peppoko.
name: Poppoko

description: Poppy is a member of the Kuja tribe.
name: Poppy

description: Porche is a combatant of the Foxy Pirates, and along with Hamburg, was one of Foxy's first crewmates. She is considered an idol by the crew and is loved by all of the men.
name: Porche

description: Porchemy was a member of the Bluejam Pirates until he was killed by his captain Bluejam for losing to Ace and Sabo.
name: Porchemy

description: Poro is a bookstore owner from Orange Town.
name: Poro

description: Portgas D. Ace, born as Gol D. Ace and nicknamed Fire Fist Ace, was the sworn older brother of Luffy and Sabo, and the biological son of the late Pirate King, Gol D. Roger, and Portgas D. Rouge. Ace was adopted by Monkey D. Garp, as had been requested by Roger before his execution. Ace was the 2nd division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates and one-time captain of the Spade Pirates.
name: Portgas D. Ace

description: Portgas D. Rouge was the mother of Portgas D. Ace and the lover of Gol D. Roger.
name: Portgas D. Rouge

description: Potaufeu is a king and one of fifty monarchs who took part in the Levely.
name: Potaufeu

description: Potsun is a doctor living in Arabasta. He is the doctor who managed to heal Pell's wounds after his heroic exploit at Alubarna.
name: Potsun

description: Pound is Big Mom's 25th ex-husband and the father of Charlotte Chiffon and Charlotte Lola. He is also the grandfather of Capone Pez and father-in-law of Capone Bege and Gotti.
name: Pound

description: Prince Grus is a Marine Rear Admiral stationed at Marine Base G-14. He is also a member of SWORD.
name: Prince Grus

description: Prometheus the Sun is a sun homie that Big Mom summons from her right hand. He is a special kind of homie, as he received a soul fragment from Big Mom herself, and serves as one of her personal weapons alongside Napoleon and Hera, and formerly Zeus.
name: Prometheus

description: Pudding Puddingwas a Marine commodore in the 77th Branch of the Marines.
name: Pudding Pudding

description: Pudos is a Waiter in the Beasts Pirates who worked as a guard in the Prisoner Mine. He was injured by Kawamatsu after trying to attack Monkey D. Luffy.
name: Pudos

description: Puppu is the captain of a pirate crew who attempted to pillage Nanohana in Arabasta.
name: Puppu

description: The Pacifista are human weapons (, ningen-heiki?) developed by Marine head scientist, Dr. Vegapunk. They are cyborgs built in the mold of the former Warlord Bartholomew Kuma, who was the cyborg prototype for the project. As stated by Sentomaru, the funds required for the construction of just one Pacifista are roughly equal to that of a Marine-issued battleship.
name: PX-1

description: The Pacifista are human weapons (, ningen-heiki?) developed by Marine head scientist, Dr. Vegapunk. They are cyborgs built in the mold of the former Warlord Bartholomew Kuma, who was the cyborg prototype for the project. As stated by Sentomaru, the funds required for the construction of just one Pacifista are roughly equal to that of a Marine-issued battleship.
name: PX-4

description: The Pacifista are human weapons (, ningen-heiki?) developed by Marine head scientist, Dr. Vegapunk. They are cyborgs built in the mold of the former Warlord Bartholomew Kuma, who was the cyborg prototype for the project. As stated by Sentomaru, the funds required for the construction of just one Pacifista are roughly equal to that of a Marine-issued battleship.
name: PX-5

description: The Pacifista are human weapons (, ningen-heiki?) developed by Marine head scientist, Dr. Vegapunk. They are cyborgs built in the mold of the former Warlord Bartholomew Kuma, who was the cyborg prototype for the project. As stated by Sentomaru, the funds required for the construction of just one Pacifista are roughly equal to that of a Marine-issued battleship.
name: PX-7

description: Pythagoras, also designated as Punk-04 (PUNK-04, Panku-F?), is one of the six satellites of Dr. Vegapunk, embodying his aspect of wisdom.
name: Pythagoras

description: Queen the Plague is an All-Star of the Beasts Pirates as one of Kaidou's three closest confidants. He formerly served as the de-facto ruler of Udon, a region in Wano Country. He is also a highly skilled scientist that was previously a member of the research team known as MADS.
name: Queen

description: Queen Mama Chanter is a ship homie belonging to the Big Mom Pirates, and the apparent flagship of their fleet.
name: Queen Mama Chanter

description: Quincy is a member of the Kid Pirates.
name: Quincy

description: Rabbitman is a Gifter in the Beasts Pirates.
name: Rabbitman

description: Rabiyan is a flying carpet homie that is often seen with Charlotte Pudding.
name: Rabiyan

description: Pretended Sleep Raccoon is a West Blue pirate captain who was defeated by the Whitebeard Pirates.
name: Raccoon

description: Raideen is a giant who resided on Elbaf 63 years ago. He was shown training Hajrudin.
name: Raideen
