description: Raijin is a ninja and a member of the Beasts Pirates. He previously was a member of the Orochi Oniwabanshu which served the shogun of Wano Country, Kurozumi Orochi.
name: Raijin

description: Raizo of the Mist is a ninja and retainer of the Kozuki Family, being one of the Nine Red Scabbards that served the legendary samurai Kozuki Oden during the Legendary Hour 20 years ago. He was born 55 years ago, but traveled 20 years forward in time at age 35.
name: Raizo

description: Raki is one of the Shandia warriors that fought to take back Upper Yard from Enel.
name: Raki

description: Rakuda is a resident of the Flower Capital in Wano Country. He once possessed the blueprints of Kaidou's fortress on Onigashima.
name: Rakuda

description: Rakuyo is the commander of the 7th division of the Whitebeard Pirates.
name: Rakuyo

description: Ramba is an infamous New World pirate captain who allied with Whitebeard.
name: Ramba

description: Ramen is the king of the Kano Country and one of fifty monarchs who took part in the Levely.
name: Ramen

description: Rampo is a dwarf from Tontatta Kingdom who first appeared on Green Bit. He is one of the two vice-chiefs of the Tontatta Kingdom along with Bomba, under Gancho and Leo.
name: Rampo

description: Ran is a member of the Kuja Pirates.
name: Ran

description: Crane Rider Randolph is a rabbit homie and a member of the Big Mom Pirates.
name: Randolph

description: Rangram was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.
name: Rangram

description: Rebecca is the daughter of Scarlett and Kyros, the niece of Viola and the granddaughter of Riku Doldo III. She is the former crown princess of Dressrosa, who forfeited her title to live with her father and currently serves as a lady-in-waiting to her aunt, Viola.
name: Rebecca

description: Reck is a member of the Kid Pirates.
name: Reck

description: The Recycle-Wan is a mechanical dog-like creature that eats scraps and litter on Egghead.
name: Recycle-Wan

description: Reforte is an infamous New World pirate captain who was subordinate to Whitebeard.
name: Reforte

description: Reuder is a reporter who witnessed and reported on the events of the Summit War of Marineford from Sabaody Archipelago.
name: Reuder

description: Richie is Mohji's pet lion and a member of the Buggy and Alvida Alliance as part of Buggy Pirates. He was a member of Buggy's Delivery, and is currently a member of Cross Guild. He is classified as a Type C creature, Big Savage.
name: Richie

description: Rika is a young girl from Shells Town, and the daughter of Ririka. She currently serves as a waitress at the 153rd Marine Branch.
name: Rika

description: Riku Doldo III is the recrowned king of Dressrosa after the defeat of Donquixote Doflamingo who dethroned him a decade ago, and the current patriarch of Riku Family. He is also a participant of the latest Levely, being one of the leading figures in the vote for the abolishment of the Seven Warlords of the Sea.
name: Riku Doldo III

description: Rindo is a member of the Kuja Pirates.
name: Rindo

description: Rint was one of the archaeologists of Ohara.
name: Rint

description: Commander Ripper was one of Morgan's officers at his base in the East Blue. After Morgan's defeat, he takes control of the base's operations.
name: Ripper

description: Ririka is a bartender who runs a local bar in Shells Town. She is also the mother of Rika.
name: Ririka

description: The Risky Brothers are two male pirates working as members of the Rolling Pirates under their captain, Lola. They were members of the Thriller Bark Victim's Association, a group of Gecko Moria's victims who banded together. During the time their shadows were stolen from them, they were placed in two squirrel zombies who were also named the Risky Brothers.
name: Risky Brothers

description: The Risky Brothers are two male pirates working as members of the Rolling Pirates under their captain, Lola. They were members of the Thriller Bark Victim's Association, a group of Gecko Moria's victims who banded together. During the time their shadows were stolen from them, they were placed in two squirrel zombies who were also named the Risky Brothers.
name: Risky Brothers

description: Rivers was the sniper of the Bellamy Pirates.
name: Rivers

description: Road is a giant from Elbaf who is the navigator of the New Giant Warrior Pirates and was formerly an S-Class ranked mercenary for Buggy's Delivery.
name: Road

description: Rob Lucci is a member of CP0.
name: Rob Lucci

description: Robson is Wapol's pet, and personal transport. He is a White Walkie, also known as Wooly Hippo.
name: Robson

description: Roche was one of the archaeologists of Ohara.
name: Roche

description: Impel Down, also known as the Underwater Prison (, Kaitei Kangoku?) or the Great Prison (, Dai Kangoku?), is a government-controlled stronghold in Paradise together with Marine Headquarters and Enies Lobby. It is the World Government's maximum-security prison for the most dangerous criminals and pirates. It is located underwater in the middle of the Calm Belt and part of the Tarai Current.
name: Roche Tomson

description: The Yeti Cool Brothers, Rock and Scotch, are assassins who were employed by Caesar Clown until his defeat. They are members of a mysterious type of giants.
name: Rock

description: Rocks D. Xebec, commonly known simply as Rocks, was the captain of the Rocks Pirates. He was prominent 40 years ago, before the Pirate King Gol D. Roger came into power.
name: Rocks D. Xebec

description: Rockstar is a member of the Red Hair Pirates, being relatively new in the crew two years ago.
name: Rockstar

description: Roddy is a bull mink and a Guardian of the Whale Forest.
name: Roddy

description: Rojiwas the wife of Oran, the mother of Mizuira, the sister-in-law of Nico Olvia, and the maternal aunt of Nico Robin.
name: Roji

description: Lieutenant Junior Grade Rokkaku was one of Axe-Hand Morgan's officers at the 153rd Marine Branch. He currently serves underCommander Ripper.
name: Rokkaku

description: Rokki is a member of the Numbers in the Beasts Pirates, representing the number six.
name: Rokki

description: Rolling Logan is an army commander of the Majiatsuka Kingdom. He joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi.
name: Rolling Logan

description: Roronoa Zoro, also known as Pirate Hunter Zoro, is the combatant of the Straw Hat Pirates, one of their two swordsmen and one of the Senior Officers of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet. Formerly a bounty hunter, he is the second member of Luffy's crew and the first to join it, doing so in the Romance Dawn Arc.
name: Roronoa Zoro

description: Executioner Roshio was a pirate captain who had a bounty of 42,000,000. He was killed by Bellamy at the beginning of the Jaya Arc.
name: Roshio

description: Ross was a combatant of the Bellamy Pirates.
name: Ross

description: Saint Rosward is one of the World Nobles who reside in the Holy City of Mary Geoise. He is the father of Shalria and Charlos.
name: Rosward

description: Rowing was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.
name: Rowing

description: Roxanne was a Baratie customer with whomSanjispoke. She appeared only in the manga.
name: Roxanne

description: In Thriller Bark, there are a variety of strange creatures that inhabit the island. Several of these creatures consist of various beasts and monsters commonly found in mythology and horror stories. They are zombies that are stitched up together in a manner that they resemble the Frankenstein monster. These zombies are all the creations of Dr. Hogback who also calls them mario (, Mario?, literally meaning Death Doll). They are created with Hogback's surgery and the power of Gecko Moria's Kage Kage no Mi.
name: Rug Bear

description: Run the Machete is an ex-pirate, who was a henchman for Caesar Clown. He is a spider centaur.
name: Run

description: Rush is an infamous New World pirate who allied himself with Whitebeard.
name: Rush

description: Russian was Senor Pink's wife and the mother of Gimlet.
name: Russian

description: Ryuboshi is an oarfish merman and the second son of the royal Neptune Family on Fish-Man Island.
name: Ryuboshi

description: Ryunosuke was a Rising Dragon (, Nobori Ry?) created by Kurozumi Kanjuro using the power of the Fude Fude no Mi. It was created to aid Kanjuro, Kin'emon, Trafalgar Law, and the Straw Hat Pirates in scaling the leg of Zunesha to reach Zou, and received its name from the Straw Hats.
name: Ryunosuke

description: Saber is a member of the Spade Pirates.
name: Saber

description: Flame Emperor Sabo is the Revolutionary Army's chief of staff, recognized as the No. 2 of the entire organization and outranked only by Supreme Commander Monkey D. Dragon. He is also the sworn brother of the notorious pirates Monkey D. Luffy and the late Portgas D. Ace.
name: Sabo

description: Sadi is a chief guard of Impel Down. She always wants to be addressed as Little Sadi (, Sadi-chan?).
name: Sadi

description: Sai, also known as Don Sai, is a member of the Chinjao Family and the 13th leader of the Happo Navy, as well as thecaptain of the third ship of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet. He is also a martial artist who joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi, where he met Monkey D. Luffy, whom he eventually pledged his loyalty to. He is now married to Baby 5, a former officer of the Donquixote Pirates who defected due to falling in love with him.
name: Sai

description: Saikoro is a tanuki owned by Wakasa and Hiroshi that lives in Bakura Town in Wano Country.
name: Saikoro

description: Sakazuki, formerly known by his admiral alias Akainu, is the current fleet admiral of the Marines, succeeding the previous fleet admiral, Sengoku. During the first half of the series, he was one of the three admirals, as the last one to debut. Upon becoming the fleet admiral, one of Sakazuki's first decisions was to relocate Marine Headquarters into the New World in preparation for the New Pirate Age.
name: Sakazuki

description: O-Saki is a resident of Ebisu Town.
name: Saki

description: Saldeath is one of the Chief Guards of Impel Down. He is the commander of the Blue Gorillas. Due to his actions, he is a major antagonist in the Impel Down Arc.
name: Saldeath

description: Salome is Boa Hancocks personal Snake Weapon.
name: Salome

description: Sam-san (, full title: Ordinary everyday person Sam-san) is a drunk man from Cocoyasi Village. On many occasions, he wanders around unknowingly when is drunk.
name: Sam

description: Samosa is a king and one of fifty monarchs who took part in the Levely.
name: Samosa

description: Samurai Batts is a visitor on Kyuka Island.
name: Samurai Batts

description: Sancrin the Thief is a member of the Longarm Tribe and Brook's former manager.
name: Sancrin

description: Sandayu is a bodyguard who worked for the oiran Komurasaki.
name: Sandayu

description: Black Leg Sanji, born as Vinsmoke Sanji, is the cook of the Straw Hat Pirates and one of the Senior Officers of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet. He is the fifth member of the crew and the fourth to join, doing so at the end of the Baratie Arc.
name: Sanji

description: Sanjuan Wolf is an enormous giant, known as Colossal Battleship for his size, and was originally one of the legendary criminals who was given a life sentence in Level 6 of Impel Down, as his crimes were so atrocious they had to effectively be erased from history itself. He was initially mentioned briefly by Emporio Ivankov.
name: Sanjuan Wolf

description: The Medaka Mermaid Quintuplets (, Medaka no Ningyo no Itsutsugo?, VIZ Media: Guppy Mermaid Quintuplets) are five young Japanese rice fish mermaids who are friends with Camie. Their names are Ichika, Nika, Sanka, Yonka, and Yonka Two.
name: Sanka

description: Sapi is a fish salesman from Loguetown who sold Sanji the blue-finned elephant tuna.
name: Sapi

description: Sarahebi is a Gifter of the Beasts Pirates who works under Black Maria. She was also a school teacher in the Flower Capital.
name: Sarahebi

description: Sarfunkel is a new inhabitant on the Island of Rare Animals. She is described as a barrel woman.
name: Sarfunkel

description: Sarie Nantokanette is the queen of Goa Kingdom and Sterry's wife.
name: Sarie Nantokanette

description: Big Knife Sarquiss was the first mate of the Bellamy Pirates, with a bounty of 38,000,000 on his head. His epithet originates from the large dagger he always wields, which bears a strong resemblance to a massive kukri.
name: Sarquiss

description: Saru is the pet dog of two of the World Nobles, Saint Rosward and Saint Shalria.
name: Saru

description: Sarutobi is a ninja and a member of the Beasts Pirates. He previously was a member of the Orochi Oniwabanshu which served the shogun of Wano Country, Kurozumi Orochi.
name: Sarutobi

description: Overflowing Sasaki is one of the Tobiroppo, the strongest six Shinuchi of the Beasts Pirates, and leads the crew's Armored Division. Before joining the Beasts Pirates, he captained his own crew called the Sasaki Pirates.
name: Sasaki

description: Satori of the Forest punished criminals with the Ordeal of Balls during Enel's reign. He was one of Enel's top warriors, the Skypiea Priests, until his defeat. He is also the oldest triplet brother of Hotori and Kotori. Due to this actions, he was a major antagonist of the Skypiea Arc.
name: Satori

description: Sauce is the king of Jambalaya Kingdom (, Janbaraya koku?)  and one of fifty monarchs who took part in the Levely.
name: Sauce

description: Scarlett was the first daughter of the Riku Family and the former crown princess of Dressrosa until falsifying her own death. She was Viola's elder sister, Kyros' wife, and Rebecca's mother. She was killed by Diamante when Donquixote Pirates took over Dressrosa ten years ago.
name: Scarlett

description: Schollzo is a member of the Franky Family.
name: Schollzo

description: Scopper Gaban was a member of the Roger Pirates.
name: Scopper Gaban

description: Iron Boy Scotch is a member of the Beasts Pirates working as the guardian of one of the Emperor Kaidou's favorite islands.
name: Scotch

description: Iron Boy Scotch is a member of the Beasts Pirates working as the guardian of one of the Emperor Kaidou's favorite islands.
name: Scotch

description: Scratchmen Apoo, also known as Roar of the Sea, is the captain of the On Air Pirates and was formerly an informant for the Beasts Pirates, led by Kaidou of the Four Emperors.
name: Scratchmen Apoo

description: Seagull Guns Nozdon is a former member of the Roger Pirates.
name: Seagull Guns Nozdon

description: Captain Seamars is the captain of the Space Pirates who appears in Enel's cover story.
name: Seamars

description: Seira is a bluestriped angelfish mermaid and a dancer in the Mermaid Cafe.
name: Seira

description: Seki is the deposed king of Lulusia Kingdom and one of fifty monarchs who took part in the Levely. He is the father of Princess Komane.
name: Seki

description: Sengoku the Buddha is a former fleet admiral of the Marines, succeeding Kong and preceding Sakazuki. Sometime during the timeskip, he became an Inspector General.
name: Sengoku

description: Senor Pink is an assassin and officer of the Donquixote Pirates' Diamante Army. He was also the husband of Russian and the father of Gimlet.
name: Senor Pink

description: Sentomaru is the bodyguard of Vegapunk and is in command of the Marines' Science Unit (, Kagaku Butai?) as its captain ( Taich). After the timeskip, he has become a full-fledged Marine officer. Due to his actions, he can be considered a supporting antagonist in the Sabaody Archipelago Arc and the secondary antagonist of the Return to Sabaody Arc.
name: Sentomaru

description: Serizawa is a dyer and instructor who taught Bellamy in the cover page serial The Stories of the Self-Proclaimed Straw Hat Grand Fleet.
name: Serizawa

description: Seto was one of the Shandia who lived on Jaya four hundred years ago.
name: Seto

description: Shachi is a member of the Heart Pirates.
name: Shachi

description: Shaka, also designated as Punk-01 (PUNK-01, Panku-Wan?), is one of the six satellites of Dr. Vegapunk, embodying his aspect of good.
name: Shaka

description: Shakuyaku, most commonly known by her nickname Shakky, is the bartender of Shakky's Rip-off Bar on the Sabaody Archipelago, where she lives with her romantic partner Silvers Rayleigh. She is a minor ally of the Straw Hat Pirates during the Sabaody Archipelago Arc.
name: Shakuyaku

description: Saint Shalria is a World Noble, the younger sister of Saint Charlos, and the daughter of Saint Rosward.
name: Shalria

description: Sham is an officer of the Black Cat Pirates. Along with his partner Buchi, he is also the protector of the crew's ship, the Bezan Black, and together they are known as the Nyaban Brothers (, Nyban Burazzu?).
name: Sham

description: Shanba is an inhabitant of Torino Kingdom. He was first seen at the time of Chopper's arrival.
name: Shanba

description: The Shandia Chief is the leader of the Shandia tribe.
name: Shandia Chief

description: Red-Haired Shanks, commonly known as just Red Hair, is the chief of the Red Hair Pirates and one of the Four Emperors that rule over the New World.
name: Shanks

description: Captain Sharinguru is a Marine captain who helped in the Buster Call on Enies Lobby.
name: Sharinguru

description: Sheepshead is a Shinuchi of the Beasts Pirates who was in charge of the Gifters on Zou.
name: Sheepshead

description: Shelly is Tonjit's horse and an animal of Long Ring Long Land.
name: Shelly

description: Shiki the Golden Lion, also known as the Flying Pirate, is the admiral of the Golden Lion Pirates, the first known prisoner ever to escape from Impel Down and a former member of the Rocks Pirates.
name: Shiki

description: Shimotsuki Kozaburo was a member of the Shimotsuki Family and a swordsmith who crafted the Great Grade Meito Wado Ichimonji and Enma. He was born in Wano Country, but illegally departed from there 55 years ago and eventually settled down in what became Shimotsuki Village in the East Blue. There, he fathered a son named Koushirou, making him the grandfather of Koushirou's deceased daughter Kuina.
name: Shimotsuki Kozaburo

description: Shimotsuki Ryuma was a legendary, world-famous samurai hailing from the Shimotsuki Family of Wano Country, who lived during Wano's Country of Gold era centuries ago. He was revered for his mastery of swordsmanship that earned him the title Sword God, as well as his feat of slaying a dragon. He is also the direct ancestor of Shimotsuki Ushimaru.
name: Shimotsuki Ryuma

description: Shimotsuki Ushimaru was a member of the Shimotsuki Family, and the last daimyo of Ringo in Wano Country. He ruled until the takeover of Kurozumi Orochi as shogun 20 years ago. He was a direct descendant of the legendary samurai Shimotsuki Ryuma.
name: Shimotsuki Ushimaru

description: Shimotsuki Yasuie, also known as Yasu the Hedgehog, Tonoyasu, or just Yasu (, Yasu?), was a member of the Shimotsuki Family, and a taikomochi who lived in Ebisu Town near the capital of Wano Country. He was the adoptive father of Toko.
name: Shimotsuki Yasuie

description: Shin Detamaruka is a citizen of Dressrosa and a former dancer. She is the grandmother of Shin Jaiya.
name: Shin Detamaruka

description: Shin Jaiya is a citizen of Dressrosa. She is the granddaughter of Shin Detamaruka.
name: Shin Jaiya

description: Shine is a Marine Chief Petty Officer who works under the command of Hina.
name: Shine

description: Shinobu is a kunoichi from Wano Country and a retainer of the Kozuki Family, having once served in the Oniwabanshu of the Kozuki Shogunate and trained under Kin'emon as his protge. She is also the younger sister of Shinosuke.
name: Shinobu

description: Shinosuke is a ninja who serves the Kozuki Family. He is Shinobu's older brother.
name: Shinosuke

description: Shion is a member of the Kuja. She is never seen but her name appears on the match-ups of the arena battle board.
name: Shion

description: Shioyaki is a salmon Fish-Man who was a member of the Arlong Pirates and the head of banquets.
name: Shioyaki

description: Princess Shirahoshi, famous in the world as the Mermaid Princess (, Ningyo Hime?), is a giant smelt-whiting mermaid and the princess of the Ryugu Kingdom, as the youngest of King Neptune's children in the Neptune royal family.
name: Shirahoshi

description: Shiruton Doruyanaika is a girl from Eustass Kid's and Killer's childhood and their first crush.
name: Shiruton Doruyanaika

description: Shiryu of the Rain is one of the Ten Titanic Captains of the Blackbeard Pirates, as captain of the Second Ship.
name: Shiryu

description: Full Power Shishilian is a lion mink and the captain of the Inuarashi Musketeer Squad, as well as one of the Three Inuarashi Musketeers leading the squad.
name: Shishilian

description: Sonar King Shoujou is the captain of the Shoujou Pirates, the head of underwater sonar operations around Jaya's coast, the sworn brother of Masira and a follower of Mont Blanc Cricket, as part of the Saruyama Alliance. He and Masira were both fans of the fairy tale concerning Cricket's ancestor, Mont Blanc Noland.
name: Shoujou

description: Captain Shu was one of the Marine captains that helped in the Buster Call on Enies Lobby.
name: Shu

description: Sky Rider Shura was one of the four priests of the Upper Yard, who punished criminals with the Ordeal of String during Enel's reign. He rode a giant flying bird named Fuza. He is a major antagonist during the Skypiea Arc.
name: Shura

description: Madam Shyarly is a shortfin mako shark mermaid living on Fish-Man Island. She is the proprietor of the Mermaid Cafe and Arlong's younger half-sister. She used to be a fortune teller until she decided to discard her crystal ball.
name: Shyarly

description: Sicily is a Marine Rear Admiral.
name: Sicily

description: The Rocks Pirates were a legendary and powerfulpirate crew that sailed the seas until their defeat 38 years before the current storyline.
name: Silver Axe

description: Silvers Rayleigh, also known as the Dark King, is an extremely powerful and famous retired pirate who formerly served as the first mate of the legendary Roger Pirates, being known as the Right Hand of the Pirate King. He is one of the major figures, along with Whitebeard, Shiki, Monkey D. Garp, Sengoku, Tsuru and Kong from the times when Gol D. Roger, the Pirate King, was still alive.
name: Silvers Rayleigh

description: Sind is a child who was held captive in the Biscuits Room on Punk Hazard. He was freed with the rest of the children by the Straw Hat Pirates.
name: Sind

description: Skull is a member of the Spade Pirates and, subsequently, the Whitebeard Pirates.
name: Skull

description: Sleepy is an infamous New World pirate who allied himself with Whitebeard.
name: Sleepy

description: Smiley, more commonly known as Slime (, Suraimu?), was a pet of Caesar Clown. It was created by gathering and compressing the poisonous H2S gas that spread throughout Punk Hazard and using Vegapunk's process of Zoan devil fruit animation to bring it to life. It was kept in the Punk Hazard Burning Lands before being released.
name: Smiley

description: Smoker the White Hunter is a Marine officer and the Commanderofthe G-5Marine Base, following the treason of his former superior Vergo. He was first introduced as a captain in Loguetown, where he made it his mission to capture Luffy, and was later promoted to the rank of commodore, due to the events in Arabasta. At some point during the timeskip, he was promoted to the rank of vice admiral. Since his debut, he has been the superior of Tashigi, serving as her mentor as well.
name: Smoker

description: Rebar Smooge is an ex-prisoner, who was a centaur henchman for Caesar Clown.
name: Smooge

description: Gear 4 (Gear Fourth) is a transformation technique first seen in Luffy's battle against Donquixote Doflamingo. It was developed by Luffy during his training on Rusukaina.
name: Snakeman

description: Sodom is one of the two gigantic King Bulls (sea horse in the most literal sense) owned by the Franky Family, the other being Gomorrah.
name: Sodom

description: Solitaire is a Shinuchi of the Beasts Pirates who serves as a vice warden of the Prisoner Mine in the Udon region of Wano Country.
name: Solitaire

description: O-Some is a geisha who works in Wano Country's Flower Capital.
name: Some

description: Sonieh is the leader of 50-men mechanic team in the Foxy Pirates. Luffy chose their flag instead of one of their shipwrights.
name: Sonieh

description: Sora is a mermaid and an employee at the Mermaid Cafe.
name: Sora

description: Soro was Helmeppo's pet wolf and the main reason that Roronoa Zoro was arrested by the Marines at Shells Town. He is classified as a Type C creature, Big Savage.
name: Soro

description: First Lieutenant Spacey is one of the automata created on Karakuri Island by Tsukimi.
name: Spacey

description: Spandam is the former chief of CP9 and CP5. He is the son of Spandine, who was also his predecessor as the chief of CP9. He currently serves under CP0.
name: Spandam

description: Spandine is the father of Spandam and was CP9's chief 22 years ago during the Ohara Incident. He led the investigation in Ohara and was responsible for summoning the Buster Call. Presently, his political power within the World Government is weakening due to an unknown disease he has been stricken with.
name: Spandine

description: Spartan is a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum who was going to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi, before being defeated by Luffy.
name: Spartan

description: Spector is the owner of the Tropical Hotel.
name: Spector

description: Speed is a Shinuchi of the Beasts Pirates who is stationed in Bakura Town. However, she became a subordinate to Tama due to the latter's Devil Fruit powers and became an ally of the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance. She has been dubbed Umami (, Umami?, English version: Horselina) by Tama and Monkey D. Luffy.
name: Speed

description: Speed Jiru is the commander of the 14th division of the Whitebeard Pirates.
name: Speed Jiru

description: Spencer was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.
name: Spencer

description: The Sphinx is a giant sphinx that serves as the boss of Impel Down's Level 2, Beast Hell.
name: Sphinx

description: Splash and Splatter are two okama pirate twins who are found on Fish-Man Island. They both willingly donated blood to Sanji, who was dying of severe blood loss.
name: Splash

description: Splash and Splatter are two okama pirate twins who are found on Fish-Man Island. They both willingly donated blood to Sanji, who was dying of severe blood loss.
name: Splatter

description: Spoil is the chairman of the Thriller Bark Victim's Association.
name: Spoil

description: Maelstrom Spider Squard is an infamous New World pirate and the captain of the Maelstrom Spider Pirates. Squard and his crew were allies of the Whitebeard Pirates and participated in the Summit War of Marineford.
name: Squard

description: Vice Admiral Stainless is a Marine officer who participated in the Summit War of Marineford. In the anime, his name was said to be Kaizeruhige (, Kaizeruhige?).
name: Stainless

description: Lieutenant Junior Grade Stalker is a Marine on Vice Admiral Momonga's ship.
name: Stalker

description: Stansen is a giant from Elbaf, who is a shipwright. After being imprisoned in the Auction House, he was freed alongside other slaves by Silvers Rayleigh during the Straw Hat Pirates' assault on the business.
name: Stansen

description: Stefan is Whitebeard's dog. It is a character invented by Oda when a fan asked him in an SBS if Whitebeard's mustache could be used as a boomerang. Oda answered that Whitebeard probably did whenever he took his dog, Stefan, for a walk.
name: Stefan

description: Sterry is the king of Goa Kingdom and the husband of the queen, Sarie Nantokanette.
name: Sterry

description: Stevie is one of the two sea train organizers in Water 7, along with Bushon.
name: Stevie

description: The Super Spot-Billed Duck Troops are a family of seven Super Spot-Billed Ducks (and later one camel) who serve the kingdom of Arabasta. They are led by their captain Karoo, and are reputed to be the fastest troop in the kingdom of Arabasta. All of the ducks have the strange theme of wearing different types of hats and various other jewelry and clothing. Also strange was that the last member to join the squad, Matsuge, is a camel who helped the Straw Hats confront Baroque Works.
name: Stomp

description: Cocoa Weed is a village located on Drum Island. It neighbors the village of Bighorn and is south of Gyasta.
name: Stool

description: Vice Admiral Strawberry is a Marine officer, and one of the five vice admirals who led the Buster Call assault on Enies Lobby.
name: Strawberry

description: Gourmet Knight Streusen is the executive chef of the Big Mom Pirates, and is also the co-founder of the crew alongside Big Mom herself. Prior to his current position, he was the chef of a pirate crew that has since fallen apart.
name: Streusen

description: Stroganoff is the king of Beef Kingdom (, Bfu koku?) and one of fifty monarchs who took part in the Levely.
name: Stroganoff

description: Stronger is the horse that Doc Q rides on. Because Doc Q is seemingly always sick, he rides on Stronger all the time, since the doctor tends to collapse if left unsupported for some time. However, Stronger is just as sick as he is. He is classified as a Type A creature, Big Friendly.
name: Stronger

description: Stussy is an agent of CP0. In her cover as an emperor of the Underworld, she operates under the epithet of the Queen of the Pleasure District.
name: Stussy

description: Su is a Cloud Fox and pet of Conis.
name: Su

description: Sugamichi and Warazane are two land-dwelling catfish ridden by Fujin and Raijin, respectively.
name: Sugamichi

description: Sugar is a special officer of the Donquixote Pirates' Trebol Army. She was one of the most integral components of Doflamingo's plan in keeping Dressrosa in line, as any dissenters were turned into toys by her Hobi Hobi no Mi powers. She is also the younger sister of Monet. Due to her actions and role, she is a supporting antagonist during the Dressrosa Arc.
name: Sugar

description: Suke is a gangster who is a member of the Kyoshiro Family in Wano Country.
name: Suke

description: Sukoshiba Kanishitoru is a guard working in Impel Down.
name: Sukoshiba Kanishitoru

description: Suleiman the Beheader is a war criminal who joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi. He eventually joined the Beautiful Pirates, serving under Cavendish. He is an ally of Luffy during the Dressrosa Arc.
name: Suleiman

description: Sunbell is a former member of the Roger Pirates.
name: Sunbell

description: Surume is a kraken  and famous giant creature which dwells in the deepest parts of the ocean. He was enslaved by the New Fish-Man Pirates, but later became the pet of Monkey D. Luffy, who was the one who gave Surume his name.
name: Surume

description: Sweet Pea is a member of the Kuja tribe living on the island Amazon Lily. During the timeskip, she became a member of the Kuja Pirates.
name: Sweet Pea

description: Ship Cutter T Bone is a former knight and currently a Marine rear admiral. As a Marine captain two years ago, he was a minor antagonist during the Water 7 Arc and confronted the Straw Hat Pirates on the Sea Train route to Enies Lobby.
name: T Bone

description: Tabuhachiro is an samurai and an ally of the Kozuki Family. After waiting 20 years for the return of the Nine Red Scabbards, he affiliated with the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance to raid Onigashima.
name: Tabuhachiro

description: Tacos is the king of the Shishano Kingdom.
name: Tacos

description: Takao, also known as O-Taka (, O-Taka?), is a kamuro living in the Flower Capital of Wano Country who attended to the oiran Komurasaki alongside Toko.
name: Takao

description: Take is a carp Fish-Man and is a member of the Arlong Pirates. He is the commander of parties.
name: Take

description: O-Tama is a girl from the region of Kuri in Wano Country. She is a kasa weaver working under Tenguyama Hitetsu, as well as a kunoichi in training under the apprenticeship of Shinobu.
name: Tama

description: O-Tama is a girl from the region of Kuri in Wano Country. She is a kasa weaver working under Tenguyama Hitetsu, as well as a kunoichi in training under the apprenticeship of Shinobu.
name: Tama

description: Tamachibiis a child Dr. Kureha healed while she was in Cocoa Weed. He lives with his father, who is the owner of Stool, a restaurant in town.
name: Tamachibi

description: Baron Tamago (also known as Viscount Hiyoko and Count Niwatori in his second and third form respectively) is a knight-ranked combatant of the Big Mom Pirates, who originates from the Longleg Tribe. He and his partner Pekoms were responsible for collecting the monthly payment of sweets from Fish-Man Island in exchange for Big Mom's protection.
name: Tamago

description: Tamagon is a member of the Franky Family.
name: Tamagon

description: Tamanegi is a former member of the Usopp Pirates, along with Ninjin and Piiman, before Usopp joined the Straw Hat Pirates.
name: Tamanegi

description: Tank Lepanto is the commander of Dressrosa's Self-Defense Army. He joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi.
name: Tank Lepanto

description: Tansui is a member of the Macro Pirates and a former member of the Sun Pirates. He is an arowana fish-man.
name: Tansui

description: Tararan was a General Zombie and the Commander of the Spider Mice on Thriller Bark. He was the one that had caught the Thousand Sunny in his webs, forcing the Straw Hat Pirates to enter the island.
name: Tararan

description: Taro was a member of the Roger Pirates.
name: Taro

description: Taroimo is a cyborg dog from Karakuri Island.
name: Taroimo

description: Captain Tashigi is a Marine officer serving under Vice Admiral Smoker in the base of G-5.
name: Tashigi

description: Tate is a nurse who worked for the Whitebeard Pirates as part of the crew's medical division.
name: Tate

description: Tea IV is the king of Eigis Kingdom (, Eigisu koku?) on the Grand Line and one of fifty monarchs who took part in the Levely.
name: Tea IV

description: Tegata Ringana is a doctor on Dressrosa.
name: Tegata Ringana

description: Tenjo-Sagari is a Gifter in the Beasts Pirates who works under Black Maria.
name: Tenjo-Sagari

description: Tensei, also known by his Marine alias Kurouma, is the director of the Marine Criminal Investigative Service (, Kaigun Hanzai Ssa-kyoku?).
name: Tensei

description: Terracotta is Igaram's wife and the royal head chef who appeared very late in the Arabasta Arc. She is also the royal seamstress. Her friend and helper is Maidy.
name: Terracotta

description: Terry is a bartender at a pub in Mock Town. He is not named in the manga, but his name was given in the databooks.
name: Terry

description: Terry Gilteo is an intelligence controller ( Jh kansei-kan) at the Revolutionary Army Headquarters on Baltigo.
name: Terry Gilteo

description: Mr. Teru is a carpenter who lives in Cocoyasi Village.
name: Teru

description: Tetsu is a former prisoner of Udon's prisoner mines. In the past, he was a resident of the Flower Capital.
name: Tetsu

description: Thalassa Lucas is the former king of Ilisia Kingdom, a country in West Blue.
name: Thalassa Lucas

description: Thatch was the commander of the 4th division as well as the culinary chef of the Whitebeard Pirates. He was murdered by Marshall D. Teach prior to the main storyline.
name: Thatch

description: Tibany is an okama from Momoiro Island. He and the other okama chased after Sanji and attempted to convert him into an okama. In the anime, he was called Elizabeth (, Erizabesu?).
name: Tibany

description: Tilestone is one of the five foremen of Dock One of the Galley-La Company in Water 7. Tilestone is the last of the foremen to be formally introduced in the story, although he is present from the first scene Galley-La is shown in. His specialties are cabinetry, caulking, and flag making.
name: Tilestone

description: Togare is a Fish-Man that lives in Coral Hill. In the manga, he was an unnamed background character, but he was given a name and his role was expanded slightly in the anime.
name: Togare

description: Tokijiro is a resident of the Flower Capital in Wano Country. He once possessed the blueprints to Kaidou's fortress on Onigashima.
name: Tokijiro

description: Tokikake, better known by his alias Chaton, is a Marine vice admiral.
name: Tokikake

description: Toko is a girl who lived in the Flower Capital of Wano Country and worked as a kamuro for Kozuki Hiyori while she was living as the courtesan Komurasaki until she angered the late shogun Kurozumi Orochi. She is the adopted daughter of the late former daimyo of Hakumai Shimotsuki Yasuie and a member of the Shimotsuki clan. After the Beasts Pirates' fall from power, she returned to live in the Flower Capital with Hiyori.
name: Toko

description: Tom was a long-horned cowfish fish-man who was known as the most skilled shipwright in the world and the head of his own company, Tom's Workers. He was also Iceburg's and Franky's teacher and Den's older brother. Furthermore, he was well known for being the builder of the Roger Pirates' ship, the Oro Jackson.
name: Tom

description: Tomato Gangis a debt collector who is after Pandaman. The two often show up in panels together, as Pandaman is constantly on the run from him. He later hires Pandaman's rival,Unforgivable Mask to help track him down. He carries something that looks like a gun, but there are rumors that it is actually a piece of konbu-maki (, a type of food consisting of fish wrapped in seaweed and boiled).
name: Tomato Gang

description: Tonjit is an elderly nomad belonging to a tribe that lives on Long Ring Long Land.
name: Tonjit

description: Tony Tony Chopper, also known as Cotton Candy Lover Chopper, is the doctor of the Straw Hat Pirates and one of the Senior Officers of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet. He is the sixth member of the crew and the fifth to join, doing so at the end of the Drum Island Arc. He was temporarily forced to join the Foxy Pirates during the Long Ring Long Land Arc, but was quickly returned to Luffy's crew.
name: Tony Tony Chopper

description: Tori is a member of the Blackbeard Pirates.
name: Tori

description: Toto is Koza's father and Goro's older brother, who lives in Yuba.
name: Toto

description: Toyama Tsujigiro is a Wano Country government official who lives in the Flower Capital. He is also a serial killer who attacked strangers at night.
name: Toyama Tsujigiro

description: Trafalgar D. Water Law, more commonly known as just Trafalgar Law (, Torafarug R?) and by his epithet as the Surgeon of Death, is a pirate from North Blue and the captain and doctor of the Heart Pirates. He is one of twelve pirates who are referred to as the Worst Generation. He became one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea during the timeskip, but his position was revoked for allying with the Straw Hat Pirates. Law, like many other pirates, dreams of finding the One Piece, while also desiring to know the purpose of the Will of D.
name: Trafalgar D. Water Law

description: Trafalgar Lami was Trafalgar D. Water Law's younger sister from the town of Flevance.
name: Trafalgar Lami

description: Trebol is one of the top three officers of the Donquixote Pirates, acting as a Staff Officer. He occupies the Club seat of the Donquixote Family and is the leader of the crew's Trebol Army subdivision.
name: Trebol

description: Tristan is a squirrel mink and one of Inuarashi's subjects.
name: Tristan

description: Tritobu is the prince of Nagagutsu Kingdom. He accompanied his father Furrari to the Levely.
name: Tritobu

description: Tsugaru Umi is a woman who trained Nico Robin to perform as a geisha. She lives in the Flower Capital of the Wano Country.
name: Tsugaru Umi

description: Dr. Tsukimi was an old man who appeared in Enel's cover story.
name: Tsukimi

description: Broken Hat Tsunagoro is a yakuza boss who was in charge of the Hakumai region in Wano Country. He was imprisoned in Udon by the Beasts Pirates, but was freed when Luffy took over the prison.
name: Tsunagoro

description: Tsunokkov is a former prisoner of Impel Down and resident of Newkama Land in Level 5.5. He is one of Emporio Ivankov's dancers.
name: Tsunokkov

description: Great Staff Officer Tsuru is an extremely famous and powerful Marine vice admiral.
name: Tsuru

description: Tsurue Monnosuke is the machi-bugy of the Flower Capital.
name: Tsurue Monnosuke

description: Tsurujo, commonly known as O-Tsuru (, O-Tsuru?), is a tea house owner who lives in the Kuri region in Wano Country. She is also the wife of Kin'emon.
name: Tsurujo

description: Turco was a member of the Fake Straw Hat Crew who masqueraded as Franky.
name: Turco

description: Tyrannosaurus is the name of a small mouse that Iceburg found and takes care of.
name: Tyrannosaurus

description: Ubau was the God of Skypiea roughly 400 years ago. His desire to live on the Vearth the Shandia had called home initiated a war between the Skypieans and Shandia that would last over 400 years.
name: Ubau

description: Ucy is a fighting bull (, Tgy?) who is well-known as the Brutal Bull. He competed as a gladiator in the Corrida Colosseum, where he befriended and was given his name by Monkey D. Luffy. He would serve as an ally of Luffy during the Dressrosa Arc.
name: Ucy

description: Uhho-kun is a gorilla.
name: Uhho

description: Uholisia is the daughter of Chichilisia, the leader of the Niho Navy. She is the wife of 25 men and Sai's former fiance.
name: Uholisia

description: UK is a member of the Kid Pirates.
name: UK

description: Seaman Recruit Ukkari is a Marine soldier who serves at the Shells Town Marine Base.
name: Ukkari

description: Ukon is a samurai who allied with the Kozuki Family. After waiting 20 years for the return of the Nine Red Scabbards, he affiliated with the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance to raid Onigashima.
name: Ukon

description: Ulti is one of the Tobiroppo, the six strongest Shinuchi of the Beasts Pirates. She is the elder sister of fellow Tobiroppo Page One.
name: Ulti

description: Ultraking was the assistant-manager of Rain Dinners in Rainbase during the Arabasta Arc.
name: Ultraking

description: Deep Ocean Current Umit is a shipping magnate and one of the emperors of the Underworld.
name: Umit

description: Unforgivable Mask is a hidden One Piece character, much like Pandaman. He is, in fact, Pandaman's rival.
name: Unforgivable Mask

description: Uni is a member of the Heart Pirates.
name: Uni

description: Unigaro was a Wild Zombie who lived on Thriller Bark.
name: Unigaro

description: Urashima is a yokozuna-ranked sumo wrestler of Wano Country's Flower Capital. He is also of samurai class, thus giving him an elevated social status.
name: Urashima

description: Urouge, nicknamed the Mad Monk, is a pirate hailing from a sky island and captain of the Fallen Monk Pirates. He is one of twelve pirates referred to as the Worst Generation, and prior to the two-year timeskip had a bounty of 108,000,000.
name: Urouge

description: Usagihebi is an animal who lives on the Island of Rare Animals. Like all the animals on the island, he is protected by Gaimon.
name: Usagihebi

description: Usakkov is a former prisoner of Impel Down and resident of Newkama Land in Level 5.5. He is one of Emporio Ivankov's dancers.
name: Usakkov

description: God Usopp is the sniper of the Straw Hat Pirates and one of the Senior Officers of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet. He is the fourth member of the crew and the third to join, doing so at the end of the Syrup Village Arc. Although he left the crew during the Water 7 Arc, he rejoined at the end of the Post-Enies Lobby Arc.
name: Usopp

description: Uta is a world-famous singer or diva (, Utahime?) and the adopted daughter of Red-Haired Shanks. She was also a musician in his crew, until he left her while she was still a child.
name: Uta

description: Uwattsura is a Waiter of the Beasts Pirates who serves as a chief guard in the Prisoner Mine of the Udon region.
name: Uwattsura

description: Uzu is a child who was held captive in Punk Hazard's Biscuits Room. He was freed with the rest of the children by the Straw Hat Pirates.
name: Uzu

description: Uzuki Tempura was a samurai who, as a member of the Uzuki Family, served as the most recent daimyo of the Udon region until he was imprisoned and killed by Kaidou 20 years ago.
name: Uzuki Tempura

description: Van Augur, nicknamed The Supersonic, is the sniper of the Blackbeard Pirates, as well as one of the Ten Titanic Captains and captain of the Third Ship of the crew.
name: Van Augur

description: Vander Decken was the first captain of the Flying Dutchman.
name: Vander Decken

description: Vander Decken IX is the captain of the Flying Pirates on their ship, the Flying Dutchman, and the eighth descendant of the original Vander Decken of legend. He is a Japanese bullhead shark fish-man and the secondary antagonist of the Fish-Man Island Arc.
name: Vander Decken IX

description: Vasco Shot, monikered Heavy Drinker, is one of the Ten Titanic Captains of the Blackbeard Pirates, as captain of its Eighth Ship. He was originally one of several legendary criminals given a life sentence on Impel Down's Level 6, before being freed by Blackbeard and joining him.
name: Vasco Shot

description: Demon Bamboo Vergo was one of the four elite officers and the first to occupy the Heart seat of the Donquixote Pirates under the codename Corazon.
name: Vergo

description: Captain Very Good was one of the Marines who helped to attack the Straw Hat Pirates during the Buster Call at Enies Lobby.
name: Very Good

description: Victoria Cindry was once a famous stage actress who died after falling off the stage twelve years ago. Having been infatuated with her, Dr. Hogback stole her corpse in order to make her his own personal zombie servant with the aid of Gecko Moria's powers.
name: Victoria Cindry

description: Vinsmoke Ichiji, also known as Sparking Red, is the eldest son and second child of the Vinsmoke Family. He is a prince of the Germa Kingdomand a commander in its military arm,Germa 66.
name: Vinsmoke Ichiji

description: Vinsmoke Judge, also known as Garuda, is the king of the Germa Kingdom, the supreme commander of the Germa 66, and the patriarch of the Vinsmoke Family, being Sanji's biological father. He is also a skilled scientist and former member of MADS, where he was a research partner to the leading World Government scientist Vegapunk.
name: Vinsmoke Judge

description: Vinsmoke Niji, also known as Dengeki Blue, is the second son and third child of the Vinsmoke Family. He is a prince of the Germa Kingdom and a commander in its military arm, Germa 66.
name: Vinsmoke Niji

description: Vinsmoke Reiju, also known as Poison Pink, is the eldest child and only daughter of the Vinsmoke Family. She is the princess of the Germa Kingdom and a commander in its military army, Germa 66. She is an ally of the Straw Hat Pirates in the Whole Cake Island Arc.
name: Vinsmoke Reiju

description: Vinsmoke Sora was thequeen of the Germa Kingdom. She was the wife of Vinsmoke Judge, and the mother of Reiju, Ichiji, Niji, Sanji, and Yonji. She died sometime during Sanji's childhood.
name: Vinsmoke Sora

description: Vinsmoke Yonji, also known as Winch Green, is the fourth son and youngest child of the Vinsmoke Family. He is a prince of the Germa Kingdom and a commander in its military arm, Germa 66.
name: Vinsmoke Yonji

description: Viola is the second daughter of the Riku Family and the current crown princess of Dressrosa after her niece Rebecca abdicated her position. She is the younger sister of the late Scarlett.
name: Viola

description: Vista of the Flower Swords is the former 5th division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates. He is one of the most prominent members of his crew.
name: Vista

description: Vitan is an infamous New World pirate captain who was subordinate to Whitebeard.
name: Vitan

description: Monster Gun Vito is a member of the Fire Tank Pirates, working as the crew's advisor.
name: Vito

description: Large Monk Wadatsumi is a giant tiger blowfish fish-man and a member of the Sun Pirates. He was formerly a member of the Flying Pirates under captain Vander Decken IX before they were defeated.
name: Wadatsumi

description: Wakasa is a resident of Bakura Town in Wano Country who runs a restaurant alongside Hiroshi; the two of them own a tanuki named Saikoro which the sumo wrestler Urashima forced to be cooked and served to him.
name: Wakasa

description: Wallace is a weedy stingfish fish-man and a member of the Spade Pirates.
name: Wallace

description: Wallem is an infamous New World pirate who allied himself with the Whitebeard Pirates.
name: Wallem

description: Wanda is a canine mink of the Warrior Beast Tribe, a Kingsbird aide to both Inuarashi and Nekomamushi, and a member of the Inuarashi Musketeer Squad,.
name: Wanda

description: Wany is Wanda's crocodile-boar steed.
name: Wany

description: Wanyudo is a Gifter in the Beasts Pirates, serving as Black Maria's weapon.
name: Wanyudo

description: Wanze is a member of CP7 and a cook, specializing in making ramen noodles.
name: Wanze

description: Tin-Plate Wapol is the former monarch of the Drum Kingdom. He became a pirate after fleeing from his country when Blackbeard and his crew attacked Drum Island. After his defeat by the Straw Hat Pirates, he became the head of his own toy enterprise and married Kinderella. Two years later, he was given his own kingdom by the World Nobles and now reigns as the king of the Black Drum Kingdom.
name: Wapol

description: Warashi is one of the Shandia warriors who fought against Enel.
name: Warashi

description: Sugamichi and Warazane are two land-dwelling catfish ridden by Fujin and Raijin, respectively.
name: Warazane

description: Waruno Furishiro is a man who manages weapon production orders on behalf of Kurozumi Orochi in the Flower Capital of Wano Country.
name: Waruno Furishiro

description: Wellington is a North Blue pirate from around fourteen to sixteen years ago.
name: Wellington

description: Wheel is the prince of South Fire Kingdom. He accompanied his father Jeep to the Levely.
name: Wheel

description: Ice Witch Whitey Bay is an infamous New World pirate captain who was once a member of the Whitebeard Pirates before forming her own crew subordinate to Whitebeard.
name: Whitey Bay

description: Who's-Who, also known as Who of the Droplets, is one of the Tobiroppo, the strongest six Shinuchi of the Beasts Pirates.
name: Who's-Who

description: Wicca is a female dwarf from Tontatta Kingdom beneath Green Bit. She, along with other members of her kind often pose as Dressrosa's fairies and take their offerings. She is a member of the Tontatta Pirates, the 5th Division of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet.
name: Wicca

description: A scientist is an individual who uses his knowledge and expertise to help engineer new creations to serve the world.
name: Willie Gallon

description: Wire is a member of the Kid Pirates.
name: Wire

description: Woop Slap is the mayor of Monkey D. Luffy's hometown, Foosha Village.
name: Woop Slap

description: Berserker Wyperis the former leader of the Shandia warriors that fought to take Upper Yard back from Enel. He is the direct descendant of Kalgara.
name: Wyper

description: Red Flag X Drake (read as Diez Drake) is the captain of the Marine Secret Special Unit SWORD. In order to go undercover as a pirate, he publicly defected from his position as rear admiral and founded the Drake Pirates. He is one of twelve pirates referred to as the Worst Generation, and prior to the two-year timeskip had a bounty of 222,000,000.
name: X Drake

description: Yama is a Birkan and the commander of the Divine Soldiers under Enel. He is a supporting antagonist during the Skypiea Arc.
name: Yama

description: Vice Admiral Yamakaji is a Marine officer, and one of the five vice admirals who led the Buster Call on Enies Lobby.
name: Yamakaji

description: Yamato is the son of Kaidou. Born as Kaidou's daughter and groomed from a young age to be his heir, Yamato instead developed a profound admiration for the samurai Kozuki Oden. After his death, Yamato chose to become Oden, impersonating him and adopting his mannerisms. As a result of this desire to become Oden, Yamato decided to become a man and identify as Kaidou's son, and Kaidou and his crew refer to him as such as well.
name: Yamato

description: O-Yame is a woman who lives in Okobore Town of Kuri with her two sons, Kinbo and an unnamed infant.
name: Yame

description: Yamenahare is a citizen of Pucci and the manservant to Marumieta, the daughter of Pucci's mayor, Bimine.
name: Yamenahare

description: Yamon was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. Their current whereabouts and status are unknown.
name: Yamon

description: Yarisugi is a Marine Commodore of G-5 Unit 06.
name: Yarisugi

description: Yasopp, known as Chaser, is the sniperand an executive of the Red Hair Pirates. He is also the father of Usopp and the widower of Banchina.
name: Yasopp

description: Snake-Eyes Yatappe is a yakuza boss who was in charge of the Kibi region in Wano Country. He was imprisoned in Udon by the Beasts Pirates, but was freed when Luffy took over the prison.
name: Yatappe

description: Yazaemon is a ninja and a member of the Beasts Pirates. He previously was a member of the Orochi Oniwabanshu which served the shogun of Wano Country, Kurozumi Orochi.
name: Yazaemon

description: Yokan is a doctor assigned to treat the injured at sumo matches in Bakura Town.
name: Yokan

description: Yokozuna is a giant sumo-wrestling frog, who was a friend (as well as pet) to the legendary shipwright Tom until his execution.
name: Yokozuna

description: Pastor Yomo is a sheep mink and one of Inuarashi's Musketeers.
name: Yomo

description: The Medaka Mermaid Quintuplets (, Medaka no Ningyo no Itsutsugo?, VIZ Media: Guppy Mermaid Quintuplets) are five young Japanese rice fish mermaids who are friends with Camie. Their names are Ichika, Nika, Sanka, Yonka, and Yonka Two.
name: Yonka

description: The Medaka Mermaid Quintuplets (, Medaka no Ningyo no Itsutsugo?, VIZ Media: Guppy Mermaid Quintuplets) are five young Japanese rice fish mermaids who are friends with Camie. Their names are Ichika, Nika, Sanka, Yonka, and Yonka Two.
name: Yonka Two

description: York, also designated as Punk-06 (PUNK-06, Panku-Shikkusu?), is one of the six satellites of Dr. Vegapunk, embodying his aspect of greed.
name: York

description: Calico Yorki was the captain of the Rumbar Pirates who brought Laboon to Reverse Mountain fifty years ago from West Blue.
name: Yorki

description: Yosaku along with Johnny are old friends and former bounty hunting partners of Roronoa Zoro.
name: Yosaku

description: Mr. Yoshimoto is the owner of the restaurant Spice Bean.
name: Yoshimoto

description: Yotsubane is one of the Shandia warriors who fought against Enel.
name: Yotsubane

description: Yu is a little girl who accidentally bumped into Smoker and got ice cream on his uniform.
name: Yu

description: Yui was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.
name: Yui

description: Yuki was the little ranch girl who lived on a remote island on a ranch where the giants celebrated. She was responsible for starting the duel between Dorry and Brogy.
name: Yuki

description: Yurikah is the captain of the Tulip Pirates that attacked Mirrorball Island in Jango's cover story.
name: Yurikah

description: Zabo was a man that illegally trespassed into Upper Yard and was subsequently punished by Enel during his escape.
name: Zabo

description: Zadie was one of the archaeologists of Ohara.
name: Zadie

description: Poison Spider Zala, better known by her alias Miss Doublefinger, was the second highest ranking female officer agent in the secret organization known as Baroque Works. As an officer agent, she was partnered with Mr. 1. She also used the alias of Paula while she acted as the owner of Spiders Cafe in Arabasta.
name: Zala

description: Zambai was a member of the Franky Family and was Franky's right hand man. After the timeskip, he, Kiev, and Tamagon have joined the Galley-La Company as Zambai's Company Union.
name: Zambai

description: Zanki is a member of the Numbers in the Beasts Pirates, representing the number three.
name: Zanki

description: Zeff is the head chef and owner of Baratie. Before that, he was the captain of the Cook Pirates (in which he was known as Red-Leg) until his crew was annihilated in a storm.
name: Zeff

description: Zeo is a Japanese wobbegong fish-man and the self-proclaimed Noble of the Fish-Man District. He was an officer of the New Fish-Man Pirates before their downfall and disbandment.
name: Zeo

description: Zepo was a polar bear mink who was Bepo's older brother and a member of the Nox Pirates. He was killed by Big Mom in Totto Land five years ago after he spun her Soul Pocus roulette wheel.
name: Zepo

description: Zeus the Thundercloud is a homie that is fused with Nami's Sorcery Clima-Tact. Before merging with the Clima-Tact, he was owned by Big Mom, who would summon him from her left hand. Due to being made from a soul fragment from Big Mom herself, he is more powerful than most homies.
name: Zeus

description: Zodia is an infamous New World pirate captain who was subordinate to Whitebeard.
name: Zodia

description: Zotto is a Marine Lieutenant and a subordinate of Vice Admiral Momonga.
name: Zotto

description: Zucca is an infamous New World pirate who allied himself with the Whitebeard Pirates.
name: Zucca

description: Zunesha is a Naitamie-Norida elephant that was affiliated with Joy Boy 800 years ago. It now wanders through the New World and carries the island of Zou on its back as punishment for an unspecified crime it committed in the past.
name: Zunesha

description: The Buggy Pirates are a band of pirates led by Buggy, who is a former apprentice of the Roger Pirates. They are the main antagonists of the Orange Town Arc and one of the antagonist groups of the Loguetown Arc. Their current goal is finding Captain John's legendary treasure. The crew has since combined with the remnants of the Alvida Pirates, forming the Buggy and Alvida Alliance. After the events of the Summit War Saga, Buggy became a member of the Seven Warlords of the Sea and used his new infamy and influence to evolve the alliance into a New World-based, Underworld organization now known as Buggy's Delivery.
name: Acrobatic Fuwas

description: Admiral is the second highest rank in the hierarchy of the Marines, senior to a vice admiral and junior to the fleet admiral. There are only three admirals serving at a given time, and given their Devil Fruit powers and status as the strongest Marine officers, they count among the most powerful characters in the series.
name: Admiral

description: The Barto Club is a pirate crew led by Bartolomeo and the second ship of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet.
name: Barto Club

description: The Beautiful Pirates are the first ship of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet, a crew commanded by Cavendish.
name: Beautiful Pirates

description: The Charlotte Decuplets are the 36-40th sons and 30-34th daughters of the Charlotte Family, making up the 65-74th children in the family, and are all officers of the Big Mom Pirates. They are the largest group of Big Mom's children born in a single birth.
name: Charlotte Decuplets

description: The Charlotte Family is the family of Charlotte Linlin of the Four Emperors, also known as Big Mom.
name: Charlotte Family

description: The Chinjao Family is a gang from the Kano Country, led by Don Chinjao. They competed in the Corrida Colosseum for the Mera Mera no Mi, but also have an ulterior motive.
name: Chinjao Family

description: The Four Emperors, which make up one of the Three Great Powers, are a group of four pirates considered to be the most notorious and powerful captains in the world. The group currently consists of Red-Haired Shanks, Blackbeard, Straw Hat Luffy, and Buggy the Star Clown. Former known members of the group include Whitebeard, Big Mom, and Kaidou of the Beasts.
name: Four Emperors

description: The Five Elders are a council of the highest-ranking Celestial Dragons that make up the head of state for the World Government. They essentially hold the greatest authority over the entirety of the world; the only exception being the mysterious sovereign Im whom they answer to as king of the world in secrecy.
name: Five Elders

description: The Happo Navy is a pirate crew led by the Chinjao Family of the Kano Country. Under Sai, the Happo Navy is the third ship of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet.
name: Happo Navy

description: The Heart Pirates are an infamous and notable rookie pirate crew from the North Blue and introduced on Sabaody Archipelago around the time the Straw Hat Pirates arrived there two years ago. Their captain, Trafalgar D. Water Law, is a member of the Worst Generation and a former member of the Seven Warlords of the Sea. They were in an alliance with the Straw Hat Pirates, Kozuki Family, and Mink Tribe with the goal of taking down Kaidou of the Four Emperors. The alliance was dissolved after their objective of taking down Kaidou was achieved.
name: Heart Pirates

description: The Ideo Pirates, formerly known as the XXX Gym Martial Arts Alliance (XXX, Toripuru-Ekkusu Jimu Kakut Reng?, pronounced Triple X Gym Martial Arts Alliance) is a pirate crew led by Ideo and the fourth ship of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet.
name: Ideo Pirates

description: The Inuarashi Musketeer Squad is the main diurnal combat force of the Mokomo Dukedom that formerly operated under the command of Duke Inuarashi. and now currently operate under former member Carrot. It is the daytime counterpart of the Guardians who also formerly operated under Master Nekomamushi. Among them are three minks known as The Three Musketeers of Inuarashi (, Inuarashi Sanjshi?), who possess the authority to command the other Musketeers and are themselves led by Shishilian.
name: Inuarashi Musketeer Squad

description: The Isshi-20 were the twenty most skilled doctors on Drum Island, whom Wapol took for himself in order to make his subjects dependent on him for their services.
name: Isshi-100

description: The Just Eleven Jurymen are the strongest and most fearsome of the troops at Enies Lobby under Baskerville's command. They are eleven men each wielding a large ball on a chain. They wear masks and they have the word Guilty (, Yzai?) tattooed on their left arm.
name: Just Eleven Jurymen

description: The Kairiki Destroyersare the three largest human members of the Franky Family. They are the biggest in the Family and are considered by the rest of the gang as some of the strongest members hence their name.
name: Kairiki Destroyers

description: The Kid Pirates are an infamous and notable rookie pirate crew introduced during the Sabaody Archipelago Arc during the time the Straw Hat Pirates arrived there two years ago. As such, they are part of the Worst Generation. Like the Straw Hats, this crew has two bounties above 100,000,000. Both members had slightly higher bounties than the respective members of the Straw Hat Pirates before the timeskip. Their captain is Eustass Kid.
name: Kid Pirates

description: The Koala Mercenaries are a trio of bodyguards who watch over Rain Dinners.
name: Koala Mercenaries

description: The Kozuki Family is a powerful family that ruled over Wano Country until their downfall twenty years ago. The family has existed for centuries in which they invented the poneglyphs and became friends with the people of the Mokomo Dukedom. After Kaidou and Orochi's defeats, the Kozuki family regained their shogunate.
name: Kozuki Family

description: The Kyoshiro Family is a yakuza group in Wano Country led by the high-ranking money changer in service to the Kurozumi Family, Kyoshiro(who was Denjiroin disguise).After Denjiro revealed his identity as a member of the Nine Red Scabbards, they became enemies of Kurozumi Orochi and the Beasts Pirates during the Fire Festival and pledged themselves to the Kozuki Family and theNinja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance.
name: Kyoshiro Family

description: The Mansion's Guards are employees of Tessle Company, hired by Klahadore to act as security guards to keep Kaya's mansion safe.
name: Mansion's Guards

description: The Matryo Princesses are the princesses of the Roshwan Kingdom. Their names, in order from largest to smallest, are Matryosaka, Matryosuka, Matryoseka, and Matryosoka.
name: Matryo Princesses

description: The Mimawarigumi was a squad of samurai who once served under Kurozumi Orochi, the former shogun of Wano Country. After the seeming death of Orochi by Kaidou's hands, the members of the Mimawarigumi swore loyalty to Kaidou, effectively becoming part of the Beasts Pirates.
name: Mimawarigumi

description: The Mt. Atama Thieves are a group of bandits who operate in Wano Country. Their leader is Ashura Doji, who goes by the name Shutenmaru.
name: Mt. Atama Thieves

description: The Nefertari Family is a royal bloodline clan that has ruled the Arabasta Kingdom for at least eight hundred years, and one of the twenty royal families which founded the World Government.
name: Nefertari Family

description: The Neptune Family is the royal bloodline that rules the Ryugu Kingdom of Fish-Man Island.
name: Neptune Family

description: The New Giant Warrior Pirates are a pirate crew of Giants led by Hajrudin. The crew is a spiritual revival of the Giant Warrior Pirates that disbanded 100 years ago. They were once part of Buggy's Delivery, before leaving to become the sixth ship of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet after the events on Dressrosa.
name: New Giant Warrior Pirates

description: The Nine Red Scabbards are a squad of nine retainers of the Kozuki Family who served Kozuki Oden and now serve his son Momonosuke. They are led by their captain, Kin'emon.
name: Nine Red Scabbards

description: The Numbers are a group within the Beasts Pirates made up of artificially produced ancient giants. Originally created on Punk Hazard, they were deemed to be unsuccessful and were eventually bought by Kaidou. They currently reside on Onigashima and serve as combatants for the crew.
name: Numbers

description: The Orochi Oniwabanshu was a squad of ninja who once served Kurozumi Orochi, the shogun of Wano Country. After the seeming death of Orochi by Kaidou's hands, the members of the Orochi Oniwabanshu swore loyalty to Kaidou, effectively becoming part of the Beasts Pirates.
name: Orochi Oniwabanshu

description: The Riku Family is a royal bloodline which ruled the Dressrosa Kingdom from the formation of the World Government, until ten years before the current timeline. It was one of the new royal families after nineteen of the twenty kings that founded the World Government left their kingdoms with their families to live in Mary Geoise.
name: Riku Family

description: The Straw Hat Grand Fleet is a fleet formed by seven pirate crews who vowed to serve under Monkey D. Luffy and the Straw Hat Pirates.
name: Straw Hat Grand Fleet

description: The Straw Hat Pirates, also known as the Mugiwara Pirates, Straw Hat Crew or simply the Straw Hats, are an infamous and powerful pirate crew that originated from the East Blue. They are the main focus and protagonists of the manga and anime One Piece and are led by the main protagonist Monkey D. Luffy.
name: Straw Hat Pirates

description: The Buggy Pirates are a band of pirates led by Buggy, who is a former apprentice of the Roger Pirates. They are the main antagonists of the Orange Town Arc and one of the antagonist groups of the Loguetown Arc. Their current goal is finding Captain John's legendary treasure. The crew has since combined with the remnants of the Alvida Pirates, forming the Buggy and Alvida Alliance. After the events of the Summit War Saga, Buggy became a member of the Seven Warlords of the Sea and used his new infamy and influence to evolve the alliance into a New World-based, Underworld organization now known as Buggy's Delivery.
name: Superhuman Domingos

description: The Tightrope Walking Funan Bros are a trio of pirates within the Buggy Pirates.
name: Tightrope Walking Funan Bros

description: The Beasts Pirates are an extremely infamous and powerful pirate crew led by their governor-general, Kaidou, formerly one of the Four Emperors. They were based in Wano Country, specifically headquartered on Onigashima.
name: Tobiroppo

description: The Tontatta Pirates, formerly known as Tonta Corps (, Tonta Heidan?), are the armed forces of the Tontatta Tribe formed in order to commence Operation SOP, and later, reformed as a pirate crew. They are composed of 200 dwarves under the command of Leo, forming the fifth ship of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet.
name: Tontatta Pirates

description: The Vinsmoke Family is a royal bloodline that rules the Germa Kingdom and they are the former dynastic conquerors and rulers of North Blue. They are also a powerful and infamous family of Underworld mercenaries, and the family from which Sanji originally hails. As an adjunct to their rule over the Germa Kingdom, they are the commanders of the Kingdom's Underworld army, Germa 66.
name: Vinsmoke Family

description: The WCI 31 is a group of Whole Cake Island's most renowned head chefs.
name: WCI 31

description: The Yonta Maria Grand Fleet is a group of 56 ships led byOrlumbus. It shares its name with its flagship, the Yonta Maria. After the defeat of Doflamingo, the flagship became the seventh ship of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet and with it the entire Yonta Maria Grand Fleet.
name: Yonta Maria Grand Fleet
